political_decisions = {

	russia_pls_help_uwu = {
		picture = map_india
		potential = {
			tag = EIC
			is_vassal = no
			OR = {
				1587 = {
					owned_by = RUS
				}
				any_neighbor_country = {
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
		}

		allow = {
			OR = {
				ENG = { war_with = THIS }
				ENL = { war_with = THIS }
			}
			OR = {
				1587 = {
					owned_by = RUS
				}
				any_neighbor_country = {
					tag = RUS
				}
			}
		}

		effect = {
			RUS = {
				country_event = 7979000
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}	

	
	rename_texas_mexico_2 = {
		picture = all_texas
		potential = {
			OR = {
				is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
				is_culture_group = iberian
			}
			TEX = { 
				all_core = {
					owned_by = THIS
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = rename_texas_mexico_2 }
			owns = 133
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = rename_texas_mexico_2
			clr_global_flag = rename_texas_usa_2
			prestige = 2
			43 = { change_province_name = "Río Rojo" }
			132 = { change_province_name = "Punto de Morgan" }
			133 = {
				change_province_name = "San Javier"
				state_scope = {
					change_region_name = "Tejas del Este"
				}
			}
			134 = { change_province_name = "San Ángelo" }
			137 = { change_province_name = "San Antonio" }
			3402 = { change_province_name = "Matagorda" }
			3403 = { change_province_name = "Orcoquisac" }
			
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	californio_claims = {
	picture = alta_california
		potential = {

		}

	}

	recognize_texas = {
		picture = all_texas
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = FRA
				tag = BOR
				is_greater_power = yes
				tag = BEL
				tag = NET
			}
			exists = TEX
			TEX = {
				NOT = { in_sphere = MEX }
			}
			exists = MEX
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = recognize_texas
				tag = TEX
				tag = MEX
			}
		}
		allow = { 
			TEX = {
				OR = {
					war_with = MEX
					truce_with = MEX
					war = no
				}
			}
		}
		effect = {
			prestige = 1
			set_country_flag = recognize_texas
			country_event = 1110022
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	aridoamerica_alliance = { #formalize alliance, removes border friction
		picture = aridoamerica
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = TEX
				tag = RGR
				tag = C4L
				tag = CAL
				tag = SON
				tag = TRG
				tag = S0N
				AND = {
					tag = DES
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_global_flag = mormons_take_over_hawaii
							has_global_flag = mormon_columbia
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				exists = TEX
				exists = RGR
				exists = C4L
				exists = CAL
				exists = SON
				exists = TRG
				exists = S0N
				exists = DES
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_refuse
				has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_transition
			}
		}
		allow = {
			OR = {
				TEX = {
					exists = yes
					ai = yes
					NOT = {
						vassal_of = MEX
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_refuse
						}
						#alliance_with = THIS
					}
				}
				RGR = {
					exists = yes
					ai = yes
					NOT = {
						vassal_of = MEX
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_refuse
						}
						#alliance_with = THIS
					}
				}

					exists = yes

					NOT = {
						vassal_of = MEX
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_refuse
						}
						#alliance_with = THIS
					}
				}
				CAL = {
					exists = yes
					ai = yes
					NOT = {
						vassal_of = MEX
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_refuse
						}
						#alliance_with = THIS
					}
				}
				SON = {
					exists = yes
					ai = yes
					NOT = {
						vassal_of = MEX
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_refuse
						}
						#alliance_with = THIS
					}
				}
				TRG = {
					exists = yes
					ai = yes
					NOT = {
						vassal_of = MEX
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_refuse
						}
						#alliance_with = THIS
					}
				}
				S0N = {
					exists = yes
					ai = yes
					NOT = {
						vassal_of = MEX
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_refuse
						}
						#alliance_with = THIS
					}
				}
				DES = {
					exists = yes
					ai = yes
					NOT = {
						vassal_of = MEX
						OR = {
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
							has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_refuse
						}
						#alliance_with = THIS
						OR = {
							has_global_flag = mormons_take_over_hawaii
							has_global_flag = mormon_columbia
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
			set_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_transition
			set_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_leader
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = TEX
						tag = RGR
						tag = C4L
						tag = CAL
						tag = SON
						tag = TRG
						tag = S0N
					}
					exists = yes
					NOT = {
						vassal_of = MEX
						has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					25 = { country_event = { id = 1110027 days = 5 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 1110027 days = 6 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 1110027 days = 7 } }
					25 = { country_event = { id = 1110027 days = 8 } }
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = TEX
				NOT = { year = 1850 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = RGR
				NOT = { year = 1850 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = C4L
				NOT = { year = 1850 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = CAL
				NOT = { year = 1850 }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				tag = SON
				NOT = { year = 1860 }
			}
		}

			}
		}

				}

		}

		}

	TEX_RGR_TRG = {
		picture = rio_grande
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = TEX
				tag = RGR
			}
			TRG = { exists = no }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = TEX_RGR_TRG }
			has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
		}
		allow = {
			invention = national_fraternity
			all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			OR = {
				is_secondary_power = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						alliance_with = RGR
						alliance_with = TEX
					}
					OR = {
						relation = {
							who = TEX
							value = 175
						}
						relation = {
							who = RGR
							value = 175
						}
					}
					TEX = {
						exists = yes
						war = no
						has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
					}
					RGR = {
						exists = yes
						war = no
						has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						TEX = {
							exists = no
							all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
						}
						RGR = {
							exists = no
							all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
						}
					}
					has_country_flag = claim_TEX_RGR_TRG
					
				}
			}
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = TEX_RGR_TRG
			prestige = 5
			TEX = {
				all_core = { add_core = TRG }
			}
			RGR = {
				all_core = { add_core = TRG }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = TEX
						tag = RGR
					}
					NOT = { tag = THIS }
					exists = yes
					ai = yes
					has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
				}
				annex_to = THIS
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = TEX
						tag = RGR
					}
					NOT = { tag = THIS }
					exists = yes
					ai = no
					has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
			change_tag = TRG
		}
	}

					C4L = {
						exists = yes
						relation = { who = THIS value = 175}
						has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
						alliance_with = THIS
					}

						exists = yes
						relation = { who = THIS value = 175}
						has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
						alliance_with = THIS
					}
				}

					SON = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								exists = yes

								has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance
								alliance_with = THIS
								NOT = {
									OR = {
										has_global_flag = mormons_take_over_hawaii

							}
							AND = {
								exists = no

								#				vassal_of = THIS

								#	}

							}
						}
					}

							AND = {
								exists = yes

								has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance

									OR = {

		}

			set_global_flag = vassalize_aridoamerica_alliance
			prestige = 10
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance

	claim_aridoamerica = {
		picture = aridoamerica
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					tag = C4L
					has_country_flag = californio_claims
					has_country_flag = CAL_C4L_annex_S0N_sinaloa
				}	
				AND = {
					tag = CAL
					has_country_flag = greater_california
					has_country_flag = CAL_C4L_annex_S0N_sinaloa
				}
				AND = {
					tag = TRG
					has_country_flag = TRG_claim_alta_california
				}
				tag = S0N
				tag = SON
				AND = {
					tag = DES
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							has_global_flag = mormons_take_over_hawaii
							has_global_flag = mormon_columbia
						}
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = form_aridoamerica_sword }
		}
				
		allow = {
			is_vassal = no
			invention = national_fraternity
			invention = manifest_destiny
			romanticism = 1
			all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			OR = {
				is_secondary_power = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = form_aridoamerica_sword
			MEX_85 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_104 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_2139 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_94 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_97 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_100 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_103 = { add_core = THIS }
			TEX_132 = { add_core = THIS }
			TEX_133 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_2149 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_2142 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_2138 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_2147 = { add_core = THIS }
			MEX_2157 = { add_core = THIS }
			110 = { add_core = THIS }
			107 = { add_core = THIS }
			3398 = { add_core = THIS }
			3399 = { add_core = THIS }
			108 = { add_core = THIS }
			109 = { add_core = THIS }
			103 = { add_core = THIS }
			128 = { add_core = THIS }
			129 = { add_core = THIS }
			2154 = { add_core = THIS }
			2153 = { add_core = THIS }
			2158 = { add_core = THIS }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	form_aridoamerica = {
		picture = aridoamerica
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					has_global_flag = vassalize_aridoamerica_alliance
					has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_leader
				}
				has_country_flag = form_aridoamerica_sword
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = form_aridoamerica }
		}
				
		allow = {
			is_greater_power = yes
			prestige = 100
			all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			invention = national_fraternity
			TEX = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = THIS
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = no
					all_core = {
						OR = {
							owned_by = THIS
							owner = {
								OR = {
									in_sphere = THIS
									OR = {
										is_vassal = no
										vassal_of = THIS
									}
								}
								war = no
								is_greater_power = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			RGR = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = THIS
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = no
					all_core = {
						OR = {
							owned_by = THIS
							owner = {
								OR = {
									in_sphere = THIS
									OR = {
										is_vassal = no
										vassal_of = THIS
									}

					}
				}
			}
			C4L = {

								OR = {

									}
								}
								war = no
								is_greater_power = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			CAL = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = THIS
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = no
					all_core = {
						OR = {
							owned_by = THIS
							owner = {
								OR = {
									in_sphere = THIS
									OR = {
										is_vassal = no
										vassal_of = THIS
									}
								}
								war = no
								is_greater_power = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			#add sonora later on
		}
		
		effect = {
			prestige = 10
			set_global_flag = form_aridoamerica
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					vassal_of = THIS
					has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_vassal
					NOT = { has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_leader }
				}
				annex_to = THIS
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					vassal_of = THIS
					has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_vassal
					exists = yes
					ai = no
					NOT = { has_country_flag = aridoamerica_alliance_leader }
				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
			MEX_85 = { add_core = ARD }
			MEX_104 = { add_core = ARD }
			MEX_2139 = { add_core = ARD }
			MEX_94 = { add_core = ARD }
			MEX_97 = { add_core = ARD }
			MEX_100 = { add_core = ARD }
			MEX_103 = { add_core = ARD }
			TEX_132 = { add_core = ARD }
			TEX_133 = { add_core = ARD }

			MEX_2142 = { add_core = ARD }
			MEX_2138 = { add_core = ARD }
			MEX_2147 = { add_core = ARD }
			MEX_2157 = { add_core = ARD }
			110 = { add_core = ARD }
			107 = { add_core = ARD }
			3398 = { add_core = ARD }
			3399 = { add_core = ARD }
			108 = { add_core = ARD }
			109 = { add_core = ARD }

	reorganize_aridoamerican_territories = {
		picture = aridoamerica
		potential = {
			tag = ARD
			NOT = { has_country_flag = reorganize_aridoamerican_territories }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = reorganize_aridoamerican_territories
			political_reform = federalism
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core = MEX
						is_core = USA
					}
				}
				remove_core = MEX
				remove_core = USA
			}
			any_owned = { #Texas State
				limit = {
					OR = {
						region = TEX_132
						province_id = 105
						province_id = 129
						province_id = 128
						province_id = 103
						province_id = 109
						province_id = 3398
						province_id = 107
					}
				}
				remove_core = TRG
				remove_core = RGR
				remove_core = TEX
				remove_core = ARD
				add_core = TEX
				add_core = ARD
			}
			any_owned = { #Rio Grande State
				limit = {
					OR = {
						region = MEX_2142
						province_id = 2153
						province_id = 2158
						province_id = 2154
						province_id = 2662
						province_id = 2148
						province_id = 3397
						province_id = 108
					}
				}
				remove_core = TRG
				remove_core = RGR
				remove_core = TEX
				remove_core = ARD
				add_core = RGR
				add_core = ARD
			}
			any_owned = { #Sonora State
				limit = {
					OR = {
						region = MEX_2138
						region = MEX_2157
						province_id = 102
					}
				}
				remove_core = TRG
				remove_core = RGR
				remove_core = TEX
				remove_core = ARD
				remove_core = CAL
				remove_core = C4L
				add_core = SON
				add_core = ARD
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								primary_culture = californian
								has_country_flag = californian_identity
							}
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_owned = { #Las Californias State (spic)
						limit = {
							OR = {
								region = MEX_94
								region = MEX_97
								region = MEX_85
								region = MEX_104
								region = MEX_2139
								province_id = 3399
								province_id = 110
								province_id = 100
								province_id = 101
								province_id = 3396
							}
						}
						remove_core = TRG
						remove_core = RGR
						remove_core = TEX
						remove_core = ARD
						remove_core = C4L
						add_core = C4L
						add_core = ARD
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = californian
							has_country_flag = californian_identity
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					any_owned = { #Las Californias State (anglo)
						limit = {
							OR = {
								region = MEX_94
								region = MEX_97
								region = MEX_85
								region = MEX_104
								region = MEX_2139
								province_id = 3399
								province_id = 110
								province_id = 100
								province_id = 101
								province_id = 3396
							}
						}
						remove_core = TRG
						remove_core = RGR
						remove_core = TEX
						remove_core = ARD
						remove_core = CAL
						add_core = CAL
						add_core = ARD
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	BYZ_dismantle_ottomans = {
		picture = "eastern_crisis_dismantle_ottomans"
		potential = {
			tag = BYZ
			NOT = { has_country_flag = BYZ_dismantle_ottomans }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			has_country_flag = claim_anatolia_byz
			has_country_flag = claim_balkans_byz
			has_country_flag = claim_arbanon_byz
			has_country_flag = claim_w_balkans_byz
			all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			is_greater_power = yes
			TUR = {
				is_greater_power = no
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = BYZ_dismantle_ottomans
			badboy = 5
			prestige = 15
			#any_country = {
			#	limit = {
			#		any_owned_province = { is_core = TUR }
			#	}

			#		limit = {
			#			is_core = TUR
			#		}
			#		remove_core = TUR
			#	}
			#}
			TUR = {
				all_core = {
					remove_core = TUR
				}
				any_pop = {
					limit = { NOT = { has_pop_culture = turkish } }
					militancy = 9
					consciousness = 9
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_religion = orthodox
						has_pop_religion = apostolic
						has_pop_religion = nestorian
						has_pop_religion = catholic
						has_pop_religion = maronite
						has_pop_religion = syriac
					}
				}
				militancy = -10
				consciousness = -10
			}
			any_country = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						location = {
							OR = {
								is_core = ROM
								is_core = BUL
								is_core = SER
								is_core = BOS
								is_core = GRE
								is_core = BYZ
								is_core = MON
								is_core = ARM
								is_core = GRA
								is_core = GEO
								is_core = CLC
								is_core = ASY
								is_core = TCA
							}
						}
						has_pop_culture = turkish
					}
					reduce_pop = 0.70
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

				war = no

					who = SER
					value = 200
				}
			}
		}

			set_country_flag = integrate_serbia

			BYZ = { inherit = SER }
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = serb }
				scaled_militancy = { factor = 3 ideology = reactionary }
				scaled_consciousness = { factor = 3 ideology = conservative }
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}

	unite_with_byzantium = {
	picture = unite_with_greece
		potential = {
			primary_culture = greek
			NOT = { tag = BYZ }
			exists = BYZ
			NOT = { has_country_flag = unite_with_byzantium }
		}

		allow = {
			war = no
			OR = {
				vassal_of = BYZ
				is_vassal = no
			}
			OR = {
				part_of_sphere = no
				sphere_owner = { is_sphere_leader_of = BYZ }
				in_sphere = BYZ
			}
			BYZ = {
				war = no
				is_vassal = no
			}
		}

		effect = {
			set_country_flag = unite_with_byzantium
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = BYZ
					ai = yes
					THIS = { ai = yes }
				}
				inherit = THIS
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = BYZ
					ai = yes
					THIS = { ai = no }
				}
				any_owned = { secede_province = THIS }
				THIS = {
					remove_accepted_culture = turkish
					random_owned = {
						limit = { province_id = 834 }
						owner = { capital = 834 }
					}
					change_tag = BYZ
				}	
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = BYZ
					ai = no
				}
				country_event = 60130
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				government = fascist_dictatorship
				BYZ = {
					NOT = { government = fascist_dictatorship }
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { government = fascist_dictatorship }
				BYZ = { government = fascist_dictatorship }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { government = proletarian_dictatorship }
				BYZ = { government = proletarian_dictatorship }
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					government = democracy
					government = hms_government
				}
				BYZ = {
					NOT = {
						government = democracy
						government = hms_government
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				BYZ = {
					OR = {
						government = democracy
						government = hms_government
					}
				}
				NOT = {
					government = democracy
					government = hms_government
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					government = presidential_dictatorship
					government = bourgeois_dictatorship
					government = absolute_monarchy
				}
			}
		}
	}

	}
	accept_assyrians = {
		picture = assyrians
		potential = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = accept_assyrians }
			tag = BYZ
			any_owned_province = {
				any_pop = {
					has_pop_culture = assyrian
				}

					is_accepted_culture = no
					is_primary_culture = no
				}
				consciousness = 5
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = assyrian }
				militancy = -9
			}
		}
	}

			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = greek_pacifism }
		}

				OR = {
					ruling_party_ideology = reactionary

				}

							has_pop_culture = turkish
						} 
					}
				}
			}
			war = no
			invention = manifest_destiny
			invention = rhetoric_of_hate
			owns = 876 #ankara
			owns = 805 #thessanoliniki
			owns = 834 #athens
			owns = 860 #constantinople
			owns = 882 #trebizond
			owns = 894 #adana
			owns = 900 #antioch
		}

			THIS = { country_event = 6000015 }
		}
	}

	#solve kars border conflict BYZ - RUS
	#885 886 1096
	solve_border_disputes_BYZ_RUS = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			tag = BYZ
			NOT = {	has_global_flag = solve_border_disputes_BYZ_RUS }
			1096 = {
				is_core = BYZ
				is_core = RUS
				NOT = { owned_by = TUR }
				OR = {
					owned_by = BYZ
					owned_by = RUS
				}
			}
			885 = {
				is_core = BYZ
				is_core = RUS
				NOT = { owned_by = TUR }
				OR = {
					owned_by = BYZ
					owned_by = RUS
				}
			}
			886 = {
				is_core = BYZ
				is_core = RUS
				NOT = { owned_by = TUR }
				OR = {
					owned_by = BYZ
					owned_by = RUS
				}
			}
			3438 = {
				is_core = BYZ
				is_core = RUS
				NOT = { owned_by = TUR }
				OR = {
					owned_by = BYZ
					owned_by = RUS
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			BYZ = {
				war = no
				relation = { who = RUS value = 150 }
				has_country_flag = claim_anatolia_byz
			}
			RUS = {
				war = no
				relation = { who = BYZ value = 150 }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = solve_border_disputes_BYZ_RUS
			1096 = {
				secede_province = RUS
				remove_core = BYZ
			}
			885 = {
				secede_province = BYZ
				remove_core = RUS
			}
			886 = {
				secede_province = BYZ
				remove_core = RUS
			}
			3438 = {
				secede_province = BYZ
				remove_core = RUS
			}
		}
	}

	TEX_assimilation = { #add the rest of coloradoa and wyoming
		picture = all_texas
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = TEX
				tag = TRG
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = TEX_assimilation }
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = liberate_big_texas
				has_global_flag = TEX_created
				has_global_flag = lone_star_state
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = TEX_assimilation
			
			#Texas
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 133 }
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
						is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
						is_culture_group = african_diaspora_cultures
						is_culture_group = neo_european_cultures
						is_culture_group = iberian
					}
				}
				move_pop = 1234
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 43 }
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
						is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
						is_culture_group = african_diaspora_cultures
						is_culture_group = neo_european_cultures
						is_culture_group = iberian
					}
				}
				move_pop = 1235
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 132 }
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = native_american
						is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
						is_culture_group = african_diaspora_cultures
						is_culture_group = neo_european_cultures
						is_culture_group = iberian
					}
				}
				move_pop = 1236
			}
			any_pop = {

	RUS_alaska_hawaii_russoification = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				primary_culture = alaskan
				is_culture_group = east_slavic
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_organize_hawaii
			has_country_flag = RUS_claims_north_america
			is_vassal = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_colony_russoification }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			OR = {
				LSK = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
				all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
			}
			money = 50001
			invention = biased_multiculturalism
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_colony_russoification
			treasury = -50000
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { primary_culture = alaskan }	}
				owner = {
					add_country_modifier = {
						name = alaskaification
						duration = -1
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							has_pop_culture = alaskan
							has_pop_religion = orthodox
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.25
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							is_culture_group = native_american
						}
						reduce_pop = 0.5
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							is_culture_group = oceanic
						}
						reduce_pop = 0.85
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { is_culture_group = east_slavic }	}
				owner = {
					any_owned = {
						limit = {
							is_core = LSK
						}
						add_province_modifier = {
							name = russoification
							duration = 3650
						}
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							has_pop_culture = alaskan
							has_pop_religion = orthodox
						}
						reduce_pop = 3
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							is_culture_group = native_american
						}
						reduce_pop = 0.5
					}
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							is_culture_group = oceanic
						}
						reduce_pop = 0.85
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	CAS_hawaii = {
		picture = hawaii_map

			OR = {
				tag = UOR

				primary_culture = cascadian
			}

			war = no

				exists = yes
				civilized = no
				is_vassal = no

					number_of_states = 2
					truce_with = THIS
				}
				war = no
			}
		}

			set_country_flag = CAS_hawaii

				target = HAW
				type = establish_protectorate_casus_belli
				months = 24
			}
			HAW = {
				relation = { who = THIS value = -200 }
			}
			diplomatic_influence = { who = HAW value = -200 }
		}

	RUS_hawaii = {
		picture = hawaii_map
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					has_global_flag = fort_ross_sale_refuse
					has_global_flag = alaska_sale_refuse
					is_greater_power = yes
					owns = 3390
					owns = 1
				}
				AND = {
					primary_culture = alaskan
					OR = {
						owns = 3390
						has_global_flag = fort_ross_sale_refuse
					}
					OR = {
						is_secondary_power = yes
						is_greater_power = yes
					}
				}
			}
			owns = 1
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_hawaii }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			invention = mission_to_civilize
			HAW = {
				exists = yes
				civilized = no
				is_vassal = no
				NOT = {
					number_of_states = 2
					truce_with = THIS
				}
				war = no
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_hawaii
			badboy = 1
			casus_belli = {
				target = HAW
				type = establish_protectorate_casus_belli
				months = 24
			}
			HAW = {
				relation = { who = THIS value = -200 }
			}

		}

	RUS_rename_ncali = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				is_culture_group = east_slavic
				primary_culture = alaskan
			}
			has_country_flag = RUS_claims_north_america

			owns = 3389
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_rename_ncali }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = RUS_rename_ncali
			clr_global_flag = ENG_rename_ncali
			3308 = {
				change_province_name = "Svyataya Troitsa" 
				state_scope = {
					change_region_name = "Kaliforniya"
				}
			}  
			3307 = { change_province_name = "Modokov" }

	RUS_claims_north_america = {
		picture = map_alaska
		potential = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_claims_north_america }
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					has_global_flag = fort_ross_sale_refuse
					has_global_flag = alaska_sale_refuse
					has_country_flag = developing_fort_ross
					has_country_flag = CAS_from_whitehorse_and_down
					is_greater_power = yes
					owns = 3390
					owns = 1
				}
				AND = {
					primary_culture = alaskan
					has_country_flag = developing_fort_ross
					has_country_flag = CAS_from_whitehorse_and_down
					OR = {
						owns = 3390
						has_global_flag = fort_ross_sale_refuse
					}
					OR = {
						is_secondary_power = yes
						is_greater_power = yes
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					owns = 1
					owns = 6
					owns = 17
					owns = 2599
					owns = 2630
				}
				LSK = { 
					OR = {
						substate_of = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			OR = {
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
				ruling_party_ideology = fascist
				war_policy = jingoism
			}
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			invention = manifest_destiny
		}

			set_country_flag = RUS_claims_north_america
			badboy = 10
			15 = { #Prince Rupert
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
			}
			16 = { #Glenora
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
			}
			19 = { #Prince George
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
			}
			20 = { #Kelowna
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
			}
			13 = { #Vancouver
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
				owner = {
					relation = {
						who = THIS
						value = -200
					}
				}
			}
			14 = { #Victoria
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
			}
			78 = { #Seattle
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
			}
			79 = { #Spokane
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
			}
			81 = { #Portland/Oregon City
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
				owner = {
					relation = {
						who = THIS
						value = -100
					}
				}
			}
			83 = { #Umpqua
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
			}
			3394 = { #Wasco
				add_core = THIS
				add_core = LSK
			}

				add_core = THIS

					}

				}

					name = recently_built_city

		}

			factor = 1
		}

	rename_ftross = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = american_cultures
						AND = {
							is_culture_group = neo_european_cultures
							NOT = { primary_culture = alaskan }
						}
					}
					owns = 3390
					NOT = { has_global_flag = american_rename_ftross }
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = east_slavic
						primary_culture = alaskan
					}
					owns = 3390
					NOT = { has_global_flag = slavic_rename_ftross }
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = iberian
						is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
					}
					owns = 3390
					NOT = { has_global_flag = iberoamerican_rename_ftross }
				}
				AND = {
					primary_culture = japanese
					owns = 3390
					NOT = { has_global_flag = japanese_rename_ftross }
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = germanic
					owns = 3390
					NOT = { has_global_flag = germanic_rename_ftross }
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			#war = no
		}
		
		effect = {			
			###american###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3390
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = american_cultures
							AND = {
								is_culture_group = neo_european_cultures
								NOT = { primary_culture = alaskan }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				3390 = { change_province_name = "Fort Ross" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = american_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = slavic_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = iberoamerican_rename_ftross 
					clr_global_flag = japanese_rename_ftross 
					clr_global_flag = germanic_rename_ftross 
				}
			}
			
			###slavic###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3390
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = east_slavic
							primary_culture = alaskan
						}
					}
				}
				3390 = { change_province_name = "Krepost' Ross'" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = slavic_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = american_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = iberoamerican_rename_ftross 
					clr_global_flag = japanese_rename_ftross 
					clr_global_flag = germanic_rename_ftross 
				}
			}
			
			###iberoamerican###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3390
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
						}
					}
				}
				3390 = { change_province_name = "Fuerte Ruso" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = iberoamerican_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = slavic_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = american_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = japanese_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = germanic_rename_ftross
				}
			}
			
			###japanese###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3390
					owner = {
						primary_culture = japanese
					}
				}
				3390 = { change_province_name = "Toride-Roshiajin" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = japanese_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = slavic_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = american_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = iberoamerican_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = germanic_rename_ftross
				}
			}
			
			###japanese###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3390
					owner = {
						is_culture_group = germanic
					}
				}
				3390 = { change_province_name = "Festung Roß" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = germanic_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = japanese_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = slavic_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = american_rename_ftross
					clr_global_flag = iberoamerican_rename_ftross
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	CAS_from_whitehorse_and_down = {
		picture = map_alaska
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = LSK
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					has_country_flag = alaska_sale_refuse
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						tag = CAS
						tag = UOR
						tag = JEF
						tag = COL
					}
					has_country_flag = the_alaskan_question
				}
				primary_culture = japanese
				OR = {
					AND = {
						is_culture_group = iberian
						has_global_flag = reconquista
					}
					AND = {
						tag = MEX
						has_country_flag = manifest_destiny_refuted
					}
				}
			}
			1 = {
				OR = {
					owned_by = THIS
					owner = {
						OR = {
							in_sphere = THIS
							vassal_of = THIS
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				17 = {
					OR = {
						owned_by = ENG
						owner = {
							OR = {
								in_sphere = ENG
								OR = {
									is_vassal = no
									vassal_of = ENG
									vassal_of = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				6 = {
					OR = {
						owned_by = ENG
						owner = {
							OR = {
								in_sphere = ENG
								OR = {
									is_vassal = no
									vassal_of = ENG
									vassal_of = THIS
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = CAS_from_whitehorse_and_down }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						tag = LSK
						tag = CAS
					}
					OR = {
						is_secondary_power = yes
						is_greater_power = yes
					}
				}
				AND = {
					primary_culture = japanese
					is_greater_power = yes
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					is_greater_power = yes
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						AND = {
							is_culture_group = iberian
							has_global_flag = reconquista
						}
						AND = {
							tag = MEX
							has_country_flag = manifest_destiny_refuted
						}
					}
					is_greater_power = yes
				}
			}
			invention = manifest_destiny
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = CAS_from_whitehorse_and_down
			country_event = 1100003
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
		
	reorganize_cascadian_territories = {
		picture = cascadia_bioregion
		potential = {
			tag = CAS
			NOT = { has_country_flag = reorganize_cascadian_territories }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = reorganize_cascadian_territories
			political_reform = federalism
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core = RPL
						is_core = CAN
						is_core = ENG
					}
				}
				remove_core = RPL
				remove_core = CAN
				remove_core = ENG
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = UOR
				}
				remove_core = COL
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 83
						province_id = 3307
						province_id = 3308
						province_id = 3388
						province_id = 3389
						province_id = 3390
						province_id = 3393
					}
				}
				remove_core = UOR
				remove_core = CAS
				add_core = JEF
				add_core = CAS
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 17
				}
				remove_core = CAS
				add_core = COL
				add_core = CAS
			}
			
			COL = {
				primary_culture = cascadian
				government = democracy
			}
			UOR = {
				primary_culture = cascadian
				government = democracy
			}
			JEF = {
				primary_culture = cascadian
				government = democracy
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

		}

			country_event = 1100002
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	cascadian_identity = { #gibe assimilation bonus
		picture = cascadia_bioregion
		potential = {
			tag = CAS
			NOT = { has_country_flag = cascadian_identity }
		}
		allow = {
			war = no
			invention = biased_multiculturalism
			invention = social_darwinism
			romanticism = 1
			all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = cascadian_identity
			primary_culture = cascadian
			remove_accepted_culture = yankee
			remove_accepted_culture = anglo_canadian
			remove_accepted_culture = french_canadian
			
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 81 #Oregon City/Portland
							province_id = 78 #Fort Nisqually/Seattle
							province_id = 13 #New Westminster/Vancouver
							province_id = 14 #Victoria/Vancouver Island
						}
					}
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = anglo_canadian
						has_pop_culture = french_canadian
					}
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.5
			}
			
			#Oregon
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 81 } #Oregon City/Portland
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1234
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 82 } #Grande Ronde
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1235
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 83 } #Fort Umpqua
					is_culture_group = native_american
				}
				move_pop = 1236
			}

					location = { province_id = 78 } #Fort Nisqually/Seattle

				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 79 } #Fort Vancouver/Olympia

				}
				move_pop = 1238

	rebuild_ani = {
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = ARM
				tag = GRA
				tag = CLC
				tag = RUS
				tag = GEO
				tag = GRE
				tag = BYZ
				tag = TCA
				tag = GGE
			}
			NOT = {	has_global_flag = rebuild_ani }
			owns = 885
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			money = 50000
			NOT = {	has_global_flag = rebuild_ani }
		}	
		
		effect = {
			prestige = 5	
			885 = {
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = rebuilding_ani
					duration = 3650
				}
				#life_rating = 5
				change_province_name = "Ani"
				any_pop = { 
					limit = { culture = turkish } 
					reduce_pop = 0.05
					militancy = 8
				}
				any_pop = { 
					limit = { culture = kurdish } 
					reduce_pop = 0.25
					militancy = 8
				}
				any_pop = { 
					limit = { culture = armenian } 
					reduce_pop = 1.25
					militancy = 8
				}
				treasury = -50000
			}
			set_global_flag = rebuild_ani
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	#Disabled decisions
	armeno_georgian_commonwealth = {
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = GEO
				tag = ARM
			}
			NOT = {	has_country_flag = armeno_georgian_commonwealth }
			has_country_flag = disable_this_shit
		}
		
		allow = {
			invention = national_fraternity
			OR = {
				is_secondary_power = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			OR = {
				ARM = {
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						AND = {
							ai = yes
							OR = {
								in_sphere = THIS
								vassal_of = THIS
							}
						}
						ai = no
					}
				}
				GEO = {
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						AND = {
							ai = yes
							OR = {
								in_sphere = THIS
								vassal_of = THIS
							}
						}
						ai = no
					}
				}
				AND = {
					RUS_1098 = { owned_by = THIS }
					1105 = { owned_by = THIS }
					1106 = { owned_by = THIS }
					3286 = { owned_by = THIS }
				}
				AND = {
					RUS_1090 = { owned_by = THIS }
					RUS_1092 = { owned_by = THIS }
				}
			}
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			prestige = 10			
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = ARM
						tag = GEO
					}
					exists = yes
					ai = yes
					OR = {
						in_sphere = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
					}
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = ARM
							is_core = GEO
						}
					}
					annex_to = THIS
				}
			}
			political_reform = confederalism
			change_tag = GAC
			ARM = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			GEO = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			set_country_flag = armeno_georgian_commonwealth
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	claim_georgian_cores = {
		potential = {
			tag = GAC
			primary_culture = armenian
			NOT = {	has_country_flag = claim_georgian_cores }
			has_country_flag = disable_this_shit
		}

			invention = national_fraternity
			OR = {
				is_secondary_power = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			war_policy = jingoism
			war = no

		}

			prestige = 10

				limit = {
					tag = GEO
					exists = yes
					ai = yes
					OR = {
						in_sphere = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
					}
				}

					limit = { is_core = GEO }

				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
			GEO = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			set_country_flag = claim_georgian_cores
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	kartvelification = {
		picture = megali_idea
		potential = {
			primary_culture = georgian
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			OR = {
				###YEREVAN###
				AND = { owns = 1098 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_erivan } }
				AND = { owns = 1099 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_gyumri } }
				AND = { owns = 1100 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_kapan } }
				AND = { owns = 1101 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_nakhichevan } }
				###GANJA###
				AND = { owns = 3286 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_beylagan } }
				AND = { owns = 1105 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_agdam } }
				AND = { owns = 1106 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_shushi } }
				AND = { owns = 1104 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_sheki } }
				AND = { owns = 3288 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_zakatala } }
				###KARS###
				AND = { owns = 886 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_ardahan } }
				AND = { owns = 885 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_kars } }
				AND = { owns = 3438 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_igdir } }
				AND = { owns = 1096 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_batum } }
				###ERZURUM###   
				AND = { owns = 887 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_erzurum } }
				AND = { owns = 888 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_erzincan } }
				AND = { owns = 3437 NOT = { has_country_flag = kartvelification_dogubayazit } }

	end_the_TCA = {
		picture = form_transcaucasia
		
		potential = {
			tag = TCA
			is_vassal = yes
			ai = no
			NOT = { has_global_flag = end_the_TCA }
		}
		allow = {
			war = no
			tag = TCA
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1	
			NOT = { relation = { who = RUS value = -100 } }
			prestige = 25
		}
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = end_the_TCA
			any_country = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = TCA
					}
					remove_core = TCA
				}
			}
			RUS = { country_event = 100016 } #Inform Russia of TCA's shenanigans
			TCA = { country_event = 100017 } #Options for breaking up
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
				
	dagestan_by_sword = {
		picture = form_transcaucasia
		
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = DA1
				tag = DA2
				tag = DA3
				tag = DA4
			}
			NOT = {
				exists = DAG
				has_country_flag = dagestan_shall_unite_by_sword
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			romanticism = 1
			invention = nostalgic_romanticism
			invention = manifest_destiny
			OR = {
				is_secondary_power = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = dagestan_shall_unite_by_sword
			DA1 = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			DA2 = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			DA3 = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			DA4 = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			DAG = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			1057 = { add_core = THIS }

		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	form_dagestan = {
		picture = form_transcaucasia
		
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = DA1
				tag = DA2
				tag = DA3
				tag = DA4
			}
			NOT = { exists = DAG }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			prestige = 50
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			romanticism = 1
			invention = manifest_destiny
			invention = national_fraternity
			DA1 = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = THIS
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = no
					all_core = {
						OR = {
							owned_by = THIS
							owner = {
								in_sphere = THIS
								war = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			DA2 = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = THIS
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = no
					all_core = {
						OR = {
							owned_by = THIS
							owner = {
								in_sphere = THIS
								war = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			DA3 = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = THIS
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = no
					all_core = {
						OR = {
							owned_by = THIS
							owner = {
								in_sphere = THIS
								war = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			DA4 = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = THIS
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = no
					all_core = {
						OR = {
							owned_by = THIS
							owner = {
								in_sphere = THIS
								war = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			prestige = 10
			DA1 = {
				all_core = { add_core = DAG }
			}
			DA2 = {
				all_core = { add_core = DAG }
			}
			DA3 = {
				all_core = { add_core = DAG }
			}
			DA4 = {
				all_core = { add_core = DAG }
			}
			1057 = { add_core = DAG }
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					ai = yes
					OR = {
						in_sphere = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
					}
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = DAG }
					secede_province = THIS
				}
			}			
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = DA1
					exists = yes
					ai = no
				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = DA2
					exists = yes
					ai = no
				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = DA3
					exists = yes
					ai = no
				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = DA4
					exists = yes
					ai = no
				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
			add_accepted_culture = tatar
			add_accepted_culture = azerbaijani
			add_accepted_culture = chechen
			change_tag = DAG
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}	

	
	claim_georgia = {

			}
		}

			OR = {
				tag = KKK
				tag = IME
				1090 = { owned_by = THIS province_control_days = 1825 }

					nationalism_n_imperialism = 1

			factor = 1
		}
	}

			IME = { all_core = { remove_core = IME } }

political_decisions = {

	invest_in_irish_alternate = {
		picture = ireland
		potential = {
			OR = {
				primary_culture = irish
				primary_culture = scottish
				primary_culture = welsh
				primary_culture = manx
				primary_culture = cornish
				primary_culture = breton
				primary_culture = ulster_scot
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = invest_in_irish_alternate
			}
			#ENG = {
			#	OR = {
			#		has_country_flag = help_for_the_irish
			#		has_country_flag = irish_republican_brotherhood
			#	}
			#}
			any_owned_province = {
				is_core = IRE
				has_province_modifier = irish_oppression
				has_province_modifier = enclosures
				has_province_modifier = royal_irish_constabulary
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			money = 225001
			NOT = { citizenship_policy = residency }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = invest_in_irish_alternate
			random_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = irish_republican_brotherhood }
				clr_country_flag = irish_republican_brotherhood
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = help_for_the_irish }
				clr_country_flag = help_for_the_irish
			}
			prestige = 25
			treasury = -225000
			any_owned = {
				remove_province_modifier = irish_oppression
				remove_province_modifier = enclosures
				remove_province_modifier = royal_irish_constabulary
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = irish
					has_pop_religion = catholic
				}
				militancy = -9
			}
			add_accepted_culture = irish
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	establish_pan_celticism = {

								OR = {
									in_sphere = THIS

										is_vassal = no
										vassal_of = THIS
									}

				all_core = { add_core = THIS }
			}

					tag = INF

		}

	rename_silesia = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {      
					is_culture_group = germanic
					NOT = {
						AND = {
							tag = DNB
							accepted_culture = polish
						}
					}
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 682 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_lowersilesia } }
						AND = { owns = 684 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_uppersilesia } }
						AND = { owns = 688 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_troppau } }
						AND = { owns = 689 owns = 2584 owns = 3652 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_upper_uppersilesia } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = czecho_slovak_culture_group
					NOT = { accepted_culture = western_slavic }
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 682 NOT = { has_global_flag = czecho_renamed_lowersilesia } }
						AND = { owns = 684 NOT = { has_global_flag = czecho_renamed_uppersilesia } }
						AND = { owns = 688 NOT = { has_global_flag = czecho_renamed_troppau } }
						AND = { owns = 689 owns = 2584 owns = 3652 NOT = { has_global_flag = czecho_renamed_upper_uppersilesia } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = polish_culture_group
						tag = PLC
						AND = {
							tag = DNB
							accepted_culture = polish
						}
					}
					NOT = { accepted_culture = western_slavic }
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 682 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_lowersilesia } }
						AND = { owns = 684 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_uppersilesia } }
						AND = { owns = 688 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_troppau } }
						AND = { owns = 689 owns = 2584 owns = 3652 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_upper_uppersilesia } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = western_slavic
						accepted_culture = western_slavic
					}
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 682 NOT = { has_global_flag = silesian_renamed_lowersilesia } }
						AND = { owns = 684 NOT = { has_global_flag = silesian_renamed_uppersilesia } }
						AND = { owns = 688 NOT = { has_global_flag = silesian_renamed_troppau } }
						AND = { owns = 689 owns = 2584 owns = 3652 NOT = { has_global_flag = silesian_renamed_upper_uppersilesia } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}

	germanization_baltics = {
		picture = annex_united_baltic_duchy
		
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = LVN
				tag = KSM
				tag = ESG
				tag = UBD
			}
			primary_culture = volga_german
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					has_country_flag = germanization_baltics_LVN
					has_country_flag = germanization_baltics_KSM
					has_country_flag = germanization_baltics_ESG
					has_country_flag = germanization_baltics_UBD
					has_country_flag = germanization_baltics_LIT
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			school_reforms = acceptable_schools
			OR = {
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
				ruling_party_ideology = fascist
				ruling_party_ideology = communist
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			badboy = 2.5
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = { tag = LVN }
				}
				owner = {
					set_country_flag = germanization_baltics_LVN
					remove_accepted_culture = latvian
					remove_accepted_culture = estonian
				}
				add_province_modifier = { name = germanization_baltics_modifier duration = -1 }
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = { tag = KSM }
				}
				owner = {
					set_country_flag = germanization_baltics_KSM
					remove_accepted_culture = latvian
				}
				add_province_modifier = { name = germanization_baltics_modifier duration = -1 }
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = { tag = ESG }
				}
				owner = {
					set_country_flag = germanization_baltics_ESG
					remove_accepted_culture = estonian
				}
				add_province_modifier = { name = germanization_baltics_modifier duration = -1 }
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						tag = UBD
						all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
						NOT = { has_country_flag = ober_ost_shall_unite_by_sword }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_country_flag = germanization_baltics_UBD
					remove_accepted_culture = latvian
					remove_accepted_culture = estonian
					remove_accepted_culture = lithuanian
				}
				add_province_modifier = { name = germanization_baltics_modifier duration = -1 }
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						tag = UBD
						all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
						has_country_flag = ober_ost_shall_unite_by_sword
					}
				}
				owner = {
					set_country_flag = germanization_baltics_LIT
					remove_accepted_culture = latvian
					remove_accepted_culture = estonian
					remove_accepted_culture = lithuanian
				}
				add_province_modifier = { name = germanization_baltics_modifier duration = -1 }
			}

		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

			add_accepted_culture = lithuanian

	integrate_lithuania = {
		picture = ober_ost
		
		potential = {
			tag = UBD
			has_country_flag = ober_ost_shall_unite_by_sword
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = integrate_lithuania
			}
			LIT = { exists = yes }
			primary_culture = volga_german
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			invention = manifest_destiny
			invention = national_fraternity
			is_vassal = no
			LIT = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = THIS
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = no
					all_core = {
						OR = {
							owned_by = THIS
							owner = {
								in_sphere = THIS
								war = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			prestige = 10
			set_country_flag = integrate_lithuania
			LIT = {
				all_core = { add_core = THIS }
			}
			RUS_707 = { add_core = THIS }
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					ai = yes
					OR = {
						in_sphere = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
					}
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = ober_ost }
					secede_province = THIS
				}
			}			
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = LIT
					exists = yes
					ai = no
				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

		}

	claim_podolia = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			tag = ROM
			OR = {
				government = fascist_dictatorship
				AND = {
					war_policy = jingoism
					military_score = 30
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = claimed_transnitria
			has_country_flag = claimed_kolomiya
			NOT = { has_country_flag = claimed_podolia }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_vassal = no
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			MOL_676 = { owned_by = THIS }
			3279 = { owned_by = THIS }
			3655 = { owned_by = THIS }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = claimed_podolia
			random_list = {
				34 = { badboy = 3 }
				33 = { badboy = 4 }
				33 = { badboy = 5 }
			}
			3662 = { add_core = ROM }
			3661 = { add_core = ROM }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	rename_ccrimea = { 
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {       
			OR = {
				AND = {   
					is_culture_group = germanic
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 967 owns = 966 owns = 964 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_crimea } }
						AND = { owns = 3672 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_taurida1 } }
						AND = { owns = 973 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_taurida2 has_global_flag = found_melitopol } }
					}
				}
				AND = {   
					is_culture_group = italian
					AND = { owns = 967 owns = 966 owns = 964 NOT = { has_global_flag = italian_renamed_crimea } }
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = lithuanian
						is_culture_group = baltic
						tag = PLC
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = PLR
						tag = PRC
						tag = PRB
					}
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 967 owns = 966 owns = 964 NOT = { has_global_flag = lithuanian_renamed_crimea } }
						AND = { owns = 3672 NOT = { has_global_flag = lithuanian_renamed_taurida1 } }
						AND = { owns = 973 NOT = { has_global_flag = lithuanian_renamed_taurida2 has_global_flag = found_melitopol } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = east_slavic
						tag = PLR
						tag = PRC
						tag = PRB
					}
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 967 owns = 966 owns = 964 NOT = { has_global_flag = russian_renamed_crimea } }
						AND = { owns = 3672 NOT = { has_global_flag = russian_renamed_taurida1 } }
						AND = { owns = 973 NOT = { has_global_flag = russian_renamed_taurida2 has_global_flag = found_melitopol } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = polish_culture_group
					NOT = { tag = PLC }
					NOT = {
						tag = PLR
						tag = PRC
						tag = PRB
					}
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 967 owns = 966 owns = 964 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_crimea } }
						AND = { owns = 3672 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_taurida1 } }
						AND = { owns = 973 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_taurida2 has_global_flag = found_melitopol } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = tatar
						is_culture_group = turko_semitic
						is_culture_group = turanian
					}
					OR = {

	rename_kiev = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {    
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = germanic
					AND = { owns = 958 owns = 959 owns = 960 owns = 961 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_kiev } }
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = lithuanian
						is_culture_group = baltic
						tag = PLC
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = PLR
						tag = PRC
						tag = PRB
					}
					AND = { owns = 958 owns = 959 owns = 960 owns = 961 NOT = { has_global_flag = lithuanian_renamed_kiev } }
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = east_slavic
						tag = PLR
						tag = PRC
						tag = PRB
					}
					AND = { owns = 958 owns = 959 owns = 960 owns = 961 NOT = { has_global_flag = russian_renamed_kiev } }

					is_culture_group = polish_culture_group
					NOT = { tag = PLC }
					NOT = {
						tag = PLR
						tag = PRC
						tag = PRB
					}
					AND = { owns = 958 owns = 959 owns = 960 owns = 961 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_kiev } }
				}
			}
		}

			war = no
		}

	integrate_serbian_vojvodina = {
		picture = serbian_vojvodina
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = SER
				tag = YUG
			}
			VOJ = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					vassal_of = THIS
					substate_of = THIS
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = integrate_serbian_vojvodina }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			invention = manifest_destiny
			OR = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				is_secondary_power = yes
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = integrate_serbian_vojvodina
			VOJ = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			inherit = VOJ
			641 = {
				owner = {
					diplomatic_influence = {
						who = THIS
						value = -400
					}
					relation = {
						who = THIS
						value = -400
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
	
	steal_serbian_vojvodina = {
		picture = serbian_vojvodina
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = SER
				tag = YUG
			}
			VOJ = {
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					vassal_of = AUS
					vassal_of = KUK
					substate_of = AUS
					substate_of = KUK
				}
			}
			has_global_flag = VOJ_respected_autonomy
			NOT = { has_country_flag = steal_serbian_vojvodina }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			OR = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				is_secondary_power = yes
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = steal_serbian_vojvodina
			casus_belli = {
				target = AUS
				type = take_puppet
				months = 120
			}	
			relation = {
				who = AUS
				value = -200
			}
			AUS = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = -400
				}
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = -100
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

				tag = AUS

				NGF = { exists = yes }
				GER = { exists = yes }
				GCF = { exists = yes }
				nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
				is_greater_power = no
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = abolish_serbian_vojvodina
			VOJ = { country_event = 100047 }
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { year = 1860 }
			}
		}
	}

	poles_accepted_culture = {
		picture = become_poland
		potential = {
			is_culture_group = east_slavic
			any_owned_province = {
				is_core = POL
			}
			OR = {
				government = democracy
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
				government = hms_government
				government = absolute_monarchy
			}
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = panslavism
				has_global_flag = establish_panslavism
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = poles_accepted_culture }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			mass_politics = 1
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						government = democracy
						government = prussian_constitutionalism
						government = hms_government
					}
					OR = {
						ruling_party_ideology = liberal
						ruling_party_ideology = socialist
						ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
					}
				}
				AND = {
					government = absolute_monarchy
					ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = poles_accepted_culture
			add_accepted_culture = polish
			any_pop = {
				limit = { is_accepted_culture = no }
				militancy = 3
				consciousness = 5
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = polish }
				militancy = -3
				consciousness = -5
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				government = absolute_monarchy
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			}
		}
	}

		effect = {
			set_global_flag = georgians_accepted_culture
			add_accepted_culture = georgian
			any_pop = {
				limit = { is_accepted_culture = no }
				militancy = 4
				consciousness = 6
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = georgian }
				militancy = 4
				consciousness = 6
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	rename_villach = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = germanic
					AND = { owns = 3625 NOT = { has_global_flag = germanic_renamed_villach } }
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = south_slavic
					AND = { owns = 3625 NOT = { has_global_flag = southslavic_renamed_villach } }
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			
			###german - villach###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3625
					owner = {
						is_culture_group = germanic
					}
				}
				3625 = {
					change_province_name = "Villach"
				}
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = germanic_renamed_villach
					clr_global_flag = southslavic_renamed_villach
				}
			}
			
			###southslavic - villach###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3625
					owner = {
						is_culture_group = south_slavic
					}
				}
				3625 = {
					change_province_name = "Beljak"
				}
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = southslavic_renamed_villach
					clr_global_flag = germanic_renamed_villach
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
		
	}

	rename_ungvar = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { 
						primary_culture = hungarian
						tag = KUK
					}
					AND = { owns = 950 NOT = { has_global_flag = hungarian_renamed_ungvar } }
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = germanic
					NOT = { tag = KUK }
					AND = { owns = 950 NOT = { has_global_flag = germanic_renamed_ungvar } }
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					NOT = { primary_culture = rusyn }
					AND = { owns = 950 NOT = { has_global_flag = eastslavic_renamed_ungvar } }

	rename_budjak = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 678 NOT = { has_global_flag = slav_renamed_budjak } }
						AND = { owns = 3417 NOT = { has_global_flag = slav_renamed_reni } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = pan_romanian
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 678 NOT = { has_global_flag = romanian_renamed_budjak } }
						AND = { owns = 3417 NOT = { has_global_flag = romanian_renamed_reni } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = turko_semitic
						is_culture_group = turanian
					}
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 678 NOT = { has_global_flag = roach_renamed_budjak } }

				}

					owner = {
						is_culture_group = polish_culture_group
						NOT = { tag = PLC }
					}
				}

					set_global_flag = polish_renamed_palanga

	northern_sweden_rename = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = ugrian
						primary_culture = finnish
						primary_culture = estonian
						primary_culture = sami
					}
					owns = 320 NOT = { has_global_flag = ugric_renamed_northern_sweden }
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = swedish
						primary_culture = norwegian
						primary_culture = danish

	rename_lusatia = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = germanic
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 552 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_cottbus } }
						AND = { owns = 687 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_gotlitz } }
						AND = { owns = 558 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_dresden } }
						AND = { owns = 3663 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_bautzen } }
						AND = { owns = 3664 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_sagan } }
						AND = { owns = 3665 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_zary } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = polish_culture_group
					NOT = { primary_culture = sorbian }
					NOT = { accepted_culture = sorbian }
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 552 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_cottbus } }
						AND = { owns = 687 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_gotlitz } }
						AND = { owns = 558 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_dresden } }
						AND = { owns = 3663 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_bautzen } }
						AND = { owns = 3664 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_sagan } }
						AND = { owns = 3665 NOT = { has_global_flag = polish_renamed_zary } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = sorbian
						accepted_culture = sorbian
					}
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 552 NOT = { has_global_flag = sorbian_renamed_cottbus } }
						AND = { owns = 687 NOT = { has_global_flag = sorbian_renamed_gotlitz } }
						AND = { owns = 558 NOT = { has_global_flag = sorbian_renamed_dresden } }
						AND = { owns = 3663 NOT = { has_global_flag = sorbian_renamed_bautzen } }
						AND = { owns = 3664 NOT = { has_global_flag = sorbian_renamed_sagan } }
						AND = { owns = 3665 NOT = { has_global_flag = sorbian_renamed_zary } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}

			random_owned = {
				limit = {

					}

					clr_global_flag = polish_renamed_cottbus
					clr_global_flag = sorbian_renamed_cottbus
				}
			}
			random_owned = {

						is_culture_group = germanic
					}
				}
				687 = { change_province_name = "Görlitz" }

					set_global_flag = german_renamed_gotlitz
					clr_global_flag = polish_renamed_gotlitz
					clr_global_flag = sorbian_renamed_gotlitz
				}
			}
			random_owned = {

					}
				}

				owns = 884

				owns = 878
				owns = 3320
			}

	}

	romanian_rename_tisza = {
		picture = gtfo

				}
			}

			750 = { change_province_name = "Viterbo" }
			751 = { change_province_name = "Perugia" }

	claim_anatolia_byz = {
	picture = bicephalous_eagle
		potential = {
			tag = BYZ
			NOT = { has_country_flag = claim_anatolia_byz }
			has_country_flag = BYZ_borders
			has_country_flag = accept_armenians
			NOT = { has_country_flag = greek_pacifism }
		}

		allow = {
			BYZ = { is_greater_power = yes all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
			invention = national_fraternity		
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			war_policy = jingoism
			war = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = greek_pacifism }
		}

		effect = {
			prestige = 10
			badboy = 6
			set_country_flag = claim_anatolia_byz
			TUR_876 = { #Ankara 876 877 878 868
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			TUR_894 = { #Adana 894 896 898 895 900
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			900 = { #Antioch
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			898 = { #Antep
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			899 = { #Urfa
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			TUR_890 = { #Van
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			TUR_885 = { #Kars 885 886 1096
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			TUR_893 = { #Diyarbakir
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			TUR_887 = { #Erzurum
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			TUR_3435 = { #Harput
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			TUR_879 = { #Sivas
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			896 = { #Marash
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = greek }
				militancy = -1
				dominant_issue = { factor = 0.1 value = jingoism }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	claim_crimea_byz = {
	picture = bicephalous_eagle
		potential = {
			tag = BYZ
			NOT = { has_country_flag = claim_crimea_byz }
			has_country_flag = BYZ_borders
			NOT = { has_country_flag = greek_pacifism }
		}

		allow = {
			BYZ = { is_greater_power = yes all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
			invention = national_fraternity		
			invention = expansionism	
			invention = manifest_destiny	
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			war_policy = jingoism
			war = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = greek_pacifism }
		}

		effect = {
			prestige = 5
			badboy = 6
			random_country = {
				limit = { tag = RUS	}
				relation = { who = THIS value = -150 }
				leave_alliance = THIS
			}
			set_country_flag = claim_crimea_byz
			RUS_964 = { #Crimea 967 966 964
				add_core = BYZ
			}

				add_core = BYZ

				add_core = BYZ

				add_core = BYZ
			}
			1049 = { # Taman
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			3417 = { # Fidonisi
				add_core = BYZ
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = greek }
				militancy = -1
				dominant_issue = { factor = 0.1 value = jingoism }
			}
		}

		}

	claim_rumelia = {
	picture = claim_pontus
	
		potential = {
			primary_culture = greek
			has_country_flag = greece_has_got_a_brand_new_bag
			#has_country_flag = claim_pontus
			NOT = { has_country_flag = claim_rumelia }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = greek_pacifism }
		}

		allow = {
			war = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = population_exchange_with_turkey }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = turks_expelled }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = greek_pacifism }
			#GRE = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
		}

		effect = {
			set_country_flag = claim_rumelia
			badboy = 3
			TUR_809 = { #Rumelia (Northern Thrace)
				add_core = GRE
			}
			817 = { #Rumelia (Northern Thrace)
				add_core = GRE
			}
			814 = { #Rumelia (Northern Thrace)
				add_core = GRE
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = greek }
				militancy = -1
				dominant_issue = { factor = 0.1 value = jingoism }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	

	claim_ikonion = {
	picture = claim_pontus
	
		potential = {
			primary_culture = greek
			has_country_flag = greece_has_got_a_brand_new_bag
			#GRE = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = claim_ikonion }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = greek_pacifism }
		}

		allow = {
			war = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = population_exchange_with_turkey }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = turks_expelled }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = greek_pacifism }
		}

		effect = {
			set_country_flag = claim_ikonion
			badboy = 3
			IKO = {
				all_core = { add_core = THIS remove_core = IKO }
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { has_pop_culture = greek }
				militancy = -1
				dominant_issue = { factor = 0.1 value = jingoism }
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

}political_decisions = {

	JLA_RGS_substates = {
		picture = claim_santa_catarina
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = RGS
				AND = {
					tag = JLA
					ai = no
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = JLA_RGS_substates }
			has_global_flag = JLA_seceded
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			invention = national_fraternity
			OR = {
				alliance_with = JLA
				alliance_with = RGS
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			prestige = 10
			set_country_flag = JLA_RGS_substates
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					primary_culture = gaucho
					OR = {
						owns = 2461 #Laguna
						owns = 2463 #Porto Alegre
					}
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							tag = BRZ
							tag = THIS
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = 1000064
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	RGS_JLA_puppet_URU = {
		picture = claim_santa_catarina
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = RGS
				AND = {
					tag = JLA
					ai = no
				}
			}
			URU = {
				exists = yes
				ai = yes
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RGS_JLA_puppet_URU }
			has_global_flag = JLA_seceded
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			war_policy = jingoism
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = RGS_JLA_puppet_URU
			URU = {
				add_casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = make_puppet
					months = 240
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	integrate_puppets_RGS_JLA = {
		picture = claim_santa_catarina
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					tag = RGS
					URU = {
						OR = {
							in_sphere = THIS
							vassal_of = THIS
							all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
						}
					}
					JLA = {
						OR = {
							in_sphere = THIS
							vassal_of = THIS
							all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					tag = JLA
					ai = no
					URU = {
						OR = {
							in_sphere = THIS
							vassal_of = THIS
							all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
						}
					}
					RGS = {
						OR = {
							in_sphere = THIS
							vassal_of = THIS
							all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
						}
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = integrate_puppets_RGS_JLA }
		}
		
		allow = {
			has_country_flag = full_independence_achieved
			invention = expansionism
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {

			BOL = { all_core = { add_core = PBC } }
			#LEBENSRAUM!
			BRZ_2549 = { add_core = PBC } #Acre
			BOL_2370 = { add_core = PBC } #Puna de Atacama
			BOL_2315 = { add_core = PBC } #Tarija
			BOL_2309 = { add_core = PBC } #Antofagasta
			PRG_2338 = { add_core = PBC } #Alto Paraguay
			2367 = { add_core = PBC } #Xolotas
			2366 = { add_core = PBC } #Formosa
			3313 = { add_core = PBC } #CorumbÃ¡
			2368 = { add_core = PBC } #Salta
			2369 = { add_core = PBC } #Jujuy
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = PBC
					is_core = THIS
				}
				remove_core = PBC
			}
			release_vassal = PBC
			create_alliance = PBC
			create_vassal = PBC
			relation = {
				who = PBC
				value = 400
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = PBC
				value = 400
			}
			PBC = {
				political_reform = confederalism
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	PBC_subjugation_ecuador = {
		picture = form_gran_colombia
		potential = {
			tag = PBC
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = BOL_reunited_PBC
				AND = {
					has_country_flag = the_confederation_is_legitime
					has_country_flag = pbc_united
				}
			}
			ECU = { exists = yes }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = PBC_subjugation_ecuador }
		}
	
		allow = {
			war = no
			prestige = 150
			invention = manifest_destiny
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					truce_with = CLM
					truce_with = ECU
					truce_with = VNZ
					truce_with = FVZ
					truce_with = USV
				}
			}
			war_policy = jingoism
		}
	
		effect = {
		set_country_flag = PBC_subjugation_ecuador
			badboy = 2.5
			add_casus_belli = { target = ECU type = make_puppet months = 60 }
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	PBC_integrate_GCO = {
		picture = form_gran_colombia
		potential = {
			tag = PBC
			has_country_flag = PBC_vassalize_GCO
			has_country_flag = PBC_subjugation_venezuela
			has_country_flag = PBC_subjugation_colombia
			has_country_flag = PBC_subjugation_ecuador
			NOT = { has_global_flag = PBC_integrate_GCO }
			GCO = { exists = no }
		}
	
		allow = {
			war = no
			OR = {
				VNZ = {
					vassal_of = THIS
					in_sphere = THIS
					relation = {
						who = THIS
						value = 200
					}
					is_greater_power = no
				}
				FVZ = {
					vassal_of = THIS
					in_sphere = THIS
					relation = {
						who = THIS
						value = 200
					}
					is_greater_power = no
				}
				USV = {
					vassal_of = THIS
					in_sphere = THIS
					relation = {
						who = THIS
						value = 200
					}
					is_greater_power = no
				}
			}
			CLM = {
				vassal_of = THIS
				in_sphere = THIS
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 200
				}
				is_greater_power = no
			}
			ECU = {
				vassal_of = THIS
				in_sphere = THIS
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 200
				}
				is_greater_power = no
			}
			relation = {
				who = BOL
				value = 200
			}
			relation = {
				who = PEU
				value = 150
			}
			prestige = 200
			invention = manifest_destiny
			invention = national_fraternity
			NOT = { truce_with = PEU }
		}
	
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = PBC_integrate_GCO
			prestige = 10
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = north_andean
						primary_culture = llanero
						AND = {
							tag = PNM
							primary_culture = central_american
						}
					}
					NOT = { tag = THIS }
					in_sphere = THIS
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				annex_to = THIS
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = VNZ
						tag = FVZ
						tag = USV
						tag = CLM
						tag = ECU
						tag = PNM
					}
				}
				all_core = { add_core = GCO }
			}
			#Guyana
			2243 = { add_core = GCO }
			2242 = { add_core = GCO }
			3373 = { add_core = GCO }
			3379 = { add_core = GCO }
			3380 = { add_core = GCO }
			2532 = { add_core = GCO }
			#Marabitanas Amazon
			2401 = { add_core = GCO }
			3371 = { add_core = GCO }
			#Mosquitos coast
			UCA_2200 = { add_core = GCO }
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = GCO
					is_core = THIS
				}
				remove_core = GCO
			}
			release_vassal = GCO
			create_alliance = GCO
			create_vassal = GCO
			relation = {
				who = GCO
				value = 400
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = GCO
				value = 400
			}
			GCO = {
				political_reform = federalism
			}
		}

		}

	GCO_PBC_bolivars_dream = {
		picture = form_gran_colombia
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = GCO
				AND = {
					tag = PBC
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = BOL_reunited_PBC
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = the_confederation_is_legitime
							has_country_flag = pbc_united
						}
					}
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = constitucion_vitalicia
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = GCO_integrate_BOL_PEU
				has_global_flag = PBC_integrate_GCO
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GCO_PBC_bolivars_dream }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_vassal = no
			is_greater_power = yes
			OR = {
				PBC = { vassal_of = THIS }
				GCO = { vassal_of = THIS }
			}
			OR = {
				government = hms_government
				government = absolute_monarchy
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
			}
			prestige = 300
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = GCO_PBC_bolivars_dream
			all_core = { add_core = ANF }
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = PBC
						tag = GCO
					}
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = yes
				}
				all_core = { add_core = ANF }
				annex_to = THIS
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = PBC
						tag = GCO
					}
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = no
				}
				all_core = { add_core = ANF }
				country_event = 11101
			}
			change_tag = ANF
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
