	coerce_HAI_into_joining = {
		picture = unite_gran_colombia
		potential = {
			tag = GCO
			NOT = {	has_country_flag = coerce_HAI_into_joining	}
			NOT = {	has_country_flag = HAI_wants_to_join_again	}
		}
		
		allow = {
			OR = {
				is_secondary_power = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			war_policy = jingoism
			invention = expansionism
			war = no
			is_vassal = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = coerce_HAI_into_joining
			DOM = { all_core = { add_core = GCO } }
			add_accepted_culture = caribeno
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	HAI_wants_to_join_again = {
		picture = form_gran_colombia
		potential = {
			tag = GCO
			NOT = {	has_country_flag = HAI_wants_to_join_again	}
			NOT = {	has_country_flag = coerce_HAI_into_joining	}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_vassal = no
			prestige = 75
			OR = {
				is_secondary_power = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			invention = national_fraternity	
			DOM = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = THIS
					vassal_of = THIS
					ai = no
					all_core = {
						OR = {
							owned_by = THIS
							owner = {
								OR = {
									in_sphere = THIS
									vassal_of = THIS
								}
								war = no
								is_greater_power = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			prestige = 10
			DOM = {
				all_core = { add_core = GCO }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					ai = yes
					OR = {
						in_sphere = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
					}
					tag = DOM
				}
				annex_to = THIS
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = DOM
					exists = yes
					ai = no
				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
			set_country_flag = HAI_wants_to_join_again
			add_accepted_culture = caribeno
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	colonia_tovar = {
		picture = colonia_tovar
		potential = {
			OR = {
				primary_culture = north_andean
				primary_culture = llanero
			}
			owns = 3361
			NOT = {	has_country_flag = colonia_tovar_founded	}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			year = 1843
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = colonia_tovar_founded
			415 = { #Rouen, where they parted from.
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						has_pop_culture = south_german
					}
					move_pop = 3361
				}
				remove_core = T0B
			}
			3361 = { #Maracay
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = colonia_tovar_founded
					duration = -1
				}
				add_core = T0V
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	welcome_european_immigrants = {
		picture = colonia_tovar
		potential = {
			OR = {
				primary_culture = north_andean
				primary_culture = llanero
			}
			owns = 3361
			has_country_flag = colonia_tovar_founded
			NOT = { has_global_flag = actually_useful_immigrants }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			money = 30000
			invention = biased_multiculturalism
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = actually_useful_immigrants
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = good_immigrants
				duration = -1
			}
			treasury = -30000
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	constitucion_vitalicia = {
		picture = form_gran_colombia
		potential = {
			OR = {
				primary_culture = north_andean
				primary_culture = llanero
				tag = BOL
				AND = {
					tag = PBC
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = BOL_reunited_PBC
						AND = {
							has_country_flag = the_confederation_is_legitime
							has_country_flag = pbc_united
						}
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				is_secondary_power = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = constitucion_vitalicia }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			invention = authoritarianism
			invention = meritocracy_vs._aristocracy
			invention = nostalgic_romanticism
			prestige = 250
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = constitucion_vitalicia
			government = hms_government
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			political_reform = wealth_weighted_voting
			political_reform = appointed
			any_pop = {
				dominant_issue = {
					value = universal_weighted_voting 
					factor = 0.175
				}
				militancy = 7
				consciousness = 7
			}
			any_pop = {
				dominant_issue = {
					value = universal_voting 
					factor = 0.35
				}
				militancy = 7
				consciousness = 7
			}
			
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	lawa_tapahoni_question = {
		picture = french_guyane
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = NET
				tag = FRA
				tag = BOR
				tag = SUR
				tag = FGU
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					owns = 2240 #Paramaribo
					owns = 2245 #Apetina
				}
				AND = {
					owns = 2241 #Cayenne
					owns = 2246 #Maripasoula
				}
			}
			OR = {
				3383 = { produces = precious_metal } #Marouini
				3384 = { produces = precious_metal } #Tapahoni
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = lawa_tapahoni_question }
		}
				
		allow = {
			OR = {
				NET = { exists = yes war = no }
				FRA = { exists = yes war = no }
				BOR = { exists = yes war = no }
				SUR = { exists = yes war = no is_vassal = no }
				FGU = { exists = yes war = no is_vassal = no }
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = lawa_tapahoni_question
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = NET
						tag = FRA
						tag = BOR
						tag = SUR
						tag = FGU
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = THIS
						OR = {
							vassal_of = FRA
							vassal_of = BOR
							vassal_of = NET
						}
					}
					exists = yes
				}
				country_event = 1999998094
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

		picture = french_guyane
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = NET
				tag = FRA

				tag = SUR
				tag = FGU

			OR = {
				NET = { exists = yes war = no }

				SUR = { exists = yes war = no is_vassal = no }

						tag = NET

						tag = BOR

					}

	VNZ_declare_border_essequibo = {
		picture = venezuelan_guyana
		potential = {
			OR = {
				primary_culture = north_andean
				primary_culture = llanero
			}
			owns = 2242
			owns = 2264
			has_global_flag = schomburgks_line
			NOT = { has_global_flag = VNZ_declare_border_essequibo }
		}
				
		allow = {
			war = no
			year = 1840
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					vassal_of = ENG
					vassal_of = ENL
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = VNZ_declare_border_essequibo
			clr_global_flag = VNZ_ask_USA_mediation
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 2242
							province_id = 3381
						}
					}
					OR = {
						culture = north_andean 
						culture = llanero 
					}
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.5 
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENG
						tag = ENL
					}
					exists = yes
				}
				country_event = 1999998005
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	tripartite_alliance_schomburgk = {
		picture = guyanas_2
		potential = {
			OR = {
				primary_culture = north_andean
				primary_culture = llanero
				primary_culture = brazilian
				primary_culture = dutch
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2242 #Esequibo
						owns = 3381 #Barima
						owns = 2275 #Guasipati
						owns = 3596 #Gran Sabana
						owns = 2276 #Curiapo/Tucupita
					}
					AND = {
						owns = 2264 #Caracas
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2240 #Paramaribo
						owns = 2245 #Apetina
					}
					owns = 375 #Amsterdam
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						owns = 3379 #Mau
						owns = 3380 #Pirara
						owns = 2532 #Roraima
					}
					owns = 2447 #Rio de Janeiro
				}
			}
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = schomburgks_line
				has_global_flag = VNZ_declare_border_essequibo
				has_global_flag = 1850_VNZ_ENG_treaty
				has_global_flag = ENG_extend_schomburgk
				has_global_flag = ENG_declare_schomburgk_frontier
				has_global_flag = VNZ_ENG_cease_incursion
				has_global_flag = ENG_guasipati_incursion
				has_global_flag = VNZ_expel_brits_guyana
			}
			NOT = { USA = { has_country_flag = aid_VNZ } }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = tripartite_alliance_schomburgk }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = VNZ_BRZ_NET_leader }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = VNZ_BRZ_NET_member }
		}
		allow = {
			war = no
			USA = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				war = no
			}
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					vassal_of = ENG
					vassal_of = ENL
				}
			}
			OR = {
				OR = {
					2242 = {
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = ENG
							is_core = ENL
						}
					}
					3381 = {
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = ENG
							is_core = ENL
						}
					}
					2275 = {
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = ENG
							is_core = ENL
						}
					}
					3596 = {
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = ENG
							is_core = ENL
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					3379 = {
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = ENG
							is_core = ENL
						}
					}
					3380 = {
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = ENG
							is_core = ENL
						}
					}
				}
				3382 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = ENL
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = north_andean
						primary_culture = llanero

						is_secondary_power = yes

	VNZ_pain_in_the_ass = {
		picture = venezuelan_guyana
		potential = {
			OR = {
				primary_culture = north_andean
				primary_culture = llanero
			}
			owns = 2242 #Esequibo
			owns = 2264 #Caracas
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = VNZ_declare_border_essequibo
				AND = {
					has_global_flag = 1850_VNZ_ENG_treaty_refuse
					NOT = { has_global_flag = 1850_VNZ_ENG_treaty_accept }
				}
				AND = {
					has_global_flag = 1850_VNZ_ENG_treaty_accept
					has_global_flag = ENG_extend_schomburgk
				}
				AND = {
					has_global_flag = 1850_VNZ_ENG_treaty_accept
					has_global_flag = ENG_declare_schomburgk_frontier
				}
				AND = {
					has_global_flag = 1850_VNZ_ENG_treaty_accept
					has_global_flag = ENG_guasipati_incursion
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = VNZ_pain_in_the_ass }
		}
				
		allow = {
			war = no
			year = 1850
			money = 7001
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			OR = {
				2242 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = ENL
					}
				}
				3381 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = ENL
					}
				}
				2275 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = ENL
					}
				}
				3596 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = ENL
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = VNZ_pain_in_the_ass
			treasury = -7000
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2242 #Esequibo
						province_id = 3381 #Barima
						OR = {
							is_core = GUY
							is_core = ENG
							is_core = ENL
						}
					}
				}
				add_province_modifier = { name = colonial_recruitment duration = 1825 }
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							culture = north_andean 
							culture = llanero 
						}
					}
					reduce_pop = 1.75 
				}
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2243 #Pomaron
						owns = 3373 #Rupununi
					}
					exists = yes
				}
				country_event = 1999998071
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							province_id = 2243 #Pomaron
							province_id = 3373 #Rupununi
						}
					}
					add_province_modifier = { name = nationalist_agitation duration = 1825 }
					any_pop = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								culture = north_andean 
								culture = llanero 
							}
						}
						reduce_pop = 1.5
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				THIS = {
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							war_policy = jingoism
							OR = {
								ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
								ruling_party_ideology = fascist
								ruling_party_ideology = anarcho_liberal
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

				is_greater_power = yes

			has_global_flag = ENG_VNZ_problem
			NOT = { has_country_flag = USA_VNZ_treaty }
		}
		allow = {
			war = no
			USA = { is_greater_power = yes }
			OR = {
				in_sphere = USA
				relation = {
					who = USA
					value = 125
				}
				alliance_with = USA
			}
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					vassal_of = ENG
					vassal_of = ENL
				}
			}
			OR = {
				2242 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = ENL
					}
				}
				3381 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY

						is_core = ENL
					}
				}
				2275 = {
					OR = {

				}
				3596 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = ENL
					}
				}
			}
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = USA_VNZ_treaty
			create_alliance = USA
			relation = {
				who = USA
				value = 400
			}
			USA = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = THIS
					value = 400
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	VNZ_treaty_of_caracas = {
		picture = treaty_signing
		potential = {
			has_global_flag = ENG_extend_schomburgk
			has_global_flag = ENG_VNZ_problem
			#is_greater_power = no
			OR = {
				primary_culture = north_andean
				primary_culture = llanero
			}
			OR = {
				2243 = { #Pomaron
					owner = {
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								primary_culture = north_andean
								primary_culture = llanero
							}
						}
						war_with = THIS
					}
				}
				3373 = { #Rupununi
					owner = {
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								primary_culture = north_andean
								primary_culture = llanero
							}
						}
						war_with = THIS
					}
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			war = yes
			2243 = { #Pomaron
				OR = {
					controlled_by = THIS
					controller = { alliance_with = THIS }
				}
				province_control_days = 185
			}
			3373 = { #Rupununi
				OR = {
					controlled_by = THIS
					controller = { alliance_with = THIS }
				}
				province_control_days = 185
			}
			
			2239 = { #Georgetown
				OR = {
					controlled_by = THIS
					controller = { alliance_with = THIS }
				}
				province_control_days = 185
			}
			1979 = { #Biloka
				OR = {
					controlled_by = THIS
					controller = { alliance_with = THIS }
				}
				province_control_days = 185
			}
			
			2264 = { #Caracas
				owner = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = north_andean
						primary_culture = llanero
					}
					any_core = {
						OR = {
							region = ENG_1979 #Guyana
							region = VNZ_2278 #Guayana
						}
						NOT = {
							owned_by = BRZ
							owned_by = CLM
						}
						OR = {
							controlled_by = THIS
							controller = { alliance_with = THIS }
							owner = {
								NOT = { war_with = THIS }
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = VNZ_treaty_of_caracas
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						owns = 2243
						owns = 3373
					}
					war_with = THIS
				}
				country_event = 1999998079
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

			war = no

				owner = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = north_andean
						primary_culture = llanero
					}
					owns = 2242 #Esequibo
					owns = 3381 #Barima
					owns = 2275 #Guasipati
					owns = 3596 #Gran Sabana
					vassal_of = THIS
					in_sphere = THIS
				}
			}
			OR = {
				2242 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = ENL
					}
				}
				3381 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY
						is_core = ENG
						is_core = ENL
					}
				}
				2275 = {
					OR = {
						is_core = GUY
						is_core = ENG

create_the_golden_circle = {
		#picture = the_golden_circle
		potential = {
			tag = CSA
			exists = MXM
			NOT = { exists = MEX }
			slavery = yes_slavery
			}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_greater_power = yes
			prestige = 75
			has_unclaimed_cores = no 
			invention = national_fraternity
			money = 1000000
			MXM = {
				all_core = {
					OR = {
						owned_by = THIS
						owner = { in_sphere = THIS }
						}
					}
				}
			}
	
		effect = {
			CSA = { all_core = { add_core = KGC } }
			MXM = { all_core = { add_core = KGC } }
			change_tag = KGC
			KGC = { 
				inherit = CSA 
				inherit = MXM 
				badboy = 5
				prestige = 25
				relation = {
					who = USA
					value = -100
					}
				relation = {
					who = FRA
					value = -100
					}
				add_accepted_culture = mexican
				add_accepted_culture = norteno
				add_accepted_culture = yucateco
				add_accepted_culture = spanish #To Be replaced with criollo
				}
			}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
		
	}

gain_conservative_mexico_generals = {
	potential = {
		OR = { 
			tag = MXM
			tag = M3X
			}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = gain_conservative_generals }
		}
	
	allow = {
		war_with = MEX
		}
	
	effect = {
		define_general = {
			name = "Tomás Mejía"
			personality = confident
			background = cavalry_school
			}
		define_general = {
			name = "Miguel Miramón"
			personality = disciplined
			background = war_college
			}
		define_general = {
			name = "Leonardo Márquez"
			personality = vicious
			background = natural_born_leader
			}
		set_country_flag = gain_conservative_generals
		}
	
	ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

encourage_immigration_to_habsburg_mexico = {
	potential = {
		tag = MXM
		NOT = { exists = MEX exists = M3X }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = encouraged_immigration }
		}
	
	allow = {
		war = no
		NOT = { war_exhaustion = 25 }
		NOT = { unemployment = 0.25 } #0.1/10% was too low
		#citizenship_policy = full_citizenship
		border_policy = open_borders
		money = 100000
		}
		
	effect = {
		treasury = -100000
		add_country_modifier = {
			name = land_of_opportunity
			duration = 1095
			}
		set_country_flag = encouraged_immigration
		}
	
	ai_will_do = {
		factor = 1
		}
	
	}

#Hawaii claims midway (1854 Pearl and Hermes Atoll) and Johnston Atoll (1858).

	RUS_hawaiians_2_kamchatka = {
		picture = hawaii_map
		potential = {
			is_culture_group = east_slavic
			has_country_flag = RUS_colony_russoification
			has_country_flag = RUS_alaska_assimilation
			is_vassal = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = RUS_hawaiians_2_kamchatka }
		}
		allow = {
			war = no
			any_owned_province = {
				is_core = LSK
				NOT = { has_province_modifier = russoification }
			}
			money = 50001
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = RUS_hawaiians_2_kamchatka
			treasury = -50000
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 658 } #Hawaii
					is_culture_group = oceanic
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.75
				move_pop = 1075 #Petropavlovsk
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 3305 } #Maui
					is_culture_group = oceanic
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.75
				move_pop = 2633 #Ossora
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { province_id = 3306 } #Maui
					is_culture_group = oceanic
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.75
				move_pop = 2663 #Kamenskoye
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						OR = {
							region = HAW_658
							region = HAW_2524
							province_id = 3351
						}
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								province_id = 1075
								province_id = 2633
								province_id = 2663
							}
						}
					}
					is_culture_group = oceanic
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.75
				move_pop = 2616 #Tilichiki
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					is_culture_group = oceanic
				}
				militancy = 5
				consciousness = 5
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	# Missionary schools for Hawaii
	missionary_schools = {
			picture = hawaii_map
			potential = {
				tag = HAW
				civilized = no
				NOT = {	has_country_flag = missionary_schools }
			}
			allow = {
				year = 1840
			}
			effect = {
				set_country_flag = missionary_schools
				years_of_research = 1
				any_pop = { consciousness = 1 }
				economic_reform = yes_education_reform
				#economic_reform = yes_research_reform
							
				any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = clergymen }
					militancy = -3
					consciousness = -3
					reduce_pop = 1.75
				}
				
				add_country_modifier = {
					name = hawaii_missionary_schools
					duration = -1
				}
			}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	# A constitution for Hawaii
	hawaii_constitution = {
			picture = hawaii_map
			potential = {
				tag = HAW
				civilized = no
				NOT = {	has_country_flag = hawaii_constitution }
			}
			allow = {
				year = 1839
			}
			effect = {
				set_country_flag = hawaii_constitution
				economic_reform = yes_admin_reform
				government = hms_government
			}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	# Alien land ownership act
	hawaii_alien_ownership_act = {
			picture = hawaii_map
			potential = {
				tag = HAW
				civilized = no
				NOT = {	has_country_flag = hawaii_alien_ownership_act }
			}
			allow = {
				year = 1850
			}
			effect = {
				set_country_flag = hawaii_alien_ownership_act
				economic_reform = yes_land_reform
				3301 = { trade_goods = coffee }
						
				any_pop = { limit = { pop_type = aristocrats }
					militancy = -3
					consciousness = -3
					reduce_pop = 1.5
				}
				
				add_country_modifier = {
					name = hawaii_land_ownership
					duration = -1
				}
			}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	# Paniolos
	hawaii_cowboys = {
			picture = hawaii_map
			potential = {
				tag = HAW
				NOT = {	has_country_flag = hawaii_cowboys }
			}
			allow = {
				year = 1837
				OR = {
					ai = yes
					AND = {
						ai = no
						relation = {
							who = MEX
							value = 75
						}
					}
				}
			}
			effect = {
				set_country_flag = hawaii_cowboys
				658 = {
					trade_goods = cattle
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = hawaii_paniolos
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	
	RUS_rename_hawaii = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				is_culture_group = east_slavic
				primary_culture = alaskan
			}
			owns = 658
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_rename_hawaii }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = RUS_rename_hawaii
			clr_global_flag = normal_rename_hawaii
			clr_global_flag = HAW_rename_hawaii
			658 = {
				change_province_name = "Gavayi" 
				state_scope = {
					change_region_name = "Gavayskiye Ostrova"
				}
			}  
			3306 = { change_province_name = "Atuvayi" }
			3305 = { change_province_name = "Oakhu" }
			2623 = { change_province_name = "Polputi" }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	normal_rename_hawaii = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					primary_culture = alaskan
					is_culture_group = oceanic
				}
			}
			owns = 658
			NOT = { has_global_flag = normal_rename_hawaii }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = normal_rename_hawaii
			clr_global_flag = RUS_rename_hawaii
			clr_global_flag = HAW_rename_hawaii
			658 = {
				change_province_name = "Hawaii" 
				state_scope = {
					change_region_name = "Hawaiian Islands"
				}
			}  
			3306 = { change_province_name = "Kauai" }
			3305 = { change_province_name = "Oahu" }
			2623 = { change_province_name = "Midway Atoll" }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	RUS_rename_central_pacific = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				is_culture_group = east_slavic
				primary_culture = alaskan
			}
			owns = 2526
			NOT = { has_global_flag = RUS_rename_central_pacific }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = RUS_rename_central_pacific
			clr_global_flag = normal_rename_central_pacific
			clr_global_flag = HAW_rename_central_pacific
			2526 = {
				change_province_name = "Sever'nyye Laynskiye Ostrova" 
				state_scope = {
					change_region_name = "Tsentral'nyye Polineziyskiye Sporady"
				}
			}
			2524 = { change_province_name = "Ueyk" }
			3352 = { change_province_name = "Sheffer Atol" }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	younghusband_expedition = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			tag = ENG
			neighbour = TIB
			has_global_flag = 1st_bhutan_civil_war_end
			NOT = { has_global_flag = younghusband_expedition }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			year = 9999
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = younghusband_expedition
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = QNG
						tag = TIB
					}
				}
				country_event = 1
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	ENG_calcutta_convention = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			tag = ENG
			SIK = { ai = yes }
			has_global_flag = 1st_ENG_TIB_war
			NOT = { has_global_flag = ENG_calcutta_convention }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = TIB_calcutta_convention }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = signed_calcutta_convention_TIB }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SIK_ENG_defeated }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = ENG_calcutta_convention
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENG
						tag = EIC
					}
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = SIK
					}
					remove_core = SIK
				}
			}
			relation = { who = BHU value = 400 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = BHU value = 400 }
			TIB = {
				country_event = 777777104
			}
			QNG = {
				country_event = 777777104
			}
			SIK = {
				country_event = 777777105
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	TIB_calcutta_convention = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			tag = TIB
			OR = {
				war_with = ENG
				war_with = EIC
			}
			SIK = { ai = yes }
			has_global_flag = 1st_ENG_TIB_war
			NOT = { has_global_flag = ENG_calcutta_convention }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = TIB_calcutta_convention }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = signed_calcutta_convention_TIB }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = SIK_ENG_defeated }
		}
		
		allow = {
			1251 = {
				OR = {
					controlled_by = BHU
					controller = { alliance_with = BHU }
				}
				province_control_days = 40
			}
			NOT = {
				SIK = {
					any_owned_province = {
						is_core = SIK
						OR = {
							controlled_by = ENG
							controller = { alliance_with = ENG }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {		
			set_global_flag = TIB_calcutta_convention
			country_event = 777777100
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	ENG_treaty_sinchula = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			tag = ENG
			has_global_flag = duars_war
			NOT = { has_global_flag = ENG_treaty_sinchula }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = BHU_treaty_sinchula }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			money = 50001
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = ENG_treaty_sinchula
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = ENG
						tag = EIC
					}
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						is_core = BHU
					}
					remove_core = BHU
				}
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = EIC
					OR = {
						substate_of = ENG
						vassal_of = ENG
					}
				}
				ENG = {
					any_owned = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								province_id = 3502
								province_id = 3503
								province_id = 3552
							}
						}
						secede_province = EIC
					}
				}
				BHU = {
					any_owned = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								province_id = 3502
								province_id = 3503
								province_id = 3552
							}
						}
						secede_province = EIC
					}
				}
			}
			treasury = -50000
			relation = { who = BHU value = 400 }
			BHU = {
				country_event = 777777074
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	bhutanese_raid_sepoy = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			tag = BHU
			has_global_flag = sepoy_rebellion
			NOT = { has_country_flag = bhutanese_raid_sepoy }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			OR = {
				ENG = { war = yes }
				EIC = { war = yes }
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = bhutanese_raid_sepoy
			prestige = 5
			random_list = {
				20 = {
					treasury = 40000
					regular_clothes = 300
					canned_food = 200
					ammunition = 200
					small_arms = 100
					artillery = 50
					explosives = 50
					wine = 200
					liquor = 200
				}
				30 = {
					treasury = 20000
					regular_clothes = 200
					canned_food = 100
					ammunition = 100
					small_arms = 75
					artillery = 35
					explosives = 35
					wine = 100
					liquor = 100
				}
				50 = {
					treasury = 10000
					regular_clothes = 100
					canned_food = 75
					ammunition = 75
					small_arms = 50
					artillery = 25
					explosives = 25
					wine = 75
					liquor = 75
				}
			}

		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {

				}
				AND = {
					OR = { primary_culture = east_tibetan primary_culture = west_tibetan primary_culture = south_tibetan primary_culture = himalayan_minor }
					owns = 3531 NOT = { has_global_flag = bhodic_rename_purang }
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = indo_iranian
						is_culture_group = south_asian
					}
					owns = 3531 NOT = { has_global_flag = aryan_rename_purang }
				}
			}
		}

			war = no
		}

				limit = {
					province_id = 3531
					owner = {
						OR = {
							primary_culture = beifaren
							primary_culture = nanfaren
							primary_culture = hanhui
							primary_culture = manchu
						}
					}
				}
				3531 = { change_province_name = "Bulan" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = sinic_rename_purang
					clr_global_flag = bhodic_rename_purang
					clr_global_flag = aryan_rename_purang 
				}
			}
			
			###bhodic###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3531
					owner = {
						OR = { primary_culture = east_tibetan primary_culture = west_tibetan primary_culture = south_tibetan primary_culture = himalayan_minor }
					}
				}
				3531 = { change_province_name = "purang" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = bhodic_rename_purang
					clr_global_flag = sinic_rename_purang
					clr_global_flag = aryan_rename_purang 
				}
			}
			
			###aryan###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3531
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = indo_iranian
							is_culture_group = south_asian
						}
					}
				}
				3531 = { change_province_name = "Taklakot" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = aryan_rename_purang
					clr_global_flag = bhodic_rename_purang
					clr_global_flag = sinic_rename_purang
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	rename_dzungaria = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_asian
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owns = 1600 NOT = { has_global_flag = sinic_rename_urumqi }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 1595 NOT = { has_global_flag = sinic_rename_yining }
						}
						AND = {

						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = { is_culture_group = turanian primary_culture = mongol }
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owns = 1600 NOT = { has_global_flag = turanian_rename_urumqi }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 1595 NOT = { has_global_flag = turanian_rename_yining }

						}
						AND = {
							owns = 3583 NOT = { has_global_flag = turanian_rename_turpan }
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					NOT = { OR = { is_culture_group = turanian is_culture_group = east_asian is_culture_group = east_slavic } }
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owns = 1600 NOT = { has_global_flag = normal_rename_urumqi }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 1595 NOT = { has_global_flag = normal_rename_yining }
						}

						}

							owns = 3581 NOT = { has_global_flag = normal_rename_tacheng }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 3583 NOT = { has_global_flag = normal_rename_turpan }
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owns = 1595 NOT = { has_global_flag = russian_rename_yining }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 3580 NOT = { has_global_flag = russian_rename_alashankou }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 3581 NOT = { has_global_flag = russian_rename_tacheng }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

	rename_tarim = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = beifaren
						primary_culture = nanfaren
						primary_culture = hanhui
						primary_culture = manchu
					}
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owns = 1594 NOT = { has_global_flag = sinic_rename_tarim }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 3583 NOT = { has_global_flag = sinic_rename_turpan }
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = { primary_culture = east_tibetan primary_culture = west_tibetan primary_culture = south_tibetan primary_culture = himalayan_minor }
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owns = 1594 NOT = { has_global_flag = bhodic_rename_tarim }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 3583 NOT = { has_global_flag = bhodic_rename_turpan }
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = mongol
						primary_culture = uighur
						primary_culture = turkic_minor
					}
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owns = 1594 NOT = { has_global_flag = mongolic_rename_tarim }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 3583 NOT = { has_global_flag = mongolic_rename_turpan }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

			war = no
		}

			###sinic###

	#FRA takes over clipperton, clipperton fiasco
	#Clipperton conflict (FRA vs MEX), part 1: MEX claimed on its first constitution, earliest activity on the island dates to 1847~1849 by guano miners (annexed to MEX)
	#Clipperton conflict (FRA vs MEX), part 2: France lays claim in 1858 (Core to FRA) after not recognizing the mexican constitution of 1857 which led to the 2nd french intervetion in 1863
	#Clipperton conflict (FRA vs USA vs MEX), part 3: 1856 Guano Act comes into place, USA lays a claim on the island. (whenever USA owns Hawaii)
	#Clipperton conflict (FRA vs MEX), part 4: 1898 Americans abandon the claim, things aren't settled between FRA and MEX yet
	#Clipperton conflict (FRA vs MEX), part 5: 1906 MEX offers a guano mining concession to ENG and develops the island (Raise life rating, add migration & production bonus.)
	#Clipperton conflict (FRA vs MEX), part 6: in 1930 FRA asks PAP for mediation on the issue, PAP designates ITA's king, who arbitrates in favor of FRA (However, this decision will be weighted by several factors as not to railroad.)

			}
			tag = TUR
			exists = ANZ
			ANZ = {
				#civilized = no
				ai = yes
			}
			#has_recently_lost_war = no
			has_country_flag = abolish_anizzah
		}
		
		allow = {
			ANZ = {
				OR = {
					in_sphere = TUR
					vassal_of = TUR
					substate_of = TUR
				}
			}
			owns = 1151
		}
		
		effect = {
			inherit = ANZ
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = ANZ
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = nationalist_agitation
					duration = 3650
				}
				add_core = THIS
			}
			set_country_flag = abolish_anizzah
		}
	}

		picture = gtfo

			}

	the_great_churka_cleansing_bulgaria = {
		picture = circassia_flag
		potential = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = the_great_churka_cleansing_bulgaria }
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = orthodox_country
				has_country_flag = coptic_country
				has_country_flag = catholic_country
				has_country_flag = nestorian_country
				has_country_flag = syriac_country
				has_country_flag = maronite_country
			}
			has_global_flag = crimea_has_happened
			TUR = {
				has_country_flag = anticircassian_sentiment
			}
			OR = {
				809 = {
					OR = {
						controlled_by = THIS 
						owned_by = THIS
					}
				}
				814 = {
					OR = {
						controlled_by = THIS 
						owned_by = THIS
					}
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			809 = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						controlled_by = THIS 
						province_control_days = 60
					}
					owned_by = THIS
				}
			}
			814 = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						controlled_by = THIS 
						province_control_days = 60
					}
					owned_by = THIS
				}
			}
		}
		effect = {
			TUR = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						culture = circassian
						location = {
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_core = BUL
									NOT = { region = TUR_806 }
								}
								province_id = 858
							}
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						25 = { reduce_pop = 0.015 }
						25 = { reduce_pop = 0.025 }
						25 = { reduce_pop = 0.035 }
						25 = { reduce_pop = 0.045 }
					}
				}
				any_pop = {
					limit = {
						has_pop_religion = sunni
						culture = circassian
						location = {
							is_core = TUR
							NOT = { continent = europe }
						}
					}
					random_list = {
						25 = { reduce_pop = 1.050 }
						25 = { reduce_pop = 1.075 }
						25 = { reduce_pop = 1.100 }
						25 = { reduce_pop = 1.125 }
					}
				}
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						has_province_modifier = anti_circassian_sentiment
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_core = BUL
								NOT = { region = TUR_806 }
							}
							province_id = 858
						}
					}
					remove_province_modifier = anti_circassian_sentiment
				}
				country_event = { id = 999999018 days = 1 } #notification for TUR
			}
			
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = circassian
					location = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_core = BUL
								NOT = { region = TUR_806 }
							}
							province_id = 858
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = {
					25 = { reduce_pop = 0.015 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 0.025 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 0.035 }
					25 = { reduce_pop = 0.045 }
				}
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = anti_circassian_sentiment
					OR = {
						AND = {
							is_core = BUL
							NOT = { region = TUR_806 }
						}
						province_id = 858
					}
				}
				remove_province_modifier = anti_circassian_sentiment
			}
				
			badboy = 0.25
			prestige = 1
			set_global_flag = the_great_churka_cleansing_bulgaria
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}

	found_fianarantsoa = {
		picture = "gtfo"
		potential = {
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = fiaranantsoa_founded
			}
			OR = {
				civilized = yes
				AND = {
					ai = no
					civilization_progress = 0.25
				}
				AND = {
					ai = yes
					year = 1845
				}
			}
			owns = 2116 #Fianarantsoa
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			money = 30000
		}
	
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = fiaranantsoa_founded
			treasury = -30000
			2116 = {
				add_province_modifier = { name = city_good_education duration = 2920 }
				change_province_name = "Fiaranantsoa"
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						tag = MAD
						civilized = no
					}
				}
				owner = { years_of_research = 0.5 }
			}
			
			#education reform
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = { 
						education_reform = no_education_reform
						civilized = no
					} 
				}
				owner = {
					economic_reform = yes_education_reform 		
					plurality = 5
					
					any_pop = {
						scaled_militancy = {
							ideology = liberal
							factor = 0.25
						}
						scaled_militancy = {
							ideology = conservative
							factor = 0.5
						}
						scaled_militancy = {
							ideology = reactionary
							factor = 1.5
						}
					}
					research_points = -1000
				}
			}
			
			#research reform
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = { 
						research_reform = no_research_reform
						civilized = no
					} 
				}
				owner = {
					economic_reform = yes_research_reform		
					activate_technology = malthusian_thought
					activate_technology = late_enlightenment_philosophy
					
					any_pop = {
						scaled_militancy = {
							ideology = liberal
							factor = 0.25
						}
						scaled_militancy = {
							ideology = conservative
							factor = 0.5
						}
						scaled_militancy = {
							ideology = reactionary
							factor = 1.5
						}
					}
					research_points = -1000
				}
			}
			
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

					}

						substate_of = THIS
					}
				}
			}
		}

					civilization_progress = 0.25
					ai = no
				}
				AND = {
					year = 1840
					ai = yes
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = integrate_substates_madagascar
			prestige = 5
			years_of_research = 0.05
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = M1D
						tag = M2D
						tag = M3D
						tag = M4D
						tag = M5D
					}
					OR = {
						vassal_of = THIS
						substate_of = THIS
					}
					primary_culture = malagasy
					ai = yes
				}
				overlord = {
					inherit = M1D
					inherit = M2D
					inherit = M3D
					inherit = M4D
					inherit = M5D
				}
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						vassal_of = THIS
						substate_of = THIS
					}
					primary_culture = malagasy
				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

				limit = {
					province_id = 3675
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = southern_african
							NOT = {
								OR = {
									is_culture_group = germanic
									is_culture_group = french
									is_culture_group = hungarian_culture_group
									is_culture_group = czecho_slovak_culture_group

		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = germanic
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 2124 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_mayotte } }
						AND = { owns = 3680 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_anjouan } }
						AND = { owns = 3679 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_moheli } }
						AND = { owns = 2123 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_moroni } }
						AND = { owns = 3681 NOT = { has_global_flag = german_renamed_ntsudjini } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = french
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 2124 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_mayotte } }
						AND = { owns = 3680 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_anjouan } }

					}
				}
				AND = {

						primary_culture = boer
					}
					OR = {
						AND = { owns = 2124 NOT = { has_global_flag = dutch_renamed_mayotte } }

						AND = { owns = 3680 NOT = { has_global_flag = normal_renamed_anjouan } }

}political_decisions = {
	
	make_santanna_dictator = {
		picture = santa_anna
		potential = {
			tag = MEX
			NOT = { year = 1876 }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = santa_anna_dictatorship }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = ayutla_revolution }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = santa_anna_emperor }
		}
		
		allow = {
			OR = {
				ruling_party_ideology = conservative
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = santa_anna_dictatorship
			war_exhaustion = -30
			government = presidential_dictatorship
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			nationalvalue = nv_autocracy
			political_reform = totalitarianism
			political_reform = mandatory_service
			political_reform = party_appointed
			political_reform = none_voting
			political_reform = underground_parties
			political_reform = no_meeting
			political_reform = state_press
			political_reform = no_trade_unions
			political_reform = first_past_the_post
			define_general = {
				name = "Antonio López de Santa Anna"
				personality = au_fait
				background = natural_born_leader
				prestige = 0.5
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = global_liberal_agitation
				duration = -1
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					type = soldiers
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.75
			}
			plurality = 5
			any_pop = {
				scaled_militancy = {
					ideology = liberal
					factor = 6
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					ideology = liberal
					factor = 6
				}
				scaled_militancy = {
					ideology = anarcho_liberal
					factor = 6
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					ideology = anarcho_liberal
					factor = 6
				}
				scaled_militancy = {
					ideology = communist
					factor = 6
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					ideology = communist
					factor = 6
				}
				scaled_militancy = {
					ideology = socialist
					factor = 6
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					ideology = socialist
					factor = 6
				}
				
				scaled_militancy = {
					ideology = conservative
					factor = -6
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					ideology = conservative
					factor = -6
				}
				scaled_militancy = {
					ideology = reactionary
					factor = -6
				}
				scaled_consciousness = {
					ideology = reactionary
					factor = -6
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
	}
	
	make_santanna_emperor = {
		picture = santa_anna
		potential = {
			tag = MEX
			NOT = { year = 1876 }
			has_global_flag = santa_anna_dictatorship
			has_global_flag = ayutla_revolution_continues

		}

			country_event = 1220016

	}
	
	integrate_USCA = {
		picture = form_USCA
		potential = {
			primary_culture = mexican
			NOT = { has_global_flag = integrate_USCA }
			UCA = {
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			is_greater_power = yes
			UCA = {
				in_sphere = THIS
				relation = {
					who = THIS
					value = 200
				}
				ai = yes
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = UCA
				value = 200
			}
			prestige = 100
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = integrate_USCA
			prestige = 30
			UCA = {
				all_core = { add_core = THIS }
			}
			inherit = UCA
			add_accepted_culture = central_american
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	USA_blockade_YUC = {
		potential = {
			tag = USA
			has_global_flag = mexican_american_war
			war_with = MEX
			YUC = {
				exists = yes

}political_decisions = {

#####################################################	

	#Puna de Atacama dispute:
	#argentina claims Tarija and Yavi after war of the pacific
	#1889 secret treaty (Quirno Costa-Vaca GuzmÃ¡n Treaty) between argentina and bolivia, bolivia gives puna de atacama (owned by CHL) to ARG in exchange of tarija and yavi
	#######nah, fucks things up########Matta-Reyes Protocol of 1891 formally recognizes the puna as chilean in exchange of shekels
	#1895 Barros BorgoÃ±o-GutiÃ©rrez Treaty, chile would cede tacna and arica to BOL in exchange of abandoning puna
	#1896 Rocha-Cano Protocol, ARG reaffirms its ownership of Puna and BOL abandons claims (if they didn't accept Tacna and Arica)
	#1898 Buchanan Arbitration: argentina and chile sign accords to delimitate their claims on puna, and upon being unable to reach concensus, USA (or new world GP) would decide
	#1898 ALTERNATE (if BOL refuses to let Puna go): Bolivia, argentina and chile sign accords to delimitate their claims on puna, and upon being unable to reach concensus, USA (or new world GP) would decide
	
	altbuchanan_arbitration = {
		picture = chile_bolivia_peru_borders
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = CHL
				AND = {
					tag = LPL
					owns = 2310
				}
				tag = BOL
				tag = PBC
			}
			LPL = {
				OR = {
					exists = no
					AND = {
						exists = yes
						OR = {
							is_vassal = no
							NOT = { vassal_of = THIS }
						}
						owns = 2368 #Salta
						owns = 2310 #La Paz
					}
				}
			}
			any_core = {
				region = BOL_2370 #Puna de Atacama
			}
			2310 = { #La Paz
				owner = {
					OR = {
						primary_culture = south_andean
						tag = LPL
					}
					NOT = {
						has_country_flag = costa_guzman_accept
						has_country_flag = barros_gutierrez_accept
						has_country_flag = rocha_cano_accept
					}
				}
			}
			has_global_flag = war_of_the_pacific
			NOT = { has_global_flag = buchanan_arbitration }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = altbuchanan_arbitration }
			year = 1898
		}

			war = no
			NOT = {
				OR = {
					truce_with = CHL

			}

				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
				war_policy = jingoism
			}
			mass_politics = 1
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = vassalize_acre_BRZ
			create_vassal = ACE
			create_alliance = ACE
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	integrate_acre_BRZ = {
		potential = {
			primary_culture = brazilian
			owns = 2402 #Manaus

				name = beaver_coins

			}
			
		}

		}
	}

			is_greater_power = yes

				owns = 1039
			}
		}
		allow = {
			invention = machine_tools

			iron_steamers = 1

			random_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = THIS }
					owns = 1039
				}
				country_event = 1000073
			}
			
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						owns = 1039
						is_greater_power = yes
					}
				}
				owner = {
					country_event = 36978
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war = yes
			}
		}
	}

			OR = {
				is_culture_group = latin_american_cultures
				is_culture_group = iberian

		}

		}

	reform_ATC_outside = {
		picture = form_antillean_confederation
		potential = {
			is_greater_power = yes

					}

								OR = {
									in_sphere = THIS
									vassal_of = THIS
								}
								war = no
								is_greater_power = no
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

			prestige = 10
			set_global_flag = reform_ATC_outside
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					owns = 2209
					owns = 3276
					owns = 2210
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				2209 = { secede_province = THIS }
				3276 = { secede_province = THIS }
				2210 = { secede_province = THIS }

					owns = 2211

					owns = 44
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				2211 = { secede_province = THIS }
				2212 = { secede_province = THIS }
				44 = { secede_province = THIS }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					owns = 2222
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				2222 = { secede_province = THIS }
			}
			any_country = {

					owns = 2216
					owns = 2214
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				2216 = { secede_province = THIS }
				2214 = { secede_province = THIS }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = CUB
						tag = DOM
						tag = PRI
					}
					NOT = { tag = THIS }
					OR = {
						in_sphere = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
					}
				}
				annex_to = THIS
			}
			CUB = { all_core = { add_core = ATC } }
			DOM = { all_core = { add_core = ATC } }
			PRI = { all_core = { add_core = ATC } }
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = ATC
					is_core = THIS
				}
				remove_core = ATC
			}
			release_vassal = ATC
			create_alliance = ATC
			create_vassal = ATC

				who = ATC
				value = 100
			}
			diplomatic_influence = {
				who = ATC
				value = 200
			}

			}

	negate_partition = {
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = PLC
				tag = PRC
				tag = PLR
				tag = PRB
			}
			OR = {
				any_owned_province = { is_core = RUS }
				any_owned_province = { is_core = KUK }
				any_owned_province = { is_core = AUS }
				any_owned_province = { is_core = GER }
				any_owned_province = { is_core = NGF }
				any_owned_province = { is_core = PRU }
				any_owned_province = { is_core = SGF }
				any_owned_province = { is_core = GCF }
				any_owned_province = { is_core = BDB }
			}
			THIS = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
			has_country_flag = konigsberg_edict
			has_country_flag = masurian_plan
			has_country_flag = tilsit_act
			has_country_flag = claim_pomerania
			has_country_flag = claimed_claim_silesia
			NOT = { has_country_flag = negate_partition }
		}
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_greater_power = yes
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = negate_partition
			prestige = 25
			badboy = 10
			THIS = {
				all_core = {
					remove_core = RUS
					remove_core = KUK
					remove_core = AUS
					remove_core = GER
					remove_core = NGF
					remove_core = PRU
					remove_core = SGF
					remove_core = GCF
					remove_core = BDB
				}
			}
			PRD = {
				all_core = {
					remove_core = RUS
					remove_core = KUK
					remove_core = AUS
					remove_core = GER
					remove_core = NGF
					remove_core = PRU
					remove_core = SGF
					remove_core = GCF
					remove_core = BDB
					add_core = THIS
				}
			}
			THIS = { all_core = { remove_core = PZN remove_core = PML remove_core = GLM remove_core = CPL remove_core = KRA remove_core = PNC } }
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = RUS
						tag = KUK
						tag = AUS
						tag = GER
						tag = NGF
						tag = PRU
						tag = SGF
						tag = GCF
						tag = BDB
					}
				}
				relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	january_uprising_decision = {
		picture = january_uprising_decision
		potential = {
			tag = CPL
			OR = {
				ai = no
				KRA = { ai = no }
				PZN = { ai = no }
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = january_uprising_happened }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = january_uprising_decision }
			OR = {
				year = 1860
				has_global_flag = treaty_of_paris_1856
				has_global_flag = treaty_of_paris_russia
				AND = {
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = krakow_uprising
						has_global_flag = krakow_succeeded
						has_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising
						has_global_flag = greater_poland_succeeded
					}
					OR = {
						KRA = { exists = yes }
						PZN = { exists = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			owns = 706
			706 = {
				owner = {
					OR = {
						vassal_of = RUS
						substate_of = RUS
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				RUS = {
					OR = {
						war_exhaustion = 40
						AND = {
							has_recently_lost_war = yes	
							any_owned_province = {
								pop_majority_culture = polish
								OR = {
									average_militancy = 2
									average_consciousness = 4
								}
							}
						}
						has_country_flag = crimean_war
						any_owned_province = {
							OR = {
								pop_majority_culture = polish
								pop_majority_culture = lithuanian
							}
							OR = {
								average_militancy = 4
								average_consciousness = 7 
							}
						}
					}
				}
				KRA = {
					has_global_flag = krakow_uprising
					OR = {
						war_with = GER
						war_with = GCF
						war_with = AUS
						war_with = KUK
						war_with = SGF
						has_global_flag = krakow_succeeded
					}
				}
				PZN = {
					has_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising
					OR = {
						war_with = PRU
						war_with = NGF
						war_with = GER
						war_with = GCF
						has_global_flag = greater_poland_succeeded
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = january_uprising_decision
			RUS = {
				country_event = 500001
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	krakow_uprising_decision = {
		picture = january_uprising_decision
		potential = {
			tag = KRA
			OR = {
				ai = no
				CPL = { ai = no }
				PZN = { ai = no }
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = krakow_uprising }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = krakow_uprising_decision }
			OR = {
				AND = {
					year = 1846
					month = 2
				}
				AND = {
					OR = {
						has_global_flag = january_uprising_happened
						has_global_flag = through_january_uprising
						has_global_flag = january_uprising_succeeded
						has_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising
						has_global_flag = greater_poland_succeeded
					}
					OR = {
						CPL = { exists = yes }
						PZN = { exists = yes }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			owns = 703
			OR = {
				AND = {
					year = 1846
					month = 2
				}
				CPL = {
					has_global_flag = january_uprising_happened
					OR = {
						war_with = RUS
						has_global_flag = january_uprising_succeeded
					}
				}
				PZN = {
					has_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising
					OR = {
						war_with = PRU
						war_with = NGF
						war_with = GER
						war_with = GCF
						has_global_flag = greater_poland_succeeded
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = krakow_uprising_decision
			set_global_flag = krakow_uprising
			set_country_flag = _total_war_flag
			prestige = 25
		
			government = provisional_government
			ruling_party_ideology = liberal
			nationalvalue = nv_liberty
			political_reform = none_voting
			political_reform = harassment
			political_reform = appointed
			political_reform = state_controlled
			political_reform = free_press
			political_reform = yes_meeting
			
			define_general = {
				name = "Edward Dembowski"
				personality = resolute
				background = nationalist
			}
			
			any_pop = { limit = { is_culture_group = polish_culture_group } militancy = -4 consciousness = -4 }
			
			add_country_modifier = { name = polish_uprising_mobilization duration = 2920 }
			
			AUS = {
				release_vassal = KRA
				relation = { who = KRA value = -400 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = KRA value = -400 }
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = polish } militancy = 2 consciousness = 4 } 
			}
			RUS = {
				relation = { who = KRA value = -300 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = KRA value = -300 }
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = polish } militancy = 3 consciousness = 5 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
				exists = yes
					OR = {
						tag = PRU
						tag = NGF
						tag = GER
						tag = GCF
					}
					owns = 549
				}
				relation = { who = KRA value = -300 }
				diplomatic_influence = { who = KRA value = -300 }
			}
			neutrality = yes
			AUS = {
				country_event = 600054
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

	#Polish Uprising - Foreign Intervention
	polish_foreign_intervention = {
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = {
						tag = KRA
						tag = PZN
						tag = CPL
					}
					CPL = { ai = yes }
					KRA = { ai = yes }
					PZN = { ai = yes }
				}
				tag = PNC
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = CPL
					exists = KRA
					exists = PZN
					NOT = { exists = PNC }
				}
				AND = {
					exists = PNC
					NOT = {
						exists = CPL
						exists = KRA
						exists = PZN
					}
				}
			}
			OR = {
				has_global_flag = january_uprising_happened
				has_global_flag = krakow_uprising
				has_global_flag = greater_poland_uprising
				has_global_flag = form_PNC
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = polish_foreign_intervention
				year = 1860
				has_global_flag = treaty_of_paris_1856
				has_global_flag = treaty_of_paris_russia
			}
		}
		allow = {
			OR = {
				war_with = PRU
				war_with = NGF
				war_with = GER
				war_with = GCF
				war_with = AUS
				war_with = KUK
				war_with = SGF
				war_with = RUS
			}
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = polish_foreign_intervention
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_greater_power = yes
					capital_scope = { continent = europe }
					NOT = {
						tag = TUR
						OR = {
							war_with = THIS
							war_with = KRA
							war_with = PZN
							war_with = CPL
							war_with = PNC
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = 666666008 days = 5 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	#January Uprising - Foreign Intervention
	polish_foreign_intervention2 = {
		potential = {
			tag = CPL
			has_global_flag = january_uprising_happened
			year = 1860
			NOT = { has_country_flag = polish_foreign_intervention }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = polish_foreign_intervention2 }
		}
		allow = {
			war_with = RUS
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = polish_foreign_intervention2
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_greater_power = yes
					capital_scope = { continent = europe }
					NOT = {
						tag = TUR
						OR = {
							war_with = THIS
							war_with = KRA
							war_with = PZN
							war_with = CPL
							war_with = PNC
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = 500002 days = 5 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	become_HABSBURG_poland = {
		picture = HABSBURG_polonia
		potential = {
			primary_culture = polish
			NOT = { exists = POL }
			NOT = { exists = HPL }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = paris_congress_to_be_held }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = GLM_convention }
			has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
			NOT = { tag = PLC }
		}

		allow = {
			OR = {
				prestige = 45
				is_secondary_power = yes
				AND = {
					tag = PNC
					KRA = { exists = no }
					PZN = { exists = no }
					PML = { exists = no }
				}
				AND = {
					tag = CPL
					exists = KRA KRA = { is_vassal = no }
					exists = PZN PZN = { is_vassal = no }
					exists = PML PML = { is_vassal = no }
				}
				AND = { 
					tag = CPL 
					year = 1900
				}
			}
			war = no
			is_vassal = no
			owns = 706
		}

		effect = {
			prestige = 20
			random_owned = { 
				limit = { owner = { accepted_culture = south_german } } owner = { remove_accepted_culture = south_german }
			}
			random_owned = { 
				limit = { owner = { accepted_culture = north_german } } owner = { remove_accepted_culture = north_german }
			}
			random_owned = { 
				limit = { owner = { accepted_culture = czech } } owner = { remove_accepted_culture = czech }
				limit = { owner = { accepted_culture = russian } } owner = { remove_accepted_culture = russian }
				limit = { owner = { accepted_culture = russophile } } owner = { remove_accepted_culture = russophile }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = PZN
						tag = CPL
						tag = KRA
						tag = GLM
						tag = PML
						tag = PNC
					}
				}
				all_core = { add_core = HPL }
			}
			719 = { add_core = HPL } #Bialystock
			3649 = { add_core = HPL } #Chelm
			3658 = { add_core = HPL } #Nowe Miasto
			693 = { add_core = HPL } #Elbing
			696 = { add_core = HPL } #Allenstein
			change_tag = HPL
			capital = 706
			all_core = { remove_core = PNC }
			remove_country_modifier = unrecognized_country
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = polish
					location = {
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								region = AUS_702 #Galicia-Lodomeria
								region = AUS_662 #East Galicia
								province_id = 3661 #Chortkiv
							}
							province_id = 703 #Krakow
						}
					}
					OR = {
						type = capitalists
						type = aristocrats
						type = officers
					}
				}
				militancy = 4
				consciousness = 4
				ideology = {
					value = reactionary
					factor = 0.7
				}
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	become_HABSBURG_poland_lithuania = {
		picture = HABSBURG_polonia

		potential = {
			primary_culture = polish
			NOT = { exists = PLC }
			NOT = { exists = PRC }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = become_HABSBURG_poland_lithuania }
			has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL
		}

		allow = {
			war = no
			OR = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				is_secondary_power = yes
			}
			706 = { #Warsaw
				OR = {
					owned_by = THIS
					owner = { in_sphere = THIS }
					owner = { vassal_of = THIS }
				}
			}
			703 = { #Krakow
				OR = {
					owned_by = THIS
					owner = { in_sphere = THIS }
					owner = { vassal_of = THIS }
				}
			}
			360 = { #Vilnius
				OR = {
					owned_by = THIS
					owner = { in_sphere = THIS }
					owner = { vassal_of = THIS }
				}
			}
			361 = { #Kaunas
				OR = {
					owned_by = THIS
					owner = { in_sphere = THIS }
					owner = { vassal_of = THIS }
				}
			}
		}

		effect = {
			set_country_flag = become_HABSBURG_poland_lithuania
			inherit = LIT
			country_event = 666666048
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	HABSBURG_ruthenian_claims_decision = {
		picture = ruthenian_claims

		potential = {
			tag = PRC
			NOT = { has_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = HABSBURG_ruthenian_claims_decision }
			has_country_flag = HPL_accepts
		}

		allow = {
			war = no
			OR = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				is_secondary_power = yes
			}
			invention = manifest_destiny
			invention = national_fraternity
			invention = expansionism
			all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
		}

		effect = {
			set_country_flag = HABSBURG_ruthenian_claims_decision
			badboy = 12.5
			prestige = 12.5
			UKR = { all_core = { add_core = RUT add_core = THIS remove_core = UKR } }
			937 = { add_core = THIS } #Brest-Litovsk
			3657 = { add_core = THIS } #Kobryn
			940 = { add_core = THIS } #Pinsk
			3575 = { add_core = THIS } #Vawkavysk
			939 = { add_core = THIS } #Slonim
			3656 = { add_core = THIS } #Nyasvizh
			937 = { add_core = THIS } #Brest
			957 = { add_core = THIS } #Lutsk
			956 = { add_core = THIS } #Rovne
			942 = { add_core = THIS } #Mozyr
			959 = { add_core = THIS } #Korosten
			960 = { add_core = THIS } #Zhitomir
			3662 = { add_core = THIS } #Kamianets-Podilskyi
			955 = { add_core = THIS } #Proskorov
			954 = { add_core = THIS } #Vinnitsa
			3279 = { add_core = THIS } #Tiraspol
			RUS_962 = { add_core = THIS } #Chernigov
			RUS_963 = { add_core = THIS } #Poltava
			RUS_978 = { add_core = THIS } #Kharkov
			RUS_955 = { add_core = THIS } #Yekaterinoslav
			RUS_958 = { add_core = THIS } #Kiev
			RUS_973 = { add_core = THIS } #Kherson
			RUS_964 = { add_core = THIS } #Crimea
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					neighbour = THIS
					tag = RUS
				}
				relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
				leave_alliance = THIS
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	organize_PLC_1st = {
		picture = become_poland_lithuania
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = PLC
				tag = PRC
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = organize_PLC_1st }
		}
		allow = {
			war = no
			THIS = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = organize_PLC_1st
			prestige = 5
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL } }
					OR = {
						province_id = 719 #Bialystock
						province_id = 3649 #Chelm
						province_id = 957 #Lutsk
						province_id = 956 #Rivne

						province_id = 3661 #Chortkiv
					}
				}
				add_core = POL
				POL = { government = colonial_company  }
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 3575 #Vawkawysk
						province_id = 937 #Brest
						province_id = 3657 #Kobryn
						province_id = 940 #Pinsk
						province_id = 3656 #Nyasvizh
						province_id = 939 #Slonim/Baranovichi
					}
				}
				add_core = LIT
				LIT = { government = colonial_company  }
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = { has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL }
					OR = {
						province_id = 719 #Bialystock
						province_id = 3575 #Vawkavysk
						province_id = 939 #Slonim
						province_id = 3656 #Nyasvizh
						province_id = 940 #Pinsk
						province_id = 3657 #Kobryn
						province_id = 937 #Brest
						province_id = 957 #Lutsk
						province_id = 956 #Rovne
					}
				}
				add_core = HPL
				HPL = { government = colonial_company  }
				RUT = { all_core = { remove_core = RUT }  }
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = { has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL }
					OR = {
						province_id = 942 #Mozyr
						province_id = 959 #Korosten
						province_id = 960 #Zhitomir

						province_id = 955 #Proskorov
						province_id = 954 #Vinnitsa
						province_id = 3279 #Tiraspol

						region = RUS_963 #Poltava
						region = RUS_978 #Kharkov
						region = RUS_955 #Yekaterinoslav
						region = RUS_958 #Kiev
						region = RUS_973 #Kherson
						region = RUS_964 #Crimea
					}
				}
				add_core = RUT
				RUT = { government = colonial_company  }
			}
		}
	}

	the_commonwealth_3_nations = {
		picture = become_PLR

			tag = PLC

			has_country_flag = the_PLC_claims_1st
			any_owned_province = { is_core = UKR }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = the_commonwealth_3_nations }

			war = no

	organize_PLR_C3N = {
		picture = become_PLR
		potential = {
			tag = PLR
			has_country_flag = organize_PLC_1st
			NOT = { has_country_flag = organize_PLR_C3N }
		}
		allow = {
			war = no
			PLR = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
		}
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = organize_PLR_C3N
			prestige = 5
			UKR = {
				all_core = { remove_core = UKR }
				government = colonial_company 
				primary_culture = ukrainian
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					#owner = { NOT = { has_country_flag = a_habsburg_on_the_throne_POL } }
					OR = {    
						province_id = 3662 #Kamianets-Podilskyi
						province_id = 955 #Proskorov
						province_id = 954 #Vinnitsa
						province_id = 3279 #Tiraspol
						province_id = 959 #Korosten
						province_id = 960 #Zhitomir
						province_id = 962 #Chernigov
						region = RUS_973 #Kherson
						region = RUS_958 #Kiev
						region = RUS_963 #Poltava
						region = RUS_977 #Kursk
						region = RUS_978 #Kharkov
						region = RUS_955 #Yekaterinoslav
						region = RUS_964 #Crimea
					}
				}
				add_core = UKR
				remove_core = POL
				remove_core = LIT
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 943 #Smolensk
						province_id = 1016 #Bryansk
					}
				}
				add_core = LIT
			}
		}
	}
	
	claim_silesia = {
		picture = silesia_recclaim
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = POL
				tag = PLC
				tag = PLR
			}
			is_vassal = no
			NOT = { has_country_flag = claimed_claim_silesia }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_disarmed = no
			OR = {
				is_secondary_power = yes
				is_greater_power = yes
			}
			OR = {
				government = fascist_dictatorship
				ruling_party_ideology = fascist
				AND = {
					war_policy = jingoism
					military_score = 30
				}
				citizens_rights = all_voting_pops
			}
			invention = manifest_destiny
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = claimed_claim_silesia
			badboy = 5
			add_accepted_culture = western_slavic

			SLS = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { tag = THIS }
					any_owned_province = { is_core = THIS }
				}
				relation = { who = THIS value = -200 }
				leave_alliance = THIS
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_sphere_leader_of = SLS
							is_our_vassal = SLS
						}
					}
				}
				owner = {
					inherit = SLS
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

				school_reforms = acceptable_schools

				owns = 695
				PRD = {
					owns = 695
					OR = {
						in_sphere = THIS
						vassal_of = THIS
						substate_of = THIS
						ai = no

							OR = {
								owned_by = THIS

									OR = {
										in_sphere = THIS

											is_vassal = no
											vassal_of = THIS
											substate_of = THIS
										}
									}
									is_greater_power = no
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			THIS = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
		}

			set_country_flag = german_question
			country_event = 666666046
		}

	declare_BOH_neutrality = {
		picture = declare_BOH_neutrality_pic
		potential = {
			tag = BOH
			PRC = { exists = yes }
			owns = 625 #Bohemia
			owns = 627 #Sudetes
			owns = 631 #Moravia
			war = no
			is_vassal = no
			is_disarmed = no

				has_global_flag = bohemia_warsaw_supported
				has_global_flag = AUS_releases_BOH
			}
			NOT = {
				has_country_modifier = neutrality
				has_country_flag = embraced_BOH_neutrality
				has_country_flag = abandoned_BOH_neutrality
				has_country_flag = BOH_neutrality_violated
			}	
		}
		allow = {
			NOT = { any_owned_province = { is_core = THIS } }
			NOT = { badboy = 1 }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = embraced_BOH_neutrality
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = neutrality
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 0 government = fascist_dictatorship }
			modifier = { factor = 0 government = proletarian_dictatorship }
		}
	}


	abandon_BOH_neutrality = {
		picture = declare_BOH_neutrality_pic
		potential = {
			has_country_modifier = neutrality
			NOT = {
				tag = SWI
				has_country_flag = embraced_BOH_neutrality
				has_country_flag = abandoned_BOH_neutrality
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			prestige = 20
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = abandoned_BOH_neutrality
			clr_country_flag = embraced_BOH_neutrality
			prestige = -20
			badboy = 5
			remove_country_modifier = neutrality
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					OR = {
						badboy = 0.75
						government = fascist_dictatorship
						government = proletarian_dictatorship
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	enforce_BOH_neutrality = {
		picture = declare_BOH_neutrality_pic
		potential = {
			has_country_modifier = neutrality
			ai = yes
			tag = BOH
		}
		
		allow = {
			OR = {
				any_greater_power = { military_access = THIS }
				any_neighbor_country = { NOT = { vassal_of = THIS } military_access = THIS }
				sphere_owner = { military_access = THIS }
				AND = {
					num_of_allies = 1
					NOT = { NCT = { alliance_with = THIS } }
				}
				AND = {
					num_of_allies = 2
					NCT = { exists = yes alliance_with = THIS }
				}
				war = yes
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			any_country = {
				limit = { NOT = { vassal_of = THIS } OR = { military_access = THIS alliance_with = THIS } }
				relation = { who = THIS value = -125 }
			}
			any_country = { limit = { alliance_with = THIS NOT = { vassal_of = THIS } } leave_alliance = THIS }
			any_country = { limit = { war_with = THIS } end_war = THIS }
			any_country = { limit = { military_access = THIS NOT = { vassal_of = THIS } } end_military_access = THIS }
		}
	}
	
	violate_BOH_neutrality = {
		picture = declare_BOH_neutrality_pic
		alert = no
		potential = {
			BOH = {
				neighbour = THIS
				has_country_modifier = neutrality
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			BOH = { has_country_modifier = neutrality }
			war_policy = jingoism
			NOT = {
				is_sphere_leader_of = BOH
				truce_with = BOH
				alliance_with = BOH
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			badboy = 25
			set_country_flag = BOH_neutrality_violator
			BOH = {
				set_country_flag = BOH_neutrality_violated
				remove_country_modifier = neutrality
				relation = { who = THIS value = -200 }
			}
			diplomatic_influence = { who = BOH value = -200 }
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						alliance_with = BOH
						is_sphere_leader_of = BOH
						relation = { who = BOH value = 50 }
					}
				}
				leave_alliance = THIS
				relation = { who = THIS value = -200 }
				casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = cut_down_to_size
					months = 60
				}
			}
			casus_belli = {
				target = BOH
				type = conquest
				months = 60
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				ai = yes
			}
		}
	}

	incorporate_the_baltic_states_alternate = {

				}

			}

				OR = { 
					is_vassal = no
					is_substate = no
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				in_sphere = THIS

					is_vassal = no

				}

				inherit = LVN

				inherit = ESG

					add_core = UBD remove_core = LVN remove_core = KSM remove_core = ESG
				}

					limit = { NOT = { is_culture_group = germanic } }
					militancy = 3
				}
			}
			create_vassal = UBD

			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { vote_franschise = none_voting } }
				UBD = { 
					government = colonial_company 
					political_reform = none_voting 
				} 
			}
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NOT = { vote_franschise = none_voting } } UBD = { government = dominion } } }
			set_country_flag = incorporate_the_baltic_states_alternate
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

						}
						in_sphere = THIS

					all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			badboy = 2.5
			prestige = 10
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core = LVN
						is_core = KSM
						is_core = ESG
						is_core = LIT
					}
				}
				secede_province = BBD
			}
			BBD = {
				inherit = LVN
				inherit = KSM
				inherit = ESG
				inherit = LIT
				any_owned = { 
					add_core = BBD remove_core = LVN remove_core = KSM remove_core = ESG
				}
				any_pop = {
					limit = { is_culture_group = germanic }
					militancy = 3
				}
				government = hms_government
				political_reform = landed_voting
				political_reform = appointed
				political_reform = gerrymandering
				political_reform = culture_voting_only
				political_reform = federalism
				capital = 361
				add_accepted_culture = lithuanian
				add_accepted_culture = baltic_german
				add_accepted_culture = latvian
				add_accepted_culture = estonian
			}
			create_vassal = BBD
			diplomatic_influence = { who = BBD value = 400 }
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { vote_franschise = none_voting } }
				BBD = { 
					government = colonial_company 
					political_reform = none_voting 
				} 
			}
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NOT = { vote_franschise = none_voting } } UBD = { government = dominion } } }
			set_country_flag = incorporate_the_BBD
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	LIT_create_BBD = {

							is_substate = no

					}
					AND = {
						vassal_of = THIS

							AND = {
								THIS = { is_greater_power = yes	}
								in_sphere = THIS
							}
							THIS = { is_secondary_power = yes }
						}
					}
					all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
				}
			}
			KSM = {

					AND = {
						OR = { 
							is_vassal = no
							is_substate = no
						}
						in_sphere = THIS
					}

							AND = {
								THIS = { is_greater_power = yes	}
								in_sphere = THIS
							}
							THIS = { is_secondary_power = yes }
						}
					}
					all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
				}
			}
			ESG = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						OR = { 
							is_vassal = no
							is_substate = no
						}
						in_sphere = THIS
					}
					AND = {
						vassal_of = THIS
						OR = {
							AND = {
								THIS = { is_greater_power = yes	}
								in_sphere = THIS
							}
							THIS = { is_secondary_power = yes }
						}
					}
					all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			badboy = 5
			prestige = 25
			inherit = LVN
			inherit = KSM
			inherit = ESG
			LVN = { all_core = { add_core = UBD add_core = BBD remove_core = LVN } }
			KSM = { all_core = { add_core = UBD add_core = BBD remove_core = KSM } }
			ESG = { all_core = { add_core = UBD add_core = BBD remove_core = ESG } }
			UBD = { government = prussian_constitutionalism }
			all_core = { add_core = BBD }
			add_accepted_culture = baltic_german
			add_accepted_culture = latvian
			add_accepted_culture = estonian
			change_tag = BBD
			political_reform = federalism
			set_country_flag = LIT_create_BBD
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

			is_greater_power = yes

		}

			prestige = 100
			war = no
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			total_num_of_ports = 1
			SWE = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						relation = { who = THIS value = 150 }
						in_sphere = THIS
						THIS = { has_country_flag = securing_north_sea_exit_peace }
					}
					AND = {
						relation = { who = THIS value = 50 }
						vassal_of = THIS
						THIS = { has_country_flag = securing_north_sea_exit_war }
					}
				}
			}
			NOR = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						relation = { who = THIS value = 150 }
						in_sphere = THIS
						THIS = { has_country_flag = securing_north_sea_exit_peace }
					}
					AND = {
						relation = { who = THIS value = 50 }
						vassal_of = THIS
						THIS = { has_country_flag = securing_north_sea_exit_war }
					}
				}
			}
			DEN = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						relation = { who = THIS value = 150 }
						in_sphere = THIS
						THIS = { has_country_flag = securing_north_sea_exit_peace }
					}
					AND = {
						relation = { who = THIS value = 50 }
						vassal_of = THIS
						THIS = { has_country_flag = securing_north_sea_exit_war }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = form_kalmar_outside
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = scandinavian
						tag = SCH
						tag = SWH
					}
					NOT = { primary_culture = finnish }
					NOT = { tag = THIS }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
					capital_scope = { continent = europe }
					OR = {
						is_vassal = no
						vassal_of = THIS

							is_vassal = yes
							NOT = { tag = FIN }
							OR = {
								is_culture_group = scandinavian
								tag = SCH
								tag = SWH
							}
							overlord = { is_culture_group = scandinavian }
						}
					}
					exists = yes
				}
				country_event = 49501
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = leader_of_kalmar
				duration = -1
			}
			set_global_flag = kalmar_reformed 
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

}political_decisions = {

	the_great_game_wakhan = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				government = absolute_monarchy
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
				government = hms_government
			}
			OR = {
				is_greater_power = yes
				is_secondary_power = yes
			}
			tag = RUS
			has_global_flag = crimea_has_happened
			OR = {
				AND = {
					ai = yes
					year = 1865
				}
				AND = {
					ai = no
					nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
				}
			}
			WKH = {
				civilized = no
				ai = yes
				exists = yes
				is_vassal = no
			}
			has_global_flag = the_great_game_kokand
			NOT = { has_global_flag = the_great_game_wakhan }
		}

			WKH = { exists = yes }
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = the_great_game_wakhan
			badboy = 1
			add_casus_belli = {
				target = WKH
				type = annex_core_country
				months = 60

			war = {
				target = WKH
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = annex_core_country }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
				call_ally = yes
			}

	absorb_kazakh_tribes = {
		picture = treaty_of_turkmanchay
		potential = {
			primary_culture = kazak
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = vassalize_J00
				has_country_flag = vassalize_J01
				has_country_flag = vassalize_J02
				has_country_flag = vassalize_BKY
			}
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = kazakhstan_united
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			J00 = {
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			J01 = {
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			J02 = {
				exists = yes
				vassal_of = THIS
			}
			BKY = {
				OR = {
					AND = {
						exists = yes
						vassal_of = THIS
					}
					exists = no
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = J00
						tag = J01
						tag = J02
						tag = BKY
					}
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				all_core = { add_core = KAZ }
				annex_to = THIS
			}
			set_global_flag= kazakhstan_united
			change_tag = KAZ
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
