		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					OR = {

							owns = 1182 NOT = { has_global_flag = slavic_rename_guryev }

						}
					}
				}

					is_culture_group = turanian
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owns = 2610 NOT = { has_global_flag = turanian_rename_uralsk }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 1182 NOT = { has_global_flag = turanian_rename_guryev }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 1183 NOT = { has_global_flag = turanian_rename_aqtobe }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 2702 NOT = { has_global_flag = turanian_rename_aralsk }
						}
						AND = {
							owns = 3529 NOT = { has_global_flag = turanian_rename_orda }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			###slavic###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 2610

	rename_chaharken = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = iranian
					OR = {
						AND = {
							owns = 1204 NOT = { has_global_flag = iranian_rename_chaharken }

							owns = 3528 NOT = { has_global_flag = iranian_rename_anau }

	rename_kyzylsu = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = iranian
					owns = 3525 NOT = { has_global_flag = iranian_rename_kyzylsu }
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = turanian
					owns = 3525 NOT = { has_global_flag = turanian_rename_kyzylsu }
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					owns = 3525 NOT = { has_global_flag = slavic_rename_kyzylsu }
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {			
			###iranian###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3525
					owner = {
						is_culture_group = iranian
					}
				}
				3525 = { change_province_name = "Dehestan" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = iranian_rename_kyzylsu
					clr_global_flag = turanian_rename_kyzylsu
					clr_global_flag = slavic_rename_kyzylsu
				}
			}

				limit = {
					province_id = 3525

						is_culture_group = turanian
					}
				}
				3525 = { change_province_name = "Kyzyl-Su" }

	rename_karagan = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = iranian
					owns = 3526 NOT = { has_global_flag = iranian_rename_karagan }
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = turanian
					owns = 3526 NOT = { has_global_flag = turanian_rename_karagan }
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = east_slavic
					owns = 3526 NOT = { has_global_flag = slavic_rename_karagan }
				}
			}
		}

			war = no
		}

	#https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Treaty_of_Kulja
	#https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Treaty_of_Livadia
	#https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Treaty_of_Saint_Petersburg_(1881)
	
	
}political_decisions = {
	
	turkish_integration_status_on = {
	picture = gtfo
		alert = no
		potential = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = turkish_integration_status_on }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = turkish_protection_act_enacted }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = turkish_assimilation_enacted }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = turkish_removal_act_policy }
			OR = {
				capital_scope = { continent = europe }
				capital_scope = { continent = asia }
				capital_scope = { continent = oceania }
			}
			OR = {
				is_culture_group = levantine
				is_culture_group = south_slavic
				is_culture_group = pan_romanian
			}
			any_owned_province = {
				is_core = THIS
				is_colonial = no
				OR = {
					continent = europe
					continent = asia
					continent = oceania
				}
				any_pop = {
					is_culture_group = turko_semitic
				}
			}
		}
	
		allow = {
			
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = turkish_integration_status_on
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	turkish_integration_status_off = {
		picture = gtfo
		alert = no
		potential = {
			has_country_flag = turkish_integration_status_on
		}
	
		allow = {
			
		}
		
		effect = {
			clr_country_flag = turkish_integration_status_on
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
	}
	
	turkish_protection_act = {
		potential = {
			has_country_flag = turkish_integration_status_on
			NOT = { has_country_flag = turkish_protection_act_enacted }
		}
	
		allow = {
			war = no
			NOT = { ruling_party_ideology = reactionary }
			NOT = { ruling_party_ideology = fascist }
			NOT = { citizens_rights = primary_culture_only }
			OR = {
				all_core = {
					owned_by = THIS
					is_colonial = no
					any_pop = { is_primary_culture = yes }
				}
				nationalvalue = nv_equality
				OR = {
					citizenship_policy = full_citizenship
					government = proletarian_dictatorship
				}
			}
			OR = {
				citizenship_policy = full_citizenship
				government = proletarian_dictatorship
			}
			OR = {
				invention = sociology
				AND = {
					nationalvalue = nv_equality
					biologism = 1
				}
			}
			money = 10000
			OR = {
				government = proletarian_dictatorship
				upper_house = { ideology = socialist value = 0.3 }
				upper_house = { ideology = liberal value = 0.3 }
				AND = {
					upper_house = { ideology = socialist value = 0.15 }
					upper_house = { ideology = liberal value = 0.15 }
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			treasury = -10000
			badboy = -5
			set_country_flag = turkish_protection_act_enacted
			clr_country_flag = turkish_integration_status_on
			random_owned = {
				limit = { OR = { continent = asia continent = europe continent = oceania } }
				owner = {
					any_pop = { limit = { NOT = { is_culture_group = turko_semitic } }
						scaled_militancy = { factor = 3 ideology = reactionary }
						scaled_consciousness = { factor = 3 ideology = conservative }
					}
					
					any_pop = { limit = { is_culture_group = turko_semitic }
						consciousness = 4
						militancy = -2
						dominant_issue = { factor = 0.5 value = full_citizenship }
					}
				}
			}
			
			random_owned = {
				limit = { OR = { continent = europe continent = oceania continent = asia } }
				owner = {
					any_pop = { limit = { NOT = { is_culture_group = turko_semitic } }
						scaled_militancy = { factor = 3 ideology = reactionary }
						scaled_consciousness = { factor = 3 ideology = conservative }
					}
					
					any_pop = { limit = { is_culture_group = turko_semitic }
						consciousness = 4
						militancy = -2
						dominant_issue = { factor = 0.5 value = full_citizenship }
					}
				}
			}
				
			random_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = THIS any_pop = { has_pop_culture = turkish } NOT = { owner = { accepted_culture = turkish } } }
				owner = { add_accepted_culture = turkish }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = THIS any_pop = { has_pop_culture = kurdish } NOT = { owner = { accepted_culture = kurdish } } }
				owner = { add_accepted_culture = kurdish } 
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = THIS any_pop = { has_pop_culture = azerbaijani } NOT = { owner = { accepted_culture = azerbaijani } } }
				owner = { add_accepted_culture = azerbaijani } 
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
		
	turkish_assimilation_act = {
		potential = {
			has_country_flag = turkish_integration_status_on
			NOT = { has_country_flag = turkish_assimilation_enacted }
		}
	
		allow = {
			war = no
			NOT = { citizens_rights = all_voting_pops }
			citizenship_policy = limited_citizenship
			experimental_psychology = 1
			money = 100000
			all_core = {
				owned_by = THIS
				is_colonial = no
				any_pop = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			}
			OR = {
				upper_house = { ideology = reactionary value = 0.4 }
				upper_house = { ideology = conservative value = 0.51 }
				AND = {
					upper_house = { ideology = conservative value = 0.25 }
					upper_house = { ideology = reactionary value = 0.25 }
				}
			}
			OR = {
				school_reforms = acceptable_schools
				school_reforms = good_schools
			}
			OR = {
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = greek
					primary_culture = greek
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = armenian
					primary_culture = armenian
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = georgian
					primary_culture = georgian
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = assyrian
					primary_culture = assyrian
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = serb
					primary_culture = serb
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = croat
					primary_culture = croat
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = bulgarian
					primary_culture = bulgarian
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = montenegrin
					primary_culture = montenegrin
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = slovene
					primary_culture = slovene
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = romanian
					primary_culture = romanian
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			treasury = -100000
			badboy = 2
			set_country_flag = turkish_assimilation_enacted
			clr_country_flag = turkish_integration_status_on
			add_country_modifier = { name = turkish_assimilation_act_policy duration = 7300 }

					OR = {
						is_culture_group = turko_semitic
						is_culture_group = turko_semitic
					}
				}
				consciousness = 9
				militancy = 3
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
		
	}
	
	turkish_removal_act = {
		potential = {
			has_country_flag = turkish_integration_status_on
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = turkish_removal_act_policy }
		}
	
		allow = {
			war = no
			OR = {
				citizens_rights = primary_culture_only
				citizens_rights = culture_voting_only
			}
			NOT = { government = democracy }
			#NOT = { government = hms_government }
			war_policy = jingoism
			citizenship_policy = residency
			experimental_psychology = 1
			money = 50000
			#average_militancy = 5
			all_core = {
				owned_by = THIS
				is_colonial = no
				any_pop = { is_primary_culture = yes }
			}
			#OR = {
			#	upper_house = { ideology = reactionary value = 0.51 }
			#	upper_house = { ideology = fascist value = 0.51 }
			#}
			OR = {
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
				ruling_party_ideology = fascist
			}
			OR = {
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = greek
					primary_culture = greek
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = armenian
					primary_culture = armenian
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = georgian
					primary_culture = georgian
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = assyrian
					primary_culture = assyrian
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = serb
					primary_culture = serb
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = croat
					primary_culture = croat
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = bulgarian
					primary_culture = bulgarian
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = montenegrin
					primary_culture = montenegrin
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = slovene
					primary_culture = slovene
				}
				AND	= {
					pop_majority_culture = romanian
					primary_culture = romanian
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			treasury = -50000
			badboy = 6
			add_country_modifier = { name = turkish_removal_act_policy duration = 7300 }
			clr_country_flag = turkish_integration_status_on
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					is_culture_group = turko_semitic
				}
				consciousness = 9
				militancy = 9
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					is_culture_group = turko_semitic
				}
				random_list = {
					20 = { reduce_pop = 0.3 }
					20 = { reduce_pop = 0.25 }
					20 = { reduce_pop = 0.2 }
					20 = { reduce_pop = 0.15 }
					20 = { reduce_pop = 0.1 }
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
		
	}

	
	turkish_assimilation_act_ended = {
		potential = {
			ai = yes
			exists = yes
			OR = {
				AND = {

					has_country_flag = turkish_assimilation_enacted
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = turkish_assimilation_act_policy }
				}
			}
		}
	
		allow = {
		}
		
		effect = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						has_country_flag = turkish_assimilation_enacted
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = turkish_assimilation_act_policy }
					}
				}
				owner = { clr_country_flag = turkish_assimilation_enacted }
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = turkish_assimilation_enacted
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = turkish_assimilation_act_policy }
				}
				clr_country_flag = turkish_assimilation_enacted
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	assert_bushehr = {
		picture = bandar_bushehr
		potential = {
			tag = PER
			owns = 1135
			NOT = { has_country_flag = bushehr_asserted }
		}

		allow = {
			war = no
			NOT = { num_of_revolts = 1 }
			NOT = { 1136 = { owner = { is_sphere_leader_of = PER } } }
			OR = {
				ai = yes
				AND = {
					relation = { who = RUS value = 100 }
					relation = { who = TUR value = 100 }
				}
				part_of_sphere = yes
			}
			OR = {
				civilized = yes
				NOT = { admin_reform = no_admin_reform }
				1136 = { average_militancy = 3 }
			}
		}

		effect = {
			badboy = 1
			set_country_flag = bushehr_asserted
			1136 = {
				owner = {
					country_event = { id = 301002 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			relation = {
				who = ENG
				value = -20
			}
			ENG = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = PER
					value = 30
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = PER
					value = -15
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				badboy = 0.6
			}
		}
	}

	assert_khorasan = {
		picture = decision_mashhad
		potential = {
			tag = PER
			is_our_vassal = KHR
			KHR = {
				civilized = no
			}
		}

		allow = {
			war = no
			NOT = { num_of_revolts = 1 }
			OR = {
				civilized = yes
				AND = {
					admin_reform = yes_admin_reform
					civilization_progress = 0.75
				}
			}
			OR = {
				ai = yes
				AND = {
					relation = {
						who = RUS
						value = 100
					}
					relation = {
						who = TUR
						value = 100
					}
				}
				part_of_sphere = yes
			}
		}

		effect = {
			badboy = 1
			KHR = {
				any_owned = {
					add_core = PER
				}
			}
			inherit = KHR
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				badboy = 0.6
			}
		}
	}

	the_goldsmith_arbitration = {
		picture = map_india
		potential = {
			tag = ENG
			exists = KAL
			NOT = { has_country_flag = goldsmith_arbitration }
		}

		allow = {
			war = no
			has_global_flag = government_of_india_act
			OR = {
				KAL = {
					part_of_sphere = no
				}
				is_sphere_leader_of = KAL
			}
			OR = {
				AND = {
					ai = yes
					PER = {
						ai = yes
					}
				}
				relation = {
					who = PER
					value = 100
				}
				is_sphere_leader_of = PER
			}
		}

		effect = {
			PER = {
				country_event = 300998
			}
			set_country_flag = goldsmith_arbitration
			KAL = {
				release_vassal = MAK
				# release_vassal = KAL
				release_vassal = KHA
			}
			ENG = {
				casus_belli = {
					target = KAL
					type = establish_protectorate_casus_belli
					months = 36
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = MAK
					type = make_puppet
					months = 36
				}
			}
			# 1145 = {
				# add_core = PER
			# }
			# 2668 = {
				# add_core = PER
			# }
			3469 = {
				add_core = PER
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = {
					year = 1872
					month = 6
				}
			}
		}
	}

political_decisions = {
	###British Africa###
	british_matabale = {
		picture = "british_somaliland"
		potential = { 
			tag = ENG
			ai = yes
			has_global_flag = berlin_conference
			is_greater_power = yes
			NOT = { government = proletarian_dictatorship }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = british_matabale }
			MAT = { 
				ai = yes
				civilized = no
				exists = yes
				neighbour = THIS
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			owns = 2076
			owns = 2087
		}
		
		effect = {
			war = {
				target = MAT
				attacker_goal = {
					casus_belli = annex_africa_full
				}
				call_ally = no
			}
			set_country_flag = british_matabale
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	end_mahadist_war = {
		picture = map_africa
		potential = {
			capital_scope = { continent = europe }
			is_greater_power = yes
			OR = {
				EGY = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
				EGY = { vassal_of = THIS }
			}
			exists = SUD
			NOT = { has_country_flag = end_mahadist_war }
		}
		
		allow = {
			SUD = { is_vassal = no }
			owns = 1745
			NOT = { any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS } }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = end_mahadist_war
			war = {
				target = SUD
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = annex_africa_full }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
				call_ally = yes
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	royal_niger_company = {
		picture = george_goldie
		potential = {
			capital_scope = { continent = europe }
			is_greater_power = yes
			tag = ENG
			owns = 1923
			NOT = { has_country_flag = royal_niger_company }
			OR = {
				government = hms_government
				government = absolute_monarchy
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
			}
			NOT = { invention = the_dark_continent }
		}
		
		allow = {
			owns = 1923
			NOT = { any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS } }
			is_disarmed = no
			OR = {
				blue_and_brown_water_schools = 1
				invention = colonial_negotiations
			}
			money = 750001
			total_amount_of_ships = 125
			NOT = { any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS } }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = royal_niger_company
			badboy = 1
			prestige = 15
			treasury = -750000
			random_owned = {
				limit = { OYO = { exists = yes ai = yes } }
				owner = { diplomatic_influence = { who = OYO value = 400 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { BEN = { exists = yes ai = yes } }
				owner = { diplomatic_influence = { who = BEN value = 400 } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { WRI = { exists = yes ai = yes } }
				owner = { diplomatic_influence = { who = WRI value = 400 } }
			}
			random_owned = {

					call_ally = no
				}
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { owns = 1791 ai = yes civilized = no NOT = { truce_with = THIS } exists = yes }
				add_casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = conquest_any
					months = 36
				}
				leave_alliance = THIS
				relation = { who = THIS value = -400 }
				war = {
					target = THIS
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = humiliate }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any }
					call_ally = no
				}
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { tag = GAB ai = yes civilized = no NOT = { truce_with = THIS } exists = yes NOT = { num_of_cities = 2 } }
				add_casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = establish_protectorate_NI_casus_belli
					months = 36
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = appoint_louis_briere
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				badboy = 0.9
			}
		}
	}

			FRA = { set_country_flag = faidherbe_ambitions }
			BOR = { set_country_flag = faidherbe_ambitions }
			2573 = {
				secede_province = THIS
				owner = { relation = { who = THIS value = -25 } }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = TRZ
					exists = yes
					NOT = { in_sphere = THIS }
				}
				leave_alliance = THIS
				add_casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = add_to_sphere
					months = 36
				}
				war = {
					target = THIS
					attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_state state_province_id = 1784 }
					defender_goal = { casus_belli = add_to_sphere }
					call_ally = no
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

				}
			}
		}

	organize_algeria_departments = {
		picture = organize_french_algeria
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			has_country_flag = 2nd_republic
			NOT = { has_country_flag = organize_algeria_1848 }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			money = 55001
			ALD_1704 = { owned_by = THIS }
			ALD_1708 = { owned_by = THIS }
			FRA_1700 = { owned_by = THIS }
			NOT = { exists = ALD }
		}
		
		effect = {
			FRA = { set_country_flag = organize_algeria_1848 }
			BOR = { set_country_flag = organize_algeria_1848 }
			treasury = -55000
			ALD_1704 = { add_core = THIS }
			ALD_1708 = { add_core = THIS }
			FRA_1700 = { add_core = THIS }
			ALD = { government = colonial_company }
			
			any_pop = {
				limit = { 
					culture = french
					location = { is_core = ALD}
				}
				ideology = { factor = 0.9 value = conservative }
			}
			
			any_pop = {
				limit = { 
					culture = french
					location = { is_core = ALD }
					type = bureaucrats
				}
				ideology = { factor = 0.7 value = conservative }
				reduce_pop = 1.5
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	integrating_french_algeria = {
		picture = french_algeria
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			year = 1900
			ALD = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = frenchie_algeria_reclaimed }
		}

		allow = {
			war = no
			is_greater_power = yes
			OR = {
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
				ruling_party_ideology = fascist			
			}
			colonial_policy = settlement
		}

		effect = {
			badboy = 4
			FRA = { set_country_flag = frenchie_algeria_reclaimed }
			BOR = { set_country_flag = frenchie_algeria_reclaimed }
			prestige = 15
			ALD = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -3
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -3
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -1
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -1
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = liberal
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = maghrebi
						has_pop_culture = berber
					}
				}
				reduce_pop = 0.4
				consciousness = 10
				militancy = 10
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = ALD
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = colonial_recruitment
					duration = 3650
				}
			}		
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { 
			factor = 1 
			modifier = { factor = 0 badboy = 0.8 }
		}
	}
	
	tunisian_colony = {
		picture = tunisia_map
		potential = {
			capital_scope = { continent = europe }
			TUN = { exists = yes civilized = no neighbour = THIS } 
			is_greater_power = yes
			OR = { 
				is_sphere_leader_of = TUN
				is_our_vassal = TUN
				TUN = { part_of_sphere = no }
			}
			has_global_flag = berlin_conference
			NOT = { has_global_flag = tunisian_colony }
		}
		
		allow = {
			NOT = { any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS } }
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			year = 1870
			TUN = { OR = { NOT = { money = 3000 } ai = yes } }
			NOT = { war_exhaustion = 5 }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = tunisian_colony
			badboy = 2
			diplomatic_influence = { who = TUN value = -400 }
			relation = { who = TUN value = -400 }
			leave_alliance = TUN
			end_military_access = TUN
			TUN = { end_military_access = THIS tech_school = unciv_tech_school }
			any_country = { 
				limit = { is_our_vassal = TUN }
				release_vassal = TUN
				casus_belli = { target = THIS type = free_peoples months = 40 }
				casus_belli = { target = TUN type = make_puppet months = 40 }
			}
			war = { target = TUN attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest_any } defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo } }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 0 badboy = 0.95 }
		}
	}

	italian_somaliland = {
		picture = "italian_somaliland"
		potential = { 
			tag = ITA
			is_greater_power = yes
			has_global_flag = berlin_conference
			NOT = { government = proletarian_dictatorship }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = italian_somaliland }
			MAJ = { 
				civilized = no
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					part_of_sphere = no
					in_sphere = THIS
				}
				OR = {
					is_vassal = no
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
			}
			GEL = {
				ai = yes
				civilized = no
				exists = yes
				OR = {
					part_of_sphere = no
					in_sphere = THIS
				}
				OR = {
					is_vassal = no
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
			}
			NOT = { invention = the_dark_continent }
		}
		
		allow = {
			total_pops = 2000000
			NOT = { any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS } }
			is_greater_power = yes
			revolution_n_counterrevolution = 1
			num_of_ports = 3
			total_amount_of_ships = 35
			money = 30001
			NOT = { war_policy = pacifism }
			NOT = { war_exhaustion = 5 }
		}
		
		effect = {
			prestige = 5
			treasury = -30000
			inherit = GEL
			inherit = MAJ
			set_country_flag = italian_somaliland
		}
	}

	luderitz_expedition = {

				AND = {
					colonial_nation = no

						naval_statistics = 1

					}
				}
				AND = {
					colonial_nation = yes
					steel_steamers = 1
					blue_and_brown_water_schools = 1
				}
			}
			NOT = { war_policy = pacifism }
			NOT = { war_exhaustion = 5 }
		}

			prestige = 5
			treasury = -50000
			1916 = { secede_province = THIS any_pop = { literacy = -0.99 } life_rating = 25 }

		picture = yohannes_iv
		potential = {
			tag = ETH
			OR = { 
				has_country_flag = battle_of_magdala
				AND = {
					year = 1871

				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = yohannes_iv }
		}

			war = no
			NOT = { war_exhaustion = 1 }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = yohannes_iv
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { ai = yes } }
				owner = { 
					military_reform = yes_foreign_training 
					economic_reform = yes_admin_reform
					years_of_research = 5
					plurality = 15
				}
			}
			military_reform = yes_foreign_weapons 
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = yohannes_iv
				duration = 6570
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { is_primary_culture = yes }
				consciousness = -2
			}
		}
	}

	expel_turks = {
		picture = constantine_I
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = GRE
				tag = BYZ
			}
			has_country_flag = greece_has_got_a_brand_new_bag
			NOT = { has_country_flag = population_exchange_with_turkey }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = turks_expelled }
		}
		
		allow = {
			TUR = { is_greater_power = no }
			owns = 860
			owns = 863
			owns = 869
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					873 = { owned_by = TUR } #Ikonion
					882 = { owned_by = TUR } #Trebizond
					853 = { owned_by = TUR } #Gjirokaster
					806 = { owned_by = TUR } #Skopje
					815 = { owned_by = TUR } #Plovdiv
				}
				year = 1923
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			prestige = 20
			badboy = 5
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core = BYZ
						is_core = GRE
					}
				}
				
				any_pop = { 
					limit = { is_culture_group = turko_semitic } 
					reduce_pop = 0.001
					militancy = 8
				}
				any_pop = { 
						limit = { has_pop_culture = greek } 
						militancy = -5 
						reduce_pop = 1.75
				}
				any_pop = { 
					limit = { 
						is_culture_group = turko_semitic
						type = soldiers
					} 
					militancy = 5
					move_pop = 876
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = turks_expelled
			
			TUR = {
				any_pop = { 
					limit = { has_pop_culture = turkish } 
					reduce_pop = 1.5
				}				
				any_pop = { 
						limit = { culture = greek } 
						militancy = -1 
						reduce_pop = 0.98
						move_pop = 860
				}					
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { 
			factor = 1
		
			modifier = {
				factor = 0		
				OR = {
					873 = { owned_by = TUR } #Ikonion
					882 = { owned_by = TUR } #Trebizond
					853 = { owned_by = TUR } #Gjirokaster
					806 = { owned_by = TUR } #Skopje
					815 = { owned_by = TUR } #Plovdiv
				}
			}
			modifier = {
				factor = 0	
				NOT = { year = 1923 }
				has_country_flag = decisionwillneverbetaken
			}
			
		}
	}

			tag = TUR

				AND = { owns = 859 NOT = { has_country_flag = turkification_gelibolu } }

	declare_kingdom_of_serbia = {
		picture = greater_serbia
		potential = {
			tag = SER
			OR = { 
				government = colonial_company
				government = dominion
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = kingdom_of_serbia }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_vassal = no
			OR = {
				revolution_n_counterrevolution = 1
				is_greater_power = yes
				year = 1880
				AND = {
					TUR_803 = { owned_by = THIS }
					TUR_806 = { owned_by = THIS }
				}
				TUR_788 = { owned_by = THIS }
				TUR_802 = { owned_by = THIS }
				788 = { owned_by = THIS } #Mostar
				AND = {
					TUR_803 = { NOT = { owned_by = TUR } }
					TUR_806 = { NOT = { owned_by = TUR } }
				}
			}
			NOT = { in_sphere = TUR }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = kingdom_of_serbia
			prestige = 15
			upper_house = {
				ideology = conservative
				value = 0.1
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { 
					OR = { 
						is_primary_culture = yes
						is_accepted_culture = yes
					}
				}
				militancy = -2
				consciousness = -3
			}
			
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { vote_franschise = none_voting } }
				owner = { government = absolute_monarchy }
			}
			
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { NOT = { vote_franschise = none_voting } } }
				owner = { government = prussian_constitutionalism }
			}
			
			random_owned = {
				limit = { 
					owner = {
						OR = {
							vote_franschise = universal_weighted_voting
							vote_franschise = universal_voting
						}
						OR = {
							political_parties = secret_ballots
							political_parties = non_secret_ballots
						}
					} 
				}
				owner = { government = hms_government }
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
		
}
political_decisions = {
	annex_united_baltic_duchy = {
		picture = "annex_united_baltic_duchy"
		potential = { 
			OR = {
				tag = GCF
				tag = GER
			}
			is_greater_power = yes
			UBD = {
				vassal_of = THIS 
				ai = yes
				exists = yes
			}
			OR = {
				government = absolute_monarchy
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
				government = hms_government
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = annex_baltic_duchy }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no 
			has_recently_lost_war = no
			is_sphere_leader_of = UBD
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			OR = {
				RUS = {
					OR = {
						government = fascist_dictatorship
						government = proletarian_dictatorship
					}
					is_greater_power = yes
				}
				AND = { 
					UBD = { 
						vassal_of = THIS 
						NOT = { has_country_modifier = drang_nach_osten_country }
					}
					has_country_flag = incorporate_the_baltic_states
				}
			}
			OR = {
				government = absolute_monarchy
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
				government = hms_government
			}
			NOT = { war_policy = pacifism }
		}
		
		effect = {
			badboy = 15
			UBD = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = UBD value = -400 }
			release = UBD
			leave_alliance = UBD
			any_pop = {
				limit = { is_culture_group = baltic }
				militancy = 8
			}
			inherit = UBD
			set_global_flag = annex_baltic_duchy
			relation = { who = RUS value = -50 }
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = UBD }
				add_core = THIS
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = immigration_boom_baltic
					duration = 1825
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = drang_nach_osten
					duration = -1
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { is_core = UBD }
					has_pop_culture = baltic_german
				}
				reduce_pop = 1.1
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	incorporate_the_baltic_states = {
		picture = "annex_united_baltic_duchy"
		potential = {
			is_greater_power = yes	
			OR = { 
				tag = GER
				tag = GCF
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = scandinavian
					NOT = { primary_culture = finnish }
				}
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = incorporate_the_baltic_states }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
			exists = LVN
			exists = KSM
			exists = ESG
			LVN = {
				OR = { 
					is_vassal = no
					is_substate = no
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				primary_culture = baltic_german
				in_sphere = THIS
			}
			KSM = {
				OR = { 
					is_vassal = no
					is_substate = no
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				primary_culture = baltic_german
				in_sphere = THIS
			}
			ESG = {
				OR = { 
					is_vassal = no
					is_substate = no
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				primary_culture = baltic_german
				in_sphere = THIS
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			badboy = 2
			prestige = 10
			UBD = {
				inherit = LVN
				inherit = KSM
				inherit = ESG
				primary_culture = baltic_german
				any_owned = { 
					add_core = UBD remove_core = LVN remove_core = KSM remove_core = ESG
				}
				any_pop = {
					limit = { NOT = { is_culture_group = germanic } }
					militancy = 3
				}
				add_country_modifier = {
					name = drang_nach_osten_country
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			create_vassal = UBD
			diplomatic_influence = { who = UBD value = 400 }
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { vote_franschise = none_voting } }
				UBD = { 
					government = colonial_company 
					political_reform = none_voting 
				} 
			}
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NOT = { vote_franschise = none_voting } } UBD = { government = dominion } } }
			set_country_flag = incorporate_the_baltic_states
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

					}
				}

					set_global_flag = german_renamed_kandava
					clr_global_flag = latvian_renamed_kandava
					clr_global_flag = russian_renamed_kandava
					clr_global_flag = polish_renamed_kandava
				}
			}

				limit = {

						OR = {

							is_culture_group = baltic
						}
					}
				}

				owner = {

					clr_global_flag = german_renamed_kandava
					clr_global_flag = russian_renamed_kandava

					clr_global_flag = polish_renamed_pytalovo
				}
			}
			###Latvian###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 3568
					owner = {
						OR = { 
							primary_culture = latvian
							AND = {
								NOT = { is_culture_group = germanic }
								accepted_culture = latvian
							}
							is_culture_group = baltic
						}

	ober_ost = {
		picture = ober_ost
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = GCF
				tag = GER
			}
			has_global_flag = annex_baltic_duchy
			NOT = { has_global_flag = ober_ost_lit }
			is_greater_power = yes
			LIT = {
				all_core = {
					OR = {
						owned_by = THIS
						owner = {
							OR = {
								in_sphere = THIS
								vassal_of = THIS
								}
							war = no
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			revolution_n_counterrevolution = 1
			698 = { owned_by = THIS }
			LIT = {
				all_core = {
					OR = {
						owned_by = THIS
						owner = {
							OR = {
								in_sphere = THIS
								vassal_of = THIS
								}
							war = no
						}
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { war_policy = pacifism }
		}
		
		effect = {
			badboy = 10
			any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = lithuanian } militancy = 5 }
			698 = { remove_core = LIT } #Memel
			3576 = { remove_core = LIT } #
			697 = { remove_core = LIT } #
			3573 = { remove_core = LIT } #
			LIT = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			set_global_flag = ober_ost_lit
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

}
political_decisions = {

	eic_effects = {
		potential = { 
			tag = EIC
			NOT = {
				has_country_flag = eic_test
			}
		}
		allow = {
		}
		
		effect = {
			EIC = {
				add_country_modifier = {
					name = eic_balance 
					duration = -1
				}
			}
			ENG = {
				add_country_modifier = {
					name = eic_balance2
					duration = 8030
				}				
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = ENG
					ai = yes
				}
				add_country_modifier = {
					name = eic_balance2_ai
					duration = 7665
				}	
			}	
			set_country_flag = eic_test
		}
	}
	
	literacy_EIC = {
		potential = {
			tag = EIC
			always = no
		}
		
		allow = {
			tag = EIC
		}
		
		effect = {
		
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_religion = theravada
						has_pop_religion = hindu
						has_pop_religion = sunni
						has_pop_religion = shiite
						has_pop_religion = mahayana
						has_pop_religion = sikh
						has_pop_religion = animist
						culture = malayalam
						culture = afro_caribeno
						is_culture_group = south_asian
						is_culture_group = indo_iranian
						is_culture_group = native_american
						culture = central_american
						culture = mayan
						culture = afro_caribbean
						culture = afro_american
						culture = khoisan
						culture = karen
					}
				}
				literacy = -0.09
			}

				limit = { has_pop_religion = animist }
				literacy = -0.09
			}

				limit = { culture = anglo_indian }

			}

				limit = { strata = rich }
				literacy = 0.05
			}
			
			any_country = {
				limit = { capital_scope = { is_core = HND } civilized = no vassal_of = ENG }
				economic_reform = yes_monetary_reform
			}
		}
	}

	northern_transylvania_rename_hun = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			OR = { 
				primary_culture = hungarian
				tag = KUK
				tag = DNB
			}
			owns = 651
			owns = 654
			owns = 661
			owns = 2533
			owns = 660
			owns = 3633
			NOT = { has_global_flag = northern_transylvania_rename_hun }
		}
		
		allow = {
			#war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = northern_transylvania_rename_hun
			clr_global_flag = northern_transylvania_rename_rom
			prestige = 2
			651 = { 
				change_province_name = "Szatmár"
				state_scope = { change_region_name = "Észak-Erdély" }
			}
			654 = { change_province_name = "Kolozsvár" }
			2533 = { change_province_name = "Vásárhely" }
			661 = { change_province_name = "Beszterce" }
			660 = { change_province_name = "Udvarhely" }
			3633 = { change_province_name = "Nagybánya" }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	northern_transylvania_rename_rom = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			primary_culture = romanian
			owns = 651
			owns = 654
			owns = 661
			owns = 2533
			owns = 660
			owns = 3633
			NOT = { has_global_flag = northern_transylvania_rename_rom }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_global_flag = northern_transylvania_rename_rom
			clr_global_flag = northern_transylvania_rename_hun
			prestige = 2
			654 = { 
				change_province_name = "Cluj"
				state_scope = { change_region_name = "Transilvania de Nord" }
			}
			651 = { change_province_name = "Carei" }
			
			661 = { change_province_name = "Bistrita" }
			660 = { change_province_name = "Trei Scaune" }
			2533 = { change_province_name = "Târgu Mures" }
			3633 = { change_province_name = "Baia Mare" }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	northern_transylvania_rename_aus = {
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			is_culture_group = germanic
			NOT = { 
				OR = {
					tag = KUK
					tag = DNB
				}
			}
			owns = 651
			owns = 654

			owns = 2533
			owns = 660
			owns = 3633

				has_global_flag = northern_transylvania_rename_hun
				has_global_flag = northern_transylvania_rename_rom
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}

			clr_global_flag = northern_transylvania_rename_hun
			clr_global_flag = northern_transylvania_rename_rom
			651 = { 
				change_province_name = "Sathmar" 
				state_scope = { change_region_name = "Nord-Siebenbürgen" }
			}
			654 = { change_province_name = "Klausenburg" }
			661 = { change_province_name = "Bistritz" }

		}

	}

				AND = { owns = 694 NOT = { has_global_flag = west_prussia_rename_polish } }
				AND = { owns = 690 NOT = { has_global_flag = danzig_rename_polish } }
				AND = { owns = 691 NOT = { has_global_flag = tuchel_rename_polish } }
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = { province_id = 690 }
				690 = { change_province_name = "Gdánsk" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = danzig_rename_polish
					clr_global_flag = danzig_rename_german 
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { province_id = 694 }
				694 = { 
					change_province_name = "Torun" 
					state_scope = { change_region_name = "Pomorskie" }
				}
				692 = { change_province_name = "Walcz" }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = west_prussia_rename_polish
					clr_global_flag = west_prussia_rename_german
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { province_id = 691 }
				691 = { change_province_name = "Tuchola"  }
				owner = { 
					set_global_flag = west_prussia_rename_polish
					clr_global_flag = west_prussia_rename_german
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	haitian_integration = {
		picture = map_caribbean
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			OR = {
				government = hms_government
				government = democracy
			}
			slavery = no_slavery
			HAI = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = integrated_haiti }
		}
		allow = {
			biologism = 1
			NOT = { average_militancy = 3 }	
		}
		effect = {
			any_pop = {
				limit = { culture = afro_antillean }
				consciousness = -4
				militancy = -4
			}
			DOM = { all_core = { remove_core = HAI } }
			HAI = {
				all_core = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = core_integration
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = DOM }
				secede_province = DOM
			}
			add_accepted_culture = afro_antillean
			FRA = { set_country_flag = integrated_haiti }
			BOR = { set_country_flag = integrated_haiti }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

			BOR = { set_country_flag = walloon_autonomy }
			prestige = -25
			add_accepted_culture = wallonian
			random_country = {
				limit = { tag = BEL exists = no }
				BEL = { all_core = { remove_core = BEL } }
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = wallonian
				}
				consciousness = -5
				militancy = -5
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_primary_culture = yes
						is_accepted_culture = yes
					}
				}
				consciousness = 3
				militancy = 3
			}
			WLL = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

				SPA = { exists = yes is_greater_power = no NOT = { relation = { who = THIS value = 100 } } }

					owns = 573

					exists = yes

				relation = { who = THIS value = -100 }

			factor = 1
			modifier = { factor = 0 badboy = 0.5 }
		}

	remove_any_french_cores = {
		potential = {
			ai = yes
			OR = {
				any_owned_province = { is_core = BOR }
				any_owned_province = { is_core = FRA }
				primary_culture = french
				neighbour = FRA
				neighbour = BOR
			}
		}
		allow = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					FRA = { exists = yes }
					BOR = { exists = no }
					OR = {
						any_owned_province = { is_core = BOR }
						FRA = { any_owned_province = { is_core = BOR } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					BOR = { exists = yes }
					FRA = { exists = no }
					OR = {
						any_owned_province = { is_core = FRA }
						BOR = { any_owned_province = { is_core = FRA } }
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = { exists = FRA }
				BOR = { all_core = { remove_core = BOR add_core = FRA } }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { exists = BOR }
				FRA = { all_core = { remove_core = FRA add_core = BOR } }
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

			owns = 1380
			NOT = { owns = 1375 }
		}
		
		allow = {
			total_pops = 2000000
			OR = {
				money = 100000
				ai = yes
			}
			num_of_ports = 3
			total_amount_of_ships = 35
			NOT = { any_greater_power = { war_with = THIS } }
			NOT = { war_exhaustion = 5 }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = purchase_annam
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					exists = yes
					owns = 1375
				}
				country_event = 999600
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	support_troupes_de_marine = {
		picture = troupes_de_marine
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			colonial_nation = yes
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = troupes_de_marine }
		}
		
		allow = {
			naval_professionalism = 1
		}
		
		effect = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = troupes_de_marine
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
}#Search 
political_decisions = {
	the_quebec_question = {
		picture = vive_le_quebec
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			NOT = { 
				exists = CAN 
				exists = QUE
				exists = FCA
				exists = ACA
				QUE = { any_core = { controlled_by = THIS } }
			}
			has_country_flag = french_america
			NOT = { has_country_flag = demanded_quebec }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			NOT = { truce_with = ENG }
			money = 200000
		}
		
		effect = {
			FRA = { set_country_flag = demanded_quebec }
			BOR = { set_country_flag = demanded_quebec }
			ENG = { country_event = 7790003 }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	#Treaty of Paris - Gets France Quebec and British Acadia, does not get the rest of British North America
	treaty_of_paris = {
		picture = treaty_signing
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			has_country_flag = french_america
			has_country_flag = war_for_quebec
			NOT = { has_country_flag = quebec_regained }
		}

		allow = {
			money = 100000
			OR = {
				AND = {
					QUE = { any_core = { OR = { controlled_by = REB controlled_by = THIS } } }
					ENG = { war_exhaustion = 10 }
					NOT = { national_provinces_occupied = 0.05 }
					NOT = { war_exhaustion = 35 }
				}	
				AND = { 
					truce_with = ENG
					is_greater_power = yes
					ENG = {
						NOT = { war_with = THIS }
						is_disarmed = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}

		effect = {
			FRA = { 
				set_country_flag = quebec_regained 
				set_country_flag = quebec_and_acadia_only
			}
			BOR = { 
				set_country_flag = quebec_regained 
				set_country_flag = quebec_and_acadia_only
			}
			prestige = 10
			badboy = 5
			treasury = -100000
			random_owned = { 
				limit = { owner = { war_with = ENG } }
				owner = { end_war = ENG }
				any_country = { limit = { war_with = THIS alliance_with = ENG } end_war = THIS }
			}
			CAN_60 = { add_core = QUE }
			2625 = { add_core = QUE }
			76 = { add_core = QUE }
			77 = { add_core = QUE }
			CAN_60 = { add_core = QUE }
			ENG = { 
				any_owned = { limit = { OR = { is_core = QUE is_core = ACA } } secede_province = THIS } 
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = french_canadian } move_pop = 65 }
			}
			RPL = { any_owned = { limit = { OR = { is_core = QUE is_core = ACA } } secede_province = THIS } }
			QUE = { 
				all_core = {
					remove_core = THIS 
					remove_core = CAN 
					remove_core = RPL
					remove_core = NEW
				} 
			}
			USA = { remove_accepted_culture = cajun }
			remove_accepted_culture = cajun
		}

		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	#Full Treaty of Paris - Gives the whole of British North America
	treaty_of_paris2 = {
		picture = establish_panfrenchism
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			has_country_flag = french_america
			has_country_flag = war_for_quebec
			NOT = { has_country_flag = quebec_regained }
		}

		allow = {
			has_recently_lost_war = no
			truce_with = ENG
			money = 50000
			is_greater_power = yes
			ENG = {
				NOT = { war_with = THIS }
				is_disarmed = yes
			}
		}

		effect = {
			FRA = { set_country_flag = french_total_victory set_country_flag = quebec_regained }
			BOR = { set_country_flag = french_total_victory set_country_flag = quebec_regained}
			badboy = 10
			QUE = { all_core = { add_core = THIS } }
			treasury = -50000
			prestige = 15
			2625 = { add_core = QUE	}
			76 = { add_core = QUE }
			ENG = {
				any_owned = { 
					limit = { OR = { is_core = CAN is_core = MRU is_core = NEW is_core = QUE is_core = COL is_core = RPL } }
					remove_core = ENG
					secede_province = THIS
				}
			}
			RPL = { annex_to = THIS }
			any_owned = { limit = { OR = { province_id = 74 province_id = 75 } } secede_province = ENG }
		}

		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	#Organize Acadia
	organize_acadia = {
		picture = "organize_acadia"
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			has_country_flag = quebec_regained
			owns = 71
			NOT = { 
				exists = MRU 
				exists = ACA
				exists = FCA
				has_country_flag = acadia_organized 
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			money = 50000
			war = no
			ACA = { all_core = { owned_by = THIS } }
		}
		
		effect = {
			money = -50000
			ACA = { set_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
			any_pop = { 
				limit = { 
					location = { is_core = ACA } 
					culture = french_canadian 
				} 
				militancy = -10
				consciousness = -10
				reduce_pop = 2
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { is_core = ACA }
					culture = anglo_canadian
					OR = {
						type = soldiers
						type = officers
					}
				}
				move_pop = 57
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { is_core = ACA }
					culture = yankee
					OR = {
						type = soldiers
						type = officers
					}
				}
				move_pop = 243
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { is_core = ACA }
					type = craftsmen
					is_state_religion = no
				}
				move_pop = 46
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					culture = french
					type = soldiers
					location = { continent = europe }
				}
				move_pop = 72
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = french
					type = soldiers
					location = { continent = europe }
				}
				move_pop = 72
			}
			random_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_culture = french
					type = soldiers
					location = { continent = europe }
				}
				move_pop = 71
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						is_core = ACA
					}
					type = soldiers
					has_pop_culture = anglo_canadian
				}
				move_pop = 57
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = {
						is_core = ACA
					}
					type = soldiers
					has_pop_culture = yankee
				}
				move_pop = 243
			}	
			any_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = ACA }
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = french_colonial_integration
					duration = 1825
				}
			}
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = french_total_victory } } 
				ACA = { all_core = { add_core = FCA remove_core = ACA } }
			}
			###Set Acadia Flag Based on whether Bourbon/Napoleonic###
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { tag = FRA OR = { government = hms_government government = absolute_monarchy government = prussian_constitutionalism } } ACA = { government = hms_government } } }
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { tag = BOR } } ACA = { government = colonial_company } }
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NOT = { colonial_policy = settlement } } } owner = { political_reform = settlement } }
			FRA = { set_country_flag = acadia_organized }
			BOR = { set_country_flag = acadia_organized }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	organize_canada = {
		picture = "vive_le_quebec"
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			NOT = {
				exists = QUE 
				exists = ACA
				exists = ULA
				exists = FCA
			}
			has_country_flag = quebec_regained
			NOT = { has_country_flag = canada_organized }
		}
		
		allow = {
			money = 100001
			war = no
			owns = 65
			owns = 2625
			owns = 2592
			owns = 71
		}
		
		effect = {
			###Effects that will happen if either the Treaty of Montreal or Paris is taken###
			treasury = -100000
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					location = { is_core = QUE }
					culture = anglo_canadian
					OR = {
						type = soldiers
						type = officers
					}
				}
				move_pop = 57
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = anglo_canadian 
						culture = irish
						culture = british
					}
				}
				consciousness = 7
				militancy = 7
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { 
				has_pop_culture = british
				location = { is_core = QUE } }
				move_pop = 57
			}
			2593 = { state_scope = { change_region_name = "Nord-du-Québec" } }
			65 = { change_province_name = "Québec" state_scope = { change_region_name = "Québec" } }
			58 = { change_province_name = "Montréal" }
			63 = { change_province_name = "Témiscaming" }
			70 = { change_province_name = "Île Saint-Jean" }
			73 = { change_province_name = "Île-Royale" }
			71 = { state_scope = { change_region_name = "Acadie" } }
			77 = { add_core = QUE }
			MRU = { all_core = { remove_core = MRU } }
			###British Acadia###
			any_pop = {
				limit = { location = { province_id = 72 } culture = french_canadian } 
				reduce_pop = 1.5
				militancy = -10
				consciousness = -10
			}
			###End of Common Effects###
			
			###Effects for Treaty of Paris - This will end the French Goals in North America###
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = quebec_and_acadia_only } }
				USA = { all_core = { remove_core = ACA } } #Removes Acadian Cores from the US
				ULA = { all_core = { remove_core = ULA } }
				owner = { badboy = -5 } #Reduces your infamy for dropping the rest of your claims
				46 = { state_scope = { change_region_name = "Southern Ontario" } }
				QUE = { all_core = { remove_core = ENG remove_core = THIS remove_core = RPL remove_core = CAN remove_core = NEW } }
				THIS = {
					any_owned = {
						limit = { is_core = QUE }
						add_province_modifier = {
							name = french_colonial_integration
							duration = 1825
						}
					}	
				}
				FRA = { set_country_flag = no_more_north_america }
				BOR = { set_country_flag = no_more_north_america }	
			}
			
			###Effects for Treaty of Montreal - Will change cores for the whole of British North America###
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = french_total_victory } }
				COL = { all_core = { remove_core = COL remove_core = ENG remove_core = THIS add_core = FCA } }
				CAN = { all_core = { add_core = FCA remove_core = ENG remove_core = THIS remove_core = CAN remove_core = COL remove_core = MRU } }
				RPL = { annex_to = THIS government = democracy all_core = { add_core = FCA remove_core = ENG remove_core = THIS remove_core = COL } }
				74 = { change_province_name = "Québec" state_scope = { change_region_name = "Terre-Neuve" } }
				QUE = { all_core = { add_core = FCA remove_core = ENG remove_core = THIS remove_core = RPL remove_core = CAN remove_core = NEW remove_core = QUE } }
				ACA = { all_core = { add_core = ACA remove_core = ENG remove_core = THIS } }
				owner = {
					any_owned = {
						limit = { is_core = FCA }
						add_province_modifier = {
							name = french_colonial_integration
							duration = 1825
						}
					}	
				}
				FCA = { 
					remove_accepted_culture = french
					add_accepted_culture = anglo_canadian
					set_country_flag = post_colonial_country 
				}
			}
			###Set Canada Flag Based on whether Bourbon/Napoleonic###
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { tag = FRA OR = { government = hms_government government = absolute_monarchy government = prussian_constitutionalism } } ACA = { government = hms_government } } }
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { tag = BOR } } FCA = { government = colonial_company } }
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NOT = { colonial_policy = settlement } } } owner = { political_reform = settlement } }
			FRA = { set_country_flag = canada_organized }
			BOR = { set_country_flag = canada_organized }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	french_louisiana = {
		picture = new_france_louisiana
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			has_country_flag = french_total_victory
			has_country_flag = french_america
			has_country_flag = canada_organized
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = war_for_louisiana 
				exists = ULA
				exists = FCA
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			NOT = { truce_with = USA }
			NOT = { war_policy = pacifism }
			NOT = { revolution_n_counterrevolution = 1 }
		}
		
		effect = {
			badboy = 25
			USA = {
				add_casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = cut_down_to_size
					months = 60
				}
			}
			FRA = { set_country_flag = war_for_louisiana }
			BOR = { set_country_flag = war_for_louisiana }
			relation = { who = USA value = -200 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = USA value = -200 }
			leave_alliance = USA
			random_country = { limit = { tag = USA vassal_of = THIS } THIS = { release_vassal = USA } }
			random_country = { limit = { is_our_vassal = USA NOT = { tag = THIS } } relation = { who = THIS value = -200 } leave_alliance = THIS }
			any_pop = { dominant_issue = { factor = 0.05 value = jingoism } consciousness = 2 }
			casus_belli = {
				target = USA
				type = cut_down_to_size
				months = 12
			}
			war = {
				target = USA
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size }
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						has_pop_culture = mexican 
						has_pop_culture = yankee 
						has_pop_culture = british
						has_pop_culture = anglo_canadian
					}
				}
				militancy = 6
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_greater_power = yes
					NOT = { truce_with = THIS }
				}
				casus_belli = {
					target = THIS
					type = cut_down_to_size
					months = 24
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	#
	treaty_of_new_york = {
		picture = establish_panfrenchism
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425
			has_country_flag = war_for_louisiana
			NOT = { has_global_flag = treaty_of_new_york }
		}

		allow = {
			money = 75000
			USA = {
				is_disarmed = yes
				truce_with = THIS
			}
		}

		effect = {
			set_global_flag = treaty_of_new_york
			clr_global_flag = american_frontier
			###Secede Southern Ontario to USA###
			CAN_46 = { add_core = USA }
			51 = { remove_core = USA }
			50 = { remove_core = USA }
			USA = {
				remove_accepted_culture = cajun
				###Add Lousiana Cores###
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							region = USA_139 #Louisiana
							region = USA_144 #Arkansas
							region = USA_148 #Missouri
							region = USA_118 #North Dakota
							region = USA_121 #South Dakota
							region = USA_124 #Nebraska
							region = USA_151 #Idaho
							region = USA_158 #Iowa
							region = USA_126 #Kansas
							region = USA_129 #Oklahoma
							region = USA_111 #Wyoming
							region = USA_116 #Montana
							region = USA_78 #Washington
							region = USA_81 #Oregon
							region = USA_91 #Idaho
							province_id = 106
							province_id = 78
							province_id = 79
						}
						NOT = { 
							province_id = 129 
							province_id = 110
							province_id = 107
							province_id = 128
							#
							province_id = 103
							province_id = 109
							province_id = 108
							province_id = 3398
							province_id = 3399
						}
					}
					add_core = ULA
				}
				# - cleanup for next event.
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = CAL
							is_core = DES
							is_core = TEX
						}
					}
					remove_core = CAL
					remove_core = DES
					remove_core = TEX
				}
				#
				###Population Transfers
				any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = french_canadian } move_pop = 65 }
				###Remove Acadia Cores###
				any_owned = { limit = { is_core = ACA } remove_core = ACA }
				###Secede Provinces
				any_owned = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							is_core = ULA
							is_core = ACA
							is_core = FCA
						}
					}
					secede_province = THIS
				}
				treasury = 75000
			}
			ULA = { all_core = { remove_core = FCA } }
			THIS = {
				any_owned = {
					limit = { is_core = USA 
					NOT = { is_core = ACA is_core = ULA region = USA_78 } }
					secede_province = USA
					remove_core = THIS
					remove_core = FCA
				}
			}
			###Turn all these states into colonies
			any_owned = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						region = USA_118 #North Dakota
						region = USA_121 #South Dakota
						region = USA_124 #Nebraska
						region = USA_151 #Idaho
						region = USA_158 #Iowa
						region = USA_126 #Kansas
						region = USA_111 #Wyoming
						region = USA_116 #Montana
						region = USA_78 #Washington
						region = USA_81 #Oregon
						region = USA_91 #Idaho
						province_id = 106
						province_id = 78
						province_id = 79
					}
				}
				secede_province = UTI
			}
			inherit = UTI
			treasury = -75000
			USA = { any_pop = { limit = { has_pop_culture = french_canadian } move_pop = 71 } }
			FCA = { remove_accepted_culture = anglo_canadian }
			random_country = {
				limit = { tag = FCA }
				any_owned = {
					limit = { region = CAN_46 }
					remove_core = FCA
					secede_province = USA
				}
			}
			46 = { state_scope = { change_region_name = "Southern Ontario" } }
			
		}

		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	become_the_fsa_french_lousiana = {
		potential = {
			tag = USA
			ai = yes
			NOT = { owns = 139 }
			has_global_flag = treaty_of_new_york
			exists = CSA
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = no_more_war }
			has_global_flag = american_civil_war_has_happened
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			release_vassal = CAL
			release_vassal = DES
			release_vassal = TEX
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					owned_by = USA
					is_core = USA
				}
				add_core = FSA
			}
			change_tag = FSA
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	organize_louisiana	= {
		picture = "new_france_louisiana"
		potential = {
			primary_culture = french
			is_greater_power = yes
			capital = 425

			has_global_flag = treaty_of_new_york

				has_country_flag = louisiana_organized 
				exists = ULA
			}
		}
		allow = {
			money = 150000
			war = no
		}
		effect = {
			money = -150000
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						region = USA_139 #Louisiana

						region = USA_148 #Missouri

						region = USA_121 #South Dakota

						region = USA_81 #Oregon

						province_id = 78
						province_id = 79
					}
					NOT = { 
						province_id = 129 
						province_id = 110
						province_id = 107
						province_id = 128
						#
						province_id = 103
						province_id = 109
						province_id = 108
						province_id = 3398

				limit = { is_core = ALD }

			}
			ALD = {
				tech_school = unciv_tech_school
				government = colonial_company

			}
			1700 = { 
				change_province_name = "Alger" 
				state_scope = { change_region_name = "Alger" }
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	louisiana_rename = {
		picture = new_france_louisiana
		potential = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					OR = { 
						primary_culture = french_canadian
						primary_culture = neo_zelandais
						primary_culture = french_australian
						primary_culture = cajun
						primary_culture = louisianan
						is_culture_group = french
					}
					OR = { 
						AND = { owns = 139 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_louisiana } }
						AND = { owns = 143 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_arkansas } }
						AND = { owns = 130 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_oklahoma } }
						AND = { owns = 148 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_missouri } }
						AND = { owns = 154 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_iowa } }
						AND = { owns = 127 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_kansas } }
						AND = { owns = 124 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_nebraska } }
						AND = { owns = 155 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_minnesota } }
						AND = { owns = 120 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_south_dakota } }
						AND = { owns = 117 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_north_dakota } }
						AND = { owns = 112 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_wyoming } }
						AND = { owns = 78 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_washington } }
						AND = { owns = 81 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_oregon } }
						AND = { owns = 91 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_idaho } }
					}
				}
				AND = {
					is_culture_group = american_cultures
					OR = { 
						AND = { owns = 139 has_global_flag = french_renamed_louisiana }
						AND = { owns = 143 has_global_flag = french_renamed_arkansas }
						AND = { owns = 130 has_global_flag = french_renamed_oklahoma }
						AND = { owns = 148 has_global_flag = french_renamed_missouri }
						AND = { owns = 154 has_global_flag = french_renamed_iowa }
						AND = { owns = 127 has_global_flag = french_renamed_kansas }
						AND = { owns = 124 has_global_flag = french_renamed_nebraska }
						AND = { owns = 155 has_global_flag = french_renamed_minnesota }
						AND = { owns = 120 has_global_flag = french_renamed_south_dakota }
						AND = { owns = 117 has_global_flag = french_renamed_north_dakota }
						AND = { owns = 112 has_global_flag = french_renamed_wyoming }
						AND = { owns = 78 has_global_flag = french_renamed_washington }
						AND = { owns = 81 has_global_flag = french_renamed_oregon }
						AND = { owns = 91 has_global_flag = french_renamed_idaho }
					}
				}
			}

	canada_rename_french = {
		picture = vive_le_quebec
		potential = {
			OR = {
				is_culture_group = french
				primary_culture = french_canadian
				primary_culture = louisianan
				primary_culture = cajun
			}
			OR = { 
				AND = { owns = 48 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_northern_ontario } }
				AND = { owns = 37 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_manitoba } }
				AND = { owns = 13 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_columbia } }
				AND = { owns = 48 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_columbia } }
				AND = { owns = 1 NOT = { has_global_flag = french_renamed_columbia } }
				
			}
		}
		
		allow = { war = no }
		
		effect = {
			###French###
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 48
					owner = {
						OR = {
							is_culture_group = french
							primary_culture = french_canadian
							primary_culture = louisianan
							primary_culture = cajun
						}
					}
				}
				46 = { state_scope = { change_region_name = "Sud de l'Ontario" } }
				47 = { state_scope = { change_region_name = "Nord de l'Ontario" } }
				48 = { change_province_name = "Fort des Français" }
				49 = { change_province_name = "Portage-aux-Rats" }
				50 = { change_province_name = "Baie du Tonnerre" }
				2594 = { change_province_name = "Mishkeegogamang" }
				owner = { set_global_flag = french_renamed_northern_ontario }
			}
			##Manitoba

				limit = {

						}
					}
				}

	request_military_aid = {
		picture = "military_aid"
		potential = { 
			is_greater_power = no
			part_of_sphere = yes
			civilized = yes

				OR = {
					primary_culture = north_german
					primary_culture = south_german
					primary_culture = north_italian
					primary_culture = south_italian
					primary_culture = central_italian
					primary_culture = sicilian
					primary_culture = dalmatian
					primary_culture = insular
					primary_culture = maltese
				}
			}
			OR = {
				capital_scope = { continent = north_america }
				capital_scope = { continent = south_america }
				capital_scope = { continent = europe }		
			}
		}
		allow = {
			money = 10000
			NOT = { sphere_owner = { alliance_with = THIS } }

				any_greater_power = { 
					war_with = THIS
				}

					war_with = THIS
				}
				AUS = {
					war_with = THIS
				}
			}
		}

				country_event = { id=99920 days=7 }
			}
			prestige = -5
			set_country_flag = requested_military_aid
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

			NOT = { has_country_flag = embraced_jews }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			year = 1850
			OR = {
				government = absolute_monarchy
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
				government = hms_government
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = embraced_jews
			any_pop = {
				limit = { 
					NOT = { has_pop_religion = jewish }
				}
				militancy = 1
				consciousness = 2
			}
			add_accepted_culture = ashkenazi
			any_pop = {
				limit = { 
					culture = ashkenazi
					location = { province_id = 619 } #Vienna
				}
				militancy = -10
				consciousness = -10
				reduce_pop = 2
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { 
					has_pop_religion = jewish
				}
				militancy = -10
				consciousness = -10
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	peace_of_prague = { #Lets AI Austria Take Sigmaringen if they win brother's war/white peace AI Prussia
		picture = gtfo
		potential = {
			tag = AUS
			ai = yes

					exists = yes

				}

					NOT = { exists = SGM }
					594 = { owned_by = PRU } #Sigmaringen

			}
			NOT = { 
				exists = NGF
				exists = SGF
				exists = GER 
				exists = GCF
				has_country_flag = brothers_war_loser
			}
			OR = { 
				BAV = { in_sphere = THIS }
				BAD = { in_sphere = THIS }
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = ai_demand_sigmaringen }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			truce_with = PRU
			PRU = {
				has_recently_lost_war = yes 
				war_exhaustion = 40
			}
			OR = {
				has_country_modifier = brothers_war_aggressor
				has_country_flag = brothers_war_winner
			}
			NOT = { exists = NGF }
		}
		
		effect = {

			badboy = 5

			any_country = {

			factor = 1
		}

	leipzig_congress = {
		picture = german_confederation
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = KUK
				tag = AUS
			}
			NOT = {
				exists = GCF
				exists = GER
				exists = RHI
			}
			OR = {
				FRA = { has_country_flag = annexed_rhineland }
				BOR = { has_country_flag = annexed_rhineland }
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = leipzig_congress }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_greater_power = yes
			nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
		}
		
		effect = {
			badboy = 5
			CRO = { all_core = { add_core = HUN } }
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_core = HUN
						is_core = CRO
					}
					NOT = { is_core = DLM }
				}
				remove_core = KUK
			}
			KUK = { all_core = { add_core = AUS } }
			GER = { all_core = { add_core = GCF } }
			RHI = { all_core = { add_core = GCF } }
			GCF = { all_core = { remove_core = GER } }
			change_tag = GCF
			inherit = NGF
			inherit = SGF
			add_accepted_culture = north_german
			add_accepted_culture = siebenburger
			# #
			add_accepted_culture = danube_german
			add_accepted_culture = carpathian_german
			add_accepted_culture = baltic_german
			#
			add_accepted_culture = volga_german
			remove_accepted_culture = hungarian
			set_global_flag = leipzig_congress
			set_global_flag = 3hurrahs
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_culture_group = germanic
					exists = no
					NOT = { tag = PRU }
					NOT = { tag = BAN }
					#NOT = { tag = UBD }
					NOT = { tag = LVN }
					NOT = { tag = KSM }
					NOT = { tag = ESG }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
					OR = {
						all_core = { owned_by = THIS }
						tag = NGF
						tag = SGF
					}
				}
				country_event = 11105
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					is_culture_group = germanic
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						is_culture_group = germanic
						AND = { 
							is_culture_group = germanic
							in_sphere = THIS
						}
						tag = SCH
						AND = {
							tag = BAV
							ai = yes
						}
						AND = {
							tag = PRU
							ai = yes
						}
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = KUK
						tag = AUS
						tag = DNB
						tag = BAN
						#tag = UBD
						tag = LVN
						tag = KSM
						tag = ESG
						tag = VLG
						tag = LIE
						tag = SIE
						tag = TSX
						capital_scope = { continent = africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = west_africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = central_africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = east_africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = south_west_africa }
						capital_scope = { continent = asia }
					}
					NOT = { 
						vassal_of = FRA 
						vassal_of = BOR
					}
					OR = {
						is_vassal = no
						vassal_of = THIS
						vassal_of = PRU
					}
					NOT = { has_country_flag = post_colonial_country }
				}
				country_event = 11101
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					primary_culture = french
					is_greater_power = yes
					capital = 425
				}	
				country_event = 72752
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	sykes_picot_agreement_no_great_war = { #Carve up the Ottoman Empire without a Great War
		picture = "sykes_picot"
		potential = { 
			tag = ENG
			is_disarmed = no
			OR = {
				TUR = { has_country_flag = ottomans_to_turks }
				has_country_flag = turks_defy_congress
			}
			TUR = {
				is_greater_power = no
				is_secondary_power = no
				owns = 917
				owns = 913
				owns = 926
				owns = 908
				owns = 900
				owns = 902
				owns = 897
			}
			OR = { 
				relation = { who = FRA value = 100 }
				relation = { who = BOR value = 100 }
			}
			NOT = { has_global_flag = sykes_picot }
			NOT = { year = 1900 }
		}
		
		allow = {
			TUR = {
				part_of_sphere = no
			}
			NOT = {
				FRA = { alliance_with = TUR }
				BOR = { alliance_with = TUR }
			}
			war = no
			is_greater_power = yes
			revolution_n_counterrevolution = 1
			OR = {
				FRA = { 
					exists = yes
					alliance_with = THIS
					war = no
					NOT = { truce_with = THIS }
				}
				BOR = { 
					exists = yes
					alliance_with = THIS
					war = no
					NOT = { truce_with = THIS }
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = sykes_picot_agreed
			set_global_flag = sykes_picot
			badboy = 6
			prestige = 10
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						religion = sunni
						religion = shiite
					}
				}
				consciousness = 8	
				militancy = 8
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					primary_culture = french
					capital = 425
				}	
				country_event = 99972
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				any_greater_power = { alliance_with = TUR }
			}
		}
	}

	clean_up_unciv_monarchy = {
		potential = {

					civilized = no

			}

				government = democracy

				government = hms_government
			}

		}

					}

			}
			NOT = {

					has_country_flag = clean_up_colonial_government 
					has_country_flag = dominion_gov
				}
			}
		}

			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			random_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = ALD }
				owner = { 
					primary_culture = french
					add_accepted_culture = maghrebi
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { is_core = TAI }
				owner = { 
					primary_culture = japanese
					add_accepted_culture = min
				}
			}
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { OR = { vote_franschise = none_voting civilized = no } } } 
				owner = { 
					clr_country_flag = everywhere_genocide_only
					clr_country_flag = non_colonial_genocide_only
					clr_country_flag = colonial_genocide_only
					clr_country_flag = preparations_to_kill
					remove_country_modifier = preparations_to_kill
					clr_country_flag = communist_gov
					clr_country_flag = absolute_monarchy_gov
					clr_country_flag = semi_constitutional_monarchy_gov
					clr_country_flag = constitutional_monarchy_gov
					clr_country_flag = democracy_gov
					clr_country_flag = presidential_dictatorship_gov
					clr_country_flag = fascist_gov
					clr_country_flag = anarcho_liberal_gov
					clr_country_flag = dominion_gov
					set_country_flag = clean_up_colonial_government
					government = colonial_company 
				}
			}
			random_owned = { limit = { owner = { NOT = { vote_franschise = none_voting } } } 
				owner = {
					clr_country_flag = everywhere_genocide_only
					clr_country_flag = non_colonial_genocide_only
					clr_country_flag = colonial_genocide_only
					clr_country_flag = preparations_to_kill
					remove_country_modifier = preparations_to_kill
					random_owned = { limit = { owner = { border_policy = closed_borders } } owner = { political_reform = open_borders } }
					clr_country_flag = communist_gov
					clr_country_flag = absolute_monarchy_gov
					clr_country_flag = semi_constitutional_monarchy_gov
					clr_country_flag = constitutional_monarchy_gov
					clr_country_flag = democracy_gov
					clr_country_flag = presidential_dictatorship_gov
					clr_country_flag = fascist_gov
					clr_country_flag = anarcho_liberal_gov
					clr_country_flag = clean_up_colonial_government
					set_country_flag = dominion_gov
					government = dominion 
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	clean_up_freed_colonial_govt = {
		potential = {
			is_vassal = no
			OR = {
				government = colonial_company
				government = dominion
			}
			NOT = { 
				tag = EIC 
				tag = MCK
				tag = IMG
				tag = SER
			}
			OR = {
				NOT = { tag = EGY }
				AND = {
					tag = EGY
					NOT = { has_global_flag = egypt_submitted_to_ottomans }
				}
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_vassal = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = clean_up_unciv_monarchy
			clr_country_flag = clean_up_colonial_government
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { civilized = yes } }
				owner = { government = democracy }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { owner = { civilized = no } }
				owner = { government = absolute_monarchy }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = ALD
					owner = { primary_culture = french }					
				}
				owner = { 
					primary_culture = maghrebi
					remove_accepted_culture = maghrebi
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = HDJ
					owner = { tag = HDJ }
				}
				owner = { government = absolute_monarchy }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = { 
						OR = {
							tag = MOL
							tag = WAL
						}	
					}
				}
				owner = { government = prussian_constitutionalism }
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						OR = {
							tag = NOR 
							tag = NEW
							tag = RHO
							tag = SAF
							tag = CAN
							tag = NZL

							tag = COL

							tag = MSK
						}
					} 	
				}
				owner = { government = hms_government }
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

political_decisions = {
	qingdao_treaty_port_ger = { 
		picture = "qingdao_treaty_port_ger"
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = GER
				tag = GCF
			}
			is_greater_power = yes
			1566 = { owner = { civilized = no NOT = { war_with = THIS } } }
			2531 = { owned_by = THIS } #NewGuinea
			OR = {
				government = absolute_monarchy
				government = prussian_constitutionalism
				government = hms_government
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = qingdao_treaty_port_ger }
		}
		
		allow = {
			steel_steamers = 1
			1566 = { owner = { civilized = no } }
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = qingdao_treaty_port_ger
			1566 = { secede_province = THIS change_controller = THIS }
			add_country_modifier = { name = chinese_treaty_port duration = 1095 }
			prestige = 10
			random_country = {
				limit = { tag = QNG exists = yes }
				set_variable = { which = china_destablization value = 1 }
			}
		}
			
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	treaty_of_macao = {
		picture = treaty_of_nanking
		potential = {
			tag = QNG
			has_global_flag = kowloon_incident
			truce_with = ENG
			owns = 1496
			NOT = { 
				has_recently_lost_war = yes 
				has_country_flag = treaty_of_macao
			}
		}

		allow = {
			truce_with = ENG
			war = no
		}

		effect = {
			set_country_flag = treaty_of_macao
			prestige_factor = 0.05
			any_pop = {
				limit = { is_culture_group = east_asian }
				scaled_consciousness = { factor = -2 }
				scaled_militancy = { factor = -2 }
			}
			any_owned = {
				remove_province_modifier = western_presence
				remove_province_modifier = foreign_smugglers
				remove_province_modifier = foreign_trading_post
				remove_province_modifier = local_opium_habit
				remove_province_modifier = european_military_mission
				remove_province_modifier = legation_quarter
				remove_province_modifier = kettler_denkmal
				remove_province_modifier = extraterritoriality_granted
			}
			ENG = { prestige = -15 }
			set_variable = { which = china_destablization value = -5 }
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	treaty_of_tientsin = {
		picture = treaty_of_nanking
		potential = {
			tag = ENG
			has_global_flag = second_opium_war
			has_country_modifier = negotiating_treaty

			prestige = 10
			badboy = -3
			remove_country_modifier = negotiating_treaty
			set_global_flag = second_opium_war_treaty

				life_rating = 3
				secede_province = QNG

					name = western_presence

				}

					name = foreign_trading_post
					duration = -1
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = baby_boom
					duration = 720
				}
			}
			QNG = {
				any_pop = {
					limit = { is_state_religion = yes }
					scaled_consciousness = { factor = 2 issue = moralism }
					scaled_militancy = { factor = 5 issue = moralism }
				}
				remove_country_modifier = negotiating_unequal_treaty
				plurality = -5
				religion = protestant
				set_country_flag = protestant_country
				set_country_flag = gave_up_2nd_opium
				clr_country_flag = change_to_protestant
				set_country_flag = missionary_activity
				set_variable = { which = china_destablization value = 1 }
				add_country_modifier = { name = missionary_activity duration = -1 }
			}
			add_country_modifier = { name = chinese_treaty_port duration = 1095 }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
				modifier = {
					factor = 0
					tag = ENG
					NOT = { owns = 1496 }
				}
		}
	}

				}

				}

					NOT = { war_with = THIS }
				}
			}
			money = 150000
		}

			1616 = { naval_base = 3 }

				limit = { province_id = 1569 }
				1569 = { naval_base = 3}
			}

				limit = { 
					exists = yes

						tag = ENG

						tag = GCF
					}
				}

			}

				owner = { military_reform = yes_foreign_navies }
