				remove_country_modifier = fanatic_army
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					is_culture_group = east_asian
				}
				consciousness = -1
				militancy = -1
			}
			random_country = {

					has_country_flag = black_flag_war
					owns = 1364
				}
				release = CAM
				THIS = { create_vassal = CAM prestige = 10 }
			}

				limit = {
					has_country_flag = black_flag_war
					owns = 1356
				}

				THIS = { create_vassal = LUA prestige = 10 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = black_flag_war
					owns = 1346
					owns = 1348
				}
				release = SIA
				THIS = { create_vassal = SIA prestige = 25 }
			}
			create_vassal = DAI
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

political_decisions = {
	colonial_reconquista = {
		picture = spain_reconquest
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = IBR
				tag = SPC
			}
			NOT = { year = 1890 }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = reconquista }
		}

		allow = {
			is_greater_power = yes
			war = no
			war_policy = jingoism
		}

		effect = {
			prestige = 5
			badboy = 3
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						capital_scope = { continent = south_america }
						capital_scope = { continent = north_america }
					}
					NOT = { 
						tag = USA
						tag = TEX
						tag = BRZ
					}
				}
				country_event = {
					id = 99988
					days = 15
				}
			}	
			any_pop = {
				limit = { 
					is_culture_group = iberian
					pop_majority_ideology = reactionary
				}
				militancy = -5
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { 
					is_culture_group = iberian
					pop_majority_ideology = conservative
				}
				militancy = -5
			}
			any_pop = {
				limit = { 
					is_culture_group = iberian
					pop_majority_ideology = liberal
				}
				militancy = 2
			}
			set_global_flag = reconquista
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	
	colonial_reconquista_frca = {
		picture = map_central_america
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = IBR
				tag = SPC
			}
			UCA = {
				exists = yes
				num_of_revolts = 1
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = reconquista_frca }
		}

		allow = {
			is_greater_power = yes
			war = no

		}

				target = UCA
				type = conquest
				months = 12
			}
			war = {
				target = UCA
				attacker_goal = { casus_belli = conquest }
				defender_goal = { casus_belli = status_quo }
				call_ally = no
			}
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	return_cores_CGC = { 
		picture = return_cores_img
		potential = {
			primary_culture = spanish
			CGC = { vassal_of = THIS} 
			any_owned_province = { is_core = CGC NOT = { is_core = THIS } } 
		}
		allow = { war = no } 		
		effect = {  any_owned = { limit = { NOT = { is_core = THIS } is_core = CGC } secede_province = CGC } } 
	}

	colony_rebel_again = {
		picture = spain_reconquest
		potential = {
			OR = {
				tag = UCA
				tag = ARG
				tag = ARC
				tag = BOL
				tag = CHL
				tag = CLM	
				tag = ECU
				tag = PRG
				tag = PEU
				tag = URU
				tag = VNZ
				tag = VNG
				tag = VLP
				tag = CGC
				tag = VNS
				tag = PHL
				tag = VOP
			}
			government = colonial_company
			NOT = {
				vassal_of = SPC
				vassal_of = SPA
				vassal_of = IBR
			}
			NOT = { has_country_flag = colony_rebel_again }
		}

		allow = {
			war = no
		}

		effect = {
			government = democracy
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = VNG
					exists = yes
					is_vassal = no
				}
				government = democracy
				change_tag = GCO
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = VOP
					exists = yes
					is_vassal = no
				}
				government = democracy
				change_tag = PBC
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = VLP
					exists = yes
					is_vassal = no
				}
				government = democracy
				change_tag = LPL
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = CGC
					exists = yes
					is_vassal = no
				}
				government = democracy
				change_tag = CHL
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = VNS
					exists = yes
					is_vassal = no
				}
				government = democracy
				change_tag = MEX
			}
			set_country_flag = colony_rebel_again 
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

political_decisions = {
	the_manufacturing_belt = {
		picture = manufacturing_belt
		potential = {
			tag = USA
			owns = 173
			year = 1870
			NOT = {
				has_global_flag = manufacturing_belt
			}
			OR = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = treaty_of_new_york }
				has_country_flag = french_gone
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			steel_railroad = 1
			bessemer_process = 1
		}
		
		effect = {
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = manufacturing_belt
				duration = 1825
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					province_id = 163 #Chicago				
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = manufacturing_belt_city
					duration = 365
				}			
			}
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 146 #St Louis
						province_id = 153 #Cedar Rapids
						province_id = 159 #Milwaukee
						province_id = 161 #Green Bay
						province_id = 173 #Detroit
						province_id = 174 #Grand Rapids
						province_id = 175 #Saginaw
						province_id = 178 #Cleveland
						province_id = 227 #Pittsburgh
						province_id = 228 #Erie
						province_id = 236 #Buffalo					
					}
				}
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = manufacturing_belt_city
					duration = 365
				}			
			}

			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 146
						province_id = 173
					}
				}
				trade_goods = iron
			}	
		
			set_global_flag = manufacturing_belt
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	reconquer_the_west = {
		picture = manifest_destiny
		potential = {
			tag = USA
			has_global_flag = treaty_of_new_york
			has_global_flag = american_civil_war_has_happened
			CSA = { exists = no }
			NOT = { owns = 139 }
			NOT = { owns = 146 } 
			NOT = { owns = 155 }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = reconquer_the_west }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_greater_power = yes
			is_disarmed = no
			OR = { 
				FRA = { exists = yes NOT = { truce_with = THIS } }
				BOR = { exists = yes NOT = { truce_with = THIS } }
			}
			OR = {
				any_greater_power = { war_with = FRA }
				any_greater_power = { war_with = BOR }
				FRA = { exists = yes is_disarmed = yes } 
				BOR = { exists = yes is_disarmed = yes } 
				412 = { 
					NOT = { 
						owned_by = FRA 
						owned_by = BOR 
					}
				}
			}	
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = reconquer_the_west
			ULA = { all_core = { add_core = USA } }
			ACA = { all_core = { add_core = USA } }
			random_owned = {
				limit = { exists = FRA }
				owner = {
					war = {
						target = FRA
						attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
						attacker_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size }
						defender_goal = {
							casus_belli = cut_down_to_size
						}
						call_ally = yes
					}
				}
			}
			random_owned = {
				limit = { exists = BOR }
					owner = {
					war = {
						target = BOR
						attacker_goal = { casus_belli = acquire_all_cores }
						attacker_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size }
						defender_goal = { casus_belli = cut_down_to_size }
						call_ally = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	treaty_of_dc = {
		picture = manifest_destiny
		potential = {
			tag = USA
			has_global_flag = treaty_of_new_york
			has_country_flag = reconquer_the_west
			CSA = { exists = no }
			owns = 139
			owns = 146
			owns = 155
			NOT = { has_country_flag = french_gone }
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			is_greater_power = yes
			is_disarmed = no
			OR = {
				TEX = { vassal_of = THIS }
				owns = 133
			}
			OR = {
				CAL = { vassal_of = THIS }
				owns = 104
			}
			OR = {
				DES = { vassal_of = THIS }
				owns = 97
			}
			OR = { 
				FRA = { exists = yes truce_with = THIS has_recently_lost_war = yes }
				BOR = { exists = yes truce_with = THIS has_recently_lost_war = yes }
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = french_gone
			prestige = 50
			inherit = CAL
			inherit = TEX
			inherit = DES
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					primary_culture = french
					capital = 425
				}	
				release = ULA
				release = ACA
				remove_accepted_culture = cajun
				remove_accepted_culture = louisianan
			}
			inherit = ULA
			inherit = ACA
			ULA = { all_core = { remove_core = ULA } }
			ACA = { all_core = { add_core = USA remove_core = ACA } }
		}
		
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}
	
	texas_vassal_join_csa = {

		picture = "manifest_destiny"
		potential = {
			tag = USA
			is_greater_power = yes
			has_country_flag = hasmanifestdestiny

		}

			set_country_flag = mexican_american_war_alternate_treaty
			random_list = {
				25 = { }
				25 = { badboy = 1 }
				25 = { badboy = 2 }
				25 = { badboy = 3 }
			}
			MEX_2149 = { add_core = USA }
			MEX_2142 = { add_core = USA }
			MEX_2138 = { add_core = USA }
			#
			MEX_2147 = { add_core = USA }
			MEX_2139 = { add_core = USA }
			#
			2662 = { add_core = USA }
			102 = { add_core = USA }
			relation = { who = MEX value = -200 }
			diplomatic_influence = { who = MEX value = -200 }
			leave_alliance = MEX
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					tag = MEX
					vassal_of = THIS
				}
				THIS = { release_vassal = MEX }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					is_our_vassal = MEX
					NOT = { tag = THIS }
				}
				relation = { who = THIS value = -200 }
				leave_alliance = THIS
			}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					exists = yes
					OR = {
						tag = CAL
						tag = TEX
						tag = DES
					}
					OR = {
						in_sphere = THIS
						part_of_sphere = no
					}
					OR = {
						vassal_of = THIS
						is_vassal = no
					}
				}
				country_event = 98650
			}
			any_pop = {
				dominant_issue = {
					factor = 0.05
					value = jingoism
				}
				consciousness = 2
			}
		}
	}
}

political_decisions = {

	vesuvius_observatory = {
		picture = "vesuvius_observatory"
		potential = {
			owns = 754
			NOT = { has_country_flag = vesuvius_observatory_build }
		}

		allow = {
			positivism = 1
            money = 20000
		}

		effect = {
            money = -20000
			prestige = 5
		    years_of_research = 0.08
			set_country_flag = vesuvius_observatory_build
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}

political_decisions = {
	establish_the_dar_al_funun = {
		potential = {
			tag = PER
			NOT = { has_country_flag = dar_al_funun_built }
		}
		
		allow = {
			OR = {
				literacy = 0.12
				AND = {
					has_country_modifier = great_reformer
					literacy = 0.08
				}
				AND = {
					has_country_modifier = visionary_thinker
					literacy = 0.05
				}
				AND = {
					has_country_modifier = visionary_thinker
					ai = yes
				}
			}
			war = no
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = dar_al_funun_built
			random_owned = {
				limit = {
					owner = {
						civilized = no
						NOT = { research_reform = yes_research_reform }
					}
				}
				owner = {
					research_reform = yes_research_reform
					any_pop = {
						ideology = {
							value = liberal
							factor = 0.03
						}
						consciousness = 0.5
						scaled_militancy = {
							ideology = liberal
							factor = -10
						}
						scaled_militancy = {
							ideology = reactionary
							factor = 3
						}
					}
				}
			}
			add_country_modifier = {
				name = dar_al_funun
				duration = 3650
			}
			capital_scope = {
				add_province_modifier = {
					name = dar_al_funun
					duration = -1
				}
				any_pop = {
					literacy = 0.05
				}
			}
			any_greater_power = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
						continent = europe
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = ENG
						tag = RUS
						tag = TUR						
					}
					relation = {
						who = PER
						value = -20
					}
				}
				relation = {
					who = PER
					value = 25
				}
				random_owned = {
					limit = { is_capital = yes }
					province_event = 190370
				}
			}
		}
	}
	# Decision - Naser al-Din's expedition to Europe, 1870s, increases prestige + adds research
	per_expedition_to_europe = {
		picture = "decision_eurotrip"

			tag = PER

				 money = 30000
				}
			}
		}

	build_niavaran = {

	# Decision - if Persia is not Absolute Monarchy, bombard the Majles (as done by Mohammad Ali Shah) and reign in the constitution, +Prestige, +MIL/CON, +GP relations
	bombard_the_majles = {
		picture = "decision_majles"
		potential = {
			tag = PER
			government = hms_government
			NOT = { has_country_flag = bombarded_majles }
			has_country_flag = persian_constitution_flag
		}
		allow = {
			average_consciousness = 2
		}
		effect = {
			prestige = 7.5
			set_country_flag = bombarded_majles
			any_greater_power = {
				relation = {
					who = PER
					value = 25
				}
			}
			RUS = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = PER
					value = 15
				}
			}
			ENG = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = PER
					value = 10
				}
			}
			any_pop = {
				ideology = {
					factor = 0.05
					value = liberal
				}
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = 6
				ideology = liberal
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -4
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -4
				ideology = conservative
			}
			scaled_consciousness = {
				factor = -8
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			scaled_militancy = {
				factor = -8
				ideology = reactionary
			}
			ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			political_reform = harassment
			political_reform = censored_press
			political_reform = no_meeting
			political_reform = appointed
			political_reform = landed_voting
		}
		
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
		
	}

	second_treaty_of_erzurum = {
		picture = treaty_erzurum
		potential = {
			tag = PER
			has_country_flag = a_turkish_adventure
			NOT = { has_country_flag = persian_ottoman_war }
		}
		
		allow = {
			OR = {
				NOT = {
					relation = {
						who = TUR
						value = 50
					}
				}
				war_with = TUR
				year = 1847
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			clr_country_flag = a_turkish_adventure
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						tag = PER
						tag = TUR
					}
					NOT = {
						tag = THIS
					}
				}
				country_event = 300983
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	
	the_reuter_concession = {
		picture = decision_reuter_concession
		potential = {
			tag = PER
			NOT = { has_country_flag = reuter_concession }
			has_country_flag = naser_al_din
		}
		
		allow = {
			war = no
			OR = {
				ENG = { is_sphere_leader_of = PER }
				part_of_sphere = no
			}
			OR = {
				civilized = yes
				AND = {
					NOT = { finance_reform = no_finance_reform }
					NOT = { has_country_modifier = uncivilized_isolationism } 
					pre_indust = yes_pre_indust
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			set_country_flag = reuter_concession
			money = 30000
			years_of_research = 0.1
			ENG = {
				diplomatic_influence = {
					who = PER
					value = 20
				}			
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				war = yes
			}
		}
	}
	the_treaty_of_paris_persia = {
		picture = decision_paris_treaty
		potential = {
			tag = PER
			has_country_flag = anglo_persian_war
		}
		
		allow = {
			war_exhaustion = 10
			war = yes
		}
		
		effect = {
			clr_country_flag = anglo_persian_war
			prestige = -15
			war_exhaustion = 5
			release = HER
			any_owned = {
				limit = {
					is_core = HER
				}
				secede_province = HER
			}
			HER = {
				end_war = PER
				country_event = 190357
				any_owned = {
					remove_core = PER
				}
			}
			#any_owned = {
			#	limit = {
			#		is_core = KDH
			#		NOT = {
			#			is_core = HER
			#		}
			#	}
			#	secede_province = KDH
			#}
			#any_owned = {
			#	limit = {
			#		OR = {
			#			is_core = TAJ
			#			is_core = KNZ
			#			is_core = HZJ
			#			is_core = AFG
			#		}
			#		NOT = {
			#			OR = {
			#				is_core = HER
			#				is_core = KDH
			#			}					
			#		}
			#	}
			#	secede_province = AFG
			#}
			any_country = {
				limit = {
					war_with = PER
					has_country_flag = intervened_herat
				}
				country_event = 190357
				relation = {
					who = PER
					value = 100
				}
				influence = {
					who = PER
					value = 50
				}
			}
			AFG = {
				any_owned = {
					remove_core = PER
				}
			}
			#KDH = {
			#	any_owned = {
			#		remove_core = PER
			#	}
			#}
			#HZJ = {
			#	any_owned = {
			#		remove_core = PER
			#	}
			#}
			#KNZ = {
			#	any_owned = {
			#		remove_core = PER
			#	}
			#}		
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
		}
	}
	the_sublime_threshold = {
		picture = decision_sublime_threshold
		potential = {
			tag = PER
			NOT = {
				929 = { is_core = PER }
			}
		}
		
		allow = {
			OR = {
				government = theocracy
				AND = {
					owns = 929
					owns = 933
					religious_policy = moralism
				}
			}
		}
		
		effect = {
			prestige = 5
			badboy = 5
			any_pop = {
				limit = {
					has_pop_religion = shiite
				}
				militancy = -5
				consciousness = -5
			}
			926 = {
				add_core = PER
				remove_core = TUR
			}
			927 = {
				add_core = PER
				remove_core = TUR
			}
			928 = {
				add_core = PER
				remove_core = TUR
			}
			929 = {
				add_core = PER
				remove_core = TUR
			}
			930 = {
				add_core = PER
				remove_core = TUR
			}
			932 = {
				add_core = PER
				remove_core = TUR
			}
			933 = {
				add_core = PER
				remove_core = TUR
			}
			934 = {
				add_core = PER
				remove_core = TUR
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				badboy = 0.6
			}
		}
	}
}
political_decisions = {
		
	the_steppe_wolfe = {
		picture = map_balkans
			potential = {
				AND = { tag = BUL ai = no }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = steppe_wolfe }
			}
			
			allow = {
				war = no
			}
			
			effect = {
				set_country_flag = steppe_wolfe
				prestige = 25
				add_country_modifier = {
						name = steppe_wolfe
						duration = -1
				}
			}
			
			ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
	}
	
	the_turkish_problem = {
		picture = genocide_minorities
			potential = {
				has_country_flag = steppe_wolfe
				NOT = { has_country_flag = turkish_problem_solved }
			}
			
			allow = {
				war = no
				money = 10000
				ruling_party_ideology = reactionary
			}
			
			effect = {
				set_country_flag = turkish_problem_solved
				badboy = 15
				any_pop = {
					limit = { 
						has_pop_culture = turkish
					}
					consciousness = 6
					militancy = 6
				}
				country_event = 30088
			}
			ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
	}
	
	repatriate_bulgarians = {
		picture = embrace_minority
			potential = {
				has_country_flag = turkish_problem_solved
				NOT = { has_country_flag = repatriated_bulgarians }
			}
			
			allow = {
				war = no
			}
			
			effect = {
				set_country_flag = repatriated_bulgarians
				country_event = 30065
			}
	}

	claims_to_thrace = {
		picture = constantinople
			potential = {
				has_country_flag = steppe_wolfe
				NOT = { has_country_flag = claimed_thrace }
			}
			
			allow = {
				war = no
				nationalism_n_imperialism = 1
				BUL =  {
						all_core = { owned_by = BUL }
				}
			}
			
			effect = {
				set_country_flag = claimed_thrace
				prestige = 10
				TUR_860 = { add_core = BUL }
				badboy = 2
				any_country = {
						limit = {
								any_owned_province = { region = TUR_860 }
								NOT = { tag = THIS }
						}
						relation = { who = THIS value = -50 }
				}
			}
			ai_will_do = { factor = 0 }
	}
